V03vinv172u:11_117: bhūyaḥ pṛcchati; ko bhavān iti; sa kathayati, kṣāntivādī; tena tasya pādau chinnau; sa chidyamāneṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:11_118: yadi tilaśatam api kṛtvā kṣepsyase kāyam urvyām
V03vinv172u:11_120: yasya mama śubhā maitrī cetasi paribhāvitā sadā kṣāntim
V03vinv172u:11_121: tāṃ notsahe vihantuṃ sutam iva sutavatsalā jananī //
V03vinv172u:11_122: sa evaṃ gāthābhir gītena rujaṃ vinodya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:11_123: yathaiṣa rājā kleśābhiniviṣṭabuddhir mamākāryākārya aṅgapratyaṅgāni chinatti;
V03vinv172u:11_124: tathāhaṃ kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgatena (SBV II 9) kuśalamūlena kleśagaṇam ātmīyam abhinirjitya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syām;
V03vinv172u:11_125: tataḥ prajñāśastreṇasya ākāryākārya tatprathamataḥ kleśān pramlāyeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:11_126: atha yā devatā kṣāntivādiny abhiprasannā sā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:11_127: anena kalirājena ayam ṛṣir adūṣy anapakārī karacaraṇaśūnyo vyavasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:11_129: iti viditvā tīvreṇa [A_427b] paryavasthānena kṣāntivādinaḥ purastād gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:11_131: kṛtsnaṃ ca jīvalokam ājñāpaya nāśayiṣyāmi // iti;
V03vinv172u:11_133: karacaraṇanāśavikalaṃ kṛtaṃ mama śarīram ākulaṃ yena /
V03vinv172u:11_134: tasyāpi pāpam aṇv api necchāmi kutaḥ punar adūṣino jagataḥ //
V03vinv172u:11_135: tasyāpi yā devatā vārāṇasyām ītis tata itaḥ sṛṣṭā; mūṣikāḥ śalabhāḥ
V03vinv172u:11_136: śukāḥ prabalāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; devo na varṣati; janakāyo mriyate; rājñā naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ:
V03vinv172u:11_137: bhavantaḥ kimarthaṃ devo na varṣati? muṣikāḥ śalabhāḥ śukāḥ prabalāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:11_138: janakāyaś ca mriyate iti; te kathayanti: deva devatāprakopa iti; yā devatā kṣāntivādino ṛṣer abhiprasannā sā kupitā;
V03vinv172u:11_139: tayā eṣā ītiḥ sṛṣṭā iti; rājā kathayati: bhavantaḥ katham atra pratipattavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:11_140: naimittikāḥ kathayanti: deva balimālyopahāreṇa devatāḥ prakupitā ārādhyante;
V03vinv172u:11_141: balimālyopahāraṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpayitavyā sa ca ṛṣir iti;
V03vinv172u:11_145: tayā ītir utsṛṣṭā; yena devo na varṣati; mūṣikāḥ śalabhāḥ śukāḥ prabalāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:11_146: janakāyaś ca mriyate; tad yuṣmābhir ītivyupaśamārthaṃ śvo balimālyopahārasametair udyānaṃ gatvā tasyāḥ pūjā saṃvidhātavyā iti.
V03vinv172u:11_147: janakāyas tām eva rātriṃ balimālyopahāraṃ samudānīya tad udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:11_148: rājā cāntaḥpurasahīyaḥ; tato janakāyena śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā devatāsthāne ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sā devatā kṣamitā;
V03vinv172u:11_149: tato rājā ṛṣeḥ kṣāntivādinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:11_150: kṣamasva me maharṣe yan mayā viṣayādhyavasitena krodhaparyākulīkṛtamatinā tavāparāddham iti;
V03vinv172u:11_151: kṣāntivādī kathayati: kṣāntaṃ mahārāja; yathākathaṃ jñāyate? sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:11_152: gātreṣu vahasi śastraṃ maitrī me sarvasatveṣu /
V03vinv172u:11_153: yadi saṃśayo 'tra bhavatāṃ paśyata rudhiraṃ prasannaṃ me // iti;
V03vinv172u:11_154: tasya tad rudhiraṃ parāvṛtam; pāpakarmakārī sa rājā prātihāryasandarśanenāpi na śraddhatte;
V03vinv172u:11_155: sa bhūyaḥ kathayati, kṣamasva maharṣe; kṣāntaṃ mahārāja; yathākathaṃ jñāyate? tato bodhisatvaḥ chinnāny aṅgapratyaṅgāni yathāsve sthāne sthāpayitvā satyopayācanayā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:11_156: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu tvayā rājan yathā na me /
V03vinv172u:11_157: āghāto 'sti susūkṣmo 'pi syān me kāyas tathā purā // iti;
V03vinv172u:11_158: tasya satyopayācanayā śarīraṃ yathāpuraṃ saṃvṛttam; tato rājā vismayotphullalocano gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:11_159: aho vratam idaṃ siddham aho dharmas svanuṣṭhitaḥ /
V03vinv172u:11_160: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu yasya te nāsti vikriyā //
V03vinv172u:11_161: rājā kalabhūḥ sāntaḥpurāmātyapauranajānapadaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:11_163: tena kālena samayena> [A_429a] kṣāntivādī ṛṣir aham eva sa;
V03vinv172u:11_164: yo 'sau kalibhū rājā eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyabhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:11_165: yan mayā tasyāntike maitracittam utpādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
V03vinv172u:11_166: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāsya ākāryākārya kleśān chedayeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:11_167: (SBV II 11) tatpraṇidhānavaśād etarhi tathāgatena asya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:11_169: pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:11_170: yadā bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:11_171: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:11_172: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani mayaitāni aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣeṇa saṃgṛhya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:13_0: The story of the two merchants
V03vinv172u:14_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau abhūvatāṃ viśvabhuk suyātraś ca;
V03vinv172u:14_4: tenaikākinā vīryam āsthāya anācāryeṇānupādhyāyakena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān saṃmukhīkṛtya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣākṛtā;
V03vinv172u:14_5: tasya te sārthikā sārthavāham apaśyantaḥ itaś cāmutaḥ ca samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:14_6: yadā sarvathā nārāgayantas tadānīṃ viśvabhujaḥ sārthavāho 'navalokya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:14_9: sa kathayati: tiṣṭhata, mā kāhalībhavata; samanveṣāmaḥ sārthavāham iti;
V03vinv172u:14_10: tato viśvabhuk sārthavāha aśītyā vaṇiksahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ suyātraṃ sārthavāhaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ udyānāvasathatapovaneṣu;
V03vinv172u:14_11: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca: kasmāt tvaṃ sārtham apahāya pravrajita iti;
V03vinv172u:14_12: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:14_14: tena tāny aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣopasaṃhāropasaṃhṛtāny uktāni:
V03vinv172u:14_15: asmai kārān kuruta; asmai kārāḥ kṛtā niyataṃ phaladāyakā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:14_17: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo' sāv viśvabhuk sārthavāha aham eva (SBV II 12) sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:14_18: yāni vaṇiksahasrāṇy etāny eva tāny aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi;
V03vinv172u:14_19: tadāpy etāni mayāmiṣeṇopasaṃhṛtya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:14_20: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasenopasaṃhṛtya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:14_21: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:14_22: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:14_23: tadā bhikṣavaḥ [A_429b] saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:14_24: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya saddharmarasena saṃtarpitā iti;
V03vinv172u:14_25_0: bhagavān āha: kim atra, bhikṣava, āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:14_25_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttarya saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:14_26_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:14_26_1: sārthavāhabhūtena paṃcakaiḥ kāntāramārge kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptāḥ salilaṃ vinā prāṇair viyujyamānā devatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā
V03vinv172u:16_0: The story of the thirsty caravan
V03vinv172u:17_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ viśvabhuṅ nāma sārthavāhaḥ paṃcavaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvyavaharann alpasalilakāntāramārgaṃ pratipannaḥ anupūrveṇa vindhyāṭavīṃ saṃprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:17_3: paṃca tu vaṇijaḥ salilam alabhamānā atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:17_4: viśvabhuk sārthavāhas tān tathāvidhān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākaṃpitahṛdayo ūrdhvamukho devatāyācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:17_5: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādyā devā yena satyena satyavacanena mama sarveṣu samapravṛttā dayā anena satyena satyavacanena māhendro devo varṣatu;
V03vinv172u:17_8: sa saṃlakṣayati: kena māhendraṃ bhavanam ākampitam? paśyati bodhisatvenānubhāvāt;
V03vinv172u:17_9: tena tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ enāsau vaṇiksārthaḥ saṃtarpitaḥ kāntāramārgaṃ samatikrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:17_10: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ, yo 'sau viśvabhuk sārthavāhaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:17_11: ye te paṃca vaṇijaḥ salilavirahād atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtā eta eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:17_12: tadāpy ete mayā salilena saṃtarpya kāntāramārgād uttāritāḥ;
V03vinv172u:17_13: etarhy api mayā ete saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāritāḥ.
V03vinv172u:17_14: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ,
V03vinv172u:17_15: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:17_16: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:17_17_0: bhagavān āha: kim atra, bhikṣava, āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:17_17_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttarya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ
V03vinv172u:17_18_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:17_18_1: sārthavāhabhūtena ete svajīvitaparityāgena mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:19_0: The story of the merchant Dhanaratha
V03vinv172u:20_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ, bhikṣavo, dhanaratho nāma mahāsārthavāho babhūva;
V03vinv172u:20_2: te tasya sārthavāhasya anyonyakathālāpasaumukhyā anyonyakṛtapraṇayā saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:20_3: yāvad anupūrveṇa samudratīram anuprāptaiḥ pratyekaṃ vahanāni sajjīkṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:20_5: sārthavāha vayaṃ tvayā vinā dhṛtiṃ na labhāmahe;
V03vinv172u:20_6: sa kathayati: yady evam ihaivābhiruhataḥ vahanāni mucyantām iti;
V03vinv172u:20_7: te tatrābhirūḍhāḥ, vātaś cotthitḥ; saṃtrastānāṃ dhanarathaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:20_8: bhavanto mā bibhīta; yadā vahanaṃ vināśam upaiti tadā mama kaṇṭhe lageta,
V03vinv172u:20_9: ahaṃ vo uttārayiṣyāmi iti; kuśalā bhavanti (SBV II 14) bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:20_11: yānapātraṃ vipannam; te sārthavāhasy lagnāḥ; te tena śrāntakāyena īṣajjīvitāvaśeṣeṇa samudratīrasaṃprāptitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:20_16: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau dhanaratho nāma sārthavāha aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:20_17: ye te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ tadāpy ete mayā mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:20_18: etarhy apy mayā saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ.
V03vinv172u:20_21: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:20_22: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdati? bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:20_23: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:22_0: The story of Saṃdhāna, the householder
V03vinv172u:23_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ saṃdhano nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:23_1: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:23_6: tad yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ dvādaśavarṣikam annapānam asti tair madviṣaye vastavyam;
V03vinv172u:23_10: bhoḥ puruṣa asti koṣṭhāgāre dvādaśavārṣikam annapānam iti;
V03vinv172u:23_11: sa kathayati: ārya (SBV II 15) bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:23_13: janakāyaḥ samantād vidrutaḥ; mahad durbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāraḥ durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:23_14: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakā prāntāśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:23_15: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre anyatamasminn āśramapade paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:23_16: yadā durbhikṣakālamṛtyubhayabhīto janakāyaḥ samantād vidrutaḥ tadā teṣāṃ piṇḍakā samucchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:23_17: te sarva eva saṃbhūya saṃdhanasya gṛhapates sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:23_18: gṛhapate, asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānām piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:23_19: sa kathayati: koṣṭhāgārkaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:23_21: asti bhoḥ puruṣa asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānam yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:23_23: saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍaka upanibaddha iti;
V03vinv172u:23_24: śrutvā aparāṇi paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni saṃdhānasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāni;
V03vinv172u:23_26: gṛhapate asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:23_27: sa kathayati: āryakā dattam eva yuṣmākaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ prārthayata iti;
V03vinv172u:23_28: te kathayanti gṛhapate anye te vayam anye iti;
V03vinv172u:23_29: sa kathayati: āryakā, yady evaṃ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:23_31: bhoḥ puruṣa asti asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād asya ca pravrajitasahasrasya dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:23_32: sa kathayati: bhaviṣyati iti; tena te pratyekabuddhā uktā: āryakā tiṣṭhata; ko yuṣmākaṃ bhaktakāla iti; te kathayanti: gṛhapate apariṇato madhyāhnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:23_33: tataḥ saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā dānaśālā māpitā dānādhisthāyikaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ kālārocakaś ca;
V03vinv172u:23_35: tasya pratyekabuddhasahasrasya yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ so 'tīva prāsādikaḥ chatrākāraśirās tāṃ parṣadaṃ chatrīkṛtyāvatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:23_36: saṃdhānasya gṛhapater duhitā tasya saṃghasthavirasya (SBV II 16) chatrākāraśiraskatāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ dṛṣṭvātīvābhiprasannā;
V03vinv172u:23_37: yāvad apareṇa samayena bhaktakāle devo varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:23_38: tataḥ tayā dārikayā saṃghasthavirasya mūrdhni chatraṃ dhāritam;
V03vinv172u:23_39: bhuktasya ca pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:23_40: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ yādṛśo 'yam āryaḥ yathā cāyaṃ chatrīkṛtya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ evam aham api chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:23_41: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yāsau saṃdhānasdya gṛhapater duhitā eṣa evāsau [A_431a] kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:23_42: yad anena kumārikābhūtena pratyekabuddhasaṃghasthavirasya chatraṃ vidhārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti,
V03vinv172u:23_43: tad etarhi sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadam avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:23_44: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:23_45: yadā bhagavatā ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:23_46: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmantam ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:23_47_0: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:23_47_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃtarpitāni?
V03vinv172u:23_47_2: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:23_47_3: vinipatitaśarīreṇa tiryagyonāv upapannena aśitikīṭasahasrāṇi kauṇḍinyaṃ kīṭikībhūtam āgamya svarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:26_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ, bhikṣava, aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo mahāsamudre kacchapeṣūpapannas teṣām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:26_1: yāvat paṃcavaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudram (SBV II 17) avatīrṇāni;
V03vinv172u:26_3: yāvad vahanaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayena vyasanam āpāditam;
V03vinv172u:26_4: tatra mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ; tacchabdaśravaṇāt kacchapo mahāsamudrād utthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:26_6: alaṃ bhavatāṃ viṣādena mama pṛṣṭham abhiruheta ahaṃ vas tārayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:26_10: sa śrāntakāyaḥ teṣu saṃkīrṇeṣu grīvām abhiprasārya suptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:26_12: tasmād ekā kīṭikā paribhramantī gandhaṃ ghrātvā tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv172u:26_13: tatas taṃ mahatpramāṇākāravikāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritagatipracārikī kīṭikānagaram abhigatā;
V03vinv172u:26_14: svasvasaṃjñayā kīṭikāḥ prabodhya aśītiḥ kīṭikāsahasrāṇy ādāya kacchapasakāśaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:26_15: tataḥ taṃ suotaṃ mṛtam iva niśceṣṭaprāṇaṃ bhakṣayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:26_16: yadāsya sthūlaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti śramanaparikhinno gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdho na cetayate;
V03vinv172u:26_17: yadā tu marmasthāneṣu māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti tadā prabuddhaḥ paśyati kīṭikābhiḥ sarvaṃ śarīram ākīrṇam;
V03vinv172u:26_18: sa saṃlakṣayati: yadi kāyaṃ calayiṣye [A_431b] vā saṃparivartayiṣye vā niyatam etāḥ praghātayiṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:26_20: iti viditvā chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:26_21: yathā mayā etāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:26_22: tāny evam aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya saddharmarasena saṃtarpayeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:26_23: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau kīṭikānāṃ mārgoddeśika eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:26_24: yāni tāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi tam āgamya māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:26_25: tāny aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi; tadāpy etānimayā svarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:26_26: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:26_27: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:26_28_0: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā
V03vinv172u:26_28_1: (SBV II 18) tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:26_29: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:26_30_0: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:26_30_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe
V03vinv172u:26_30_2: yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ? yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
V03vinv172u:26_30_3: ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:28_0: The story of the king Vajrabāhu
V03vinv172u:29_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ vajrabāhur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:29_1: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:29_5: tenāmātyānām ājñā dattā; bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavaṇīpakādhvagayācanakebhyo yo yenārthī tasmai tad anuprayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:29_6_0: evaṃ deva ity amātyā rajño vajrabāhor pratiśutya vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpayitvā annapānavastraśayanāsanahiraṇyasuvarṇamuktāvaiḍūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravāḍajātarūparajatāśmagarbhamusāragalbalohitikādakṣiṇāvartādidravyasaṃbhārenāvasthitāḥ
V03vinv172u:29_7: yāvad apareṇa [A_432a] samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca yakṣā ojohārā nirvāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:29_8: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:29_9: te gopālakān paśupālakān tṛṇahārakān kāṣṭhahārakān pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:29_10: bhavanto na yūyam asmān bibhīta? (SBV II 19) iti;
V03vinv172u:29_11: bhavantaḥ kimarthaṃ bibhīmaḥ yeṣām asmākaṃ rājā maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitādhyāśayena trir divasasya maitrīṃ samāpadyate? iti;
V03vinv172u:29_12_0: tataḥ te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya vārāṇasyām caturṣu dvāreṣu dānaśālāṃ pratyavekṣya vajrabāhuṃ rājānaṃ maitryā vyutthitaṃ
V03vinv172u:29_13: upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:29_14: deva bubhukṣitāḥ smāhāreṇa anugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:29_15: rājñā amātyān āhūyoktāḥ: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:29_16: te kathayanti: māṃsarudhirabhakṣā vayamiti; rājñā amātyā abhihitā: bhavanto yadi māṃsasya <na> saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vīthyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ rudhiraṃ prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:29_19: rājā saṃlakṣayati: kutaḥ sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasya pīḍām akṛtvā? yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:29_23: vaidyāḥ kathayanti: na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:29_24: kuśalāḥ bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:29_25: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śastranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:29_26: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtvā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣāḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:29_27: <kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau vajrabāhur nāma rājā aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:29_28: ye amī paṃca yakṣā ojohārās te evāmī paṃca bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:29_29: tadāpy ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ>
V03vinv172u:29_30: ; etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:29_31_0: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitās
V03vinv172u:29_31_1: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:29_32: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena (SBV II 20) saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:29_33_0: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa yāvat sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ
V03vinv172u:29_33_1: saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:29_34: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa pūrvavat duḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ maitrabalo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:32_2: [A_432b] yāvad apareṇa samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca ojohārā yakṣāḥ kasmiṇcid eva aparādhe pravāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_3: te taṃ janapadam anvāhiṇḍya vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_6: vārāṇasyāṃ janakāyo mriyate; amātyai rājñe maitrabalāya niveditam:
V03vinv172u:32_7: deva vārāṇasyām atīva janakāyo mṛta iti;
V03vinv172u:32_8: rājñā teṣām ājñā dattā: gacchata vārāṇasyām evaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata:
V03vinv172u:32_11: tad yuṣmābhir api sarvasatvānugatā maitrī manasi kartavyā;
V03vinv172u:32_13: te sarvasatvānugatāṃ maitrīṃ manasi kartum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:32_15: praveśaṃ na labhante; te praveśam alabhamānā gopālakāṃ paśupālakān tṛṇahārakāṃ kāṣṭhahārakāṃ pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:32_16: bhavanto na yūyam asmad bibhīta? iti;
V03vinv172u:32_17: te kathayanti: na bibhīmaḥ; kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? vayaṃ hi yad rājā maitrabalaś cintayati tac cintayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_18: kiṃ maitrabalo rājā cintayati? sarvasatvānugatāṃ maitrīṃ;
V03vinv172u:32_19: te saṃlakṣayanti: idam atra kāraṇaṃ yena vayam idānīm avatāraṃ na labhāmaha iti;
V03vinv172u:32_20: te vārāṇasyāṃ dvāreṇa (SBV II 21) dvāraṃ paribhramanti:
V03vinv172u:32_22: yāvad apareṇa samayena maitrabalo rājā bahir udyānāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_23: tatas te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya śānteryāpathena rājānam upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvocuḥ:
V03vinv172u:32_24: deva bubhukṣitā sma; āhāreṇānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti; rājñā amātyā āhūyoktāḥ: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata;
V03vinv172u:32_25: te kathayanti: deva māṃsarudhirabhakṣā vayam iti;
V03vinv172u:32_26: rājñā amātyā abhihitāḥ: bhavanta yadi māṃsasya <na> saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vithyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ ca prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:32_27: deva sadyohatarudhiramāṃsabhakṣā vayaṃ sadyohatena māṃsenānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:32_28: rājā saṃlakṣayati: kutas sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasyapīḍām akṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:32_29: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:32_31: bhavanto mama sarvāṅgikaṃ śirāvedhaṃ kuruta iti yācanakajanaṃ saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:32_32: vaidyāḥ kathayanti: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_33: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:32_34: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śāstranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_35: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣā paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:32_36: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau maitrabalo nāma rājā 'bhūd aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:32_37: ye te paṃca ojohārās yakṣā [A_433a] ete eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_38: tadāpy ete mayā svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:32_39: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:32_44: bhikṣubahutvaṃ jātam, tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:32_45: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritam;
V03vinv172u:32_46: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:34_0: The story of Nandapāla the Potter (= Ghaṭīkarasutta, MN 81, cf. MV I 319ff.)
V03vinv172u:35_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vaibhiḍiṅgī nāma grāmanigamo 'bhūd ṛddhaś ca sphītaś ca bahujanamanuṣyaś ca;
V03vinv172u:35_1: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nyagrodho nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:35_3: vaibhiḍiṅgīṃ paribhuṃkte sotsadāṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakāṃ kṛkinā rājñā brahmadeyāṃ dattām;
V03vinv172u:35_4_0: nyagrodhasya khalu bhikṣavo brāhmaṇamahaśālasya uttaro nāmo māṇavo 'ntevāsī upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyām anākṣipto
V03vinv172u:35_4_1: jātivādena gotravādena ca yāvad āsaptamaṃ mātāmahapaitāmahaṃ yugam upādāya;
V03vinv172u:35_5: adhyāpako mantradharo trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāraṃgataḥ sanighaṇṭukaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapaṃcamānāṃ sādṛśo vyākarakaḥ,
V03vinv172u:35_7: nyagrodhasya brāhmaṇamahaśālasya paṃcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayanti;
V03vinv172u:35_8: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:35_10: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_12: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_13: duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatya āgataphalābhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalo na svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanati na khānayati;
V03vinv172u:35_14: nānyatra, yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvā ekāntam upanikṣipya evam āha:
V03vinv172u:35_15: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu iti;
V03vinv172u:35_17: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena (SBV II 23) kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayati;
V03vinv172u:35_18: uttarasya māṇavasya mitraṃ suhṛd vayasyako ca nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_19: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_20: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ [A_433b] nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:35_21: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:35_22: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_23: tena khalu samayena uttaro māṇavaḥ sarvaśvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya sauvarṇena daṇḍakamaṇḍalunā dhāryamānena māṇavakagaṇaparivṛto māṇavakagaṇapuraskṛto vaibhiḍiṅgyān niryāti;
V03vinv172u:35_24: bahir vaibhiḍiṅgyāḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayitukāmaḥ adrākṣīd uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:35_25: dṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha: kutas tvaṃ somya nandīpāla etarhy āgacchasi? ito 'haṃ somya uttara etarhy āgacchāmi kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paryupāsya;
V03vinv172u:35_28: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭenālaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:35_29: tat kasya hetoḥ; kutas tasmin muṇḍake śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_30: bodhir hi paramaduṣkarā; mā tvaṃ somya uttara evaṃ vada:
V03vinv172u:35_32: bodhir hi paramaduṣkarā; api tu buddhaḥ sa bhagavān, buddhāś cānena sarvadharmā iti;
V03vinv172u:35_33: dvir api trir api nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ uttaraṃ māṇavakam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_36: dvir api trir api uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avoat:
V03vinv172u:35_37: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭena alaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:35_38: tat kasya hetoḥ? kutas tasmin muṇḍale śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_39: bodhir hi paramaduṣkarā; mā tvaṃ somyottara evaṃ vada kutas tasmin muṇḍake śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_40: bodhir hi paramaduṣkarā; api tu buddhaḥ sa bhagavān, buddhāś cānena sarvadharmā iti;
V03vinv172u:35_41: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkara uttarasya māṇavasya ratham abhiruhya uttaraṃ māṇavam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_47: yatredaṇīṃ nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro dīrgharātram acaṇḍo 'rabhaso 'karkaśa 'sāhasikaḥ keśagrahaṇam apy agamad iti viditvā nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_49: somya uttara, ato 'pi yāvat; ato 'pi yāvat somya nandīpāla;
V03vinv172u:35_50: ato 'pi yāvat, somya uttara; tena hi somya nandīpāla muṃca,
V03vinv172u:35_52: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaś ca ghaṭīkaraḥ ratham abhiruhya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:35_53: tayor yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā yānād avatīrya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:35_54: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:35_55: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_56: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro [A_434a] māṇavo na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_57: sādhv asya bhagavān tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathā uttaro māṇavo buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasīded iti;
V03vinv172u:35_58: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddha uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:35_59: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:35_60: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_61: kasmāt tvaṃ, somya nandīpāla, svākhyātaṃ dharmavinayaṃ śrutvā na pravrajasi samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikām? na tvaṃ,
V03vinv172u:35_62: somya kumāra, jānīṣe yathāham andhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ bibharmi,
V03vinv172u:35_63: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena ca kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāmi;
V03vinv172u:35_64: pravraja tvaṃ somya nandīpāla mā vā;
V03vinv172u:35_65: ahaṃ tāvat pravrajiṣye iti; atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_66: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro māṇava ākāṃkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv172u:35_67: taṃ bhagavān pravrājayatūpasaṃpādayatu anukaṃpām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:35_68: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ (SBV II 25) samyaksaṃbuddho nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:35_69: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_70_0: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaś aciraprakrāntaṃ nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ viditvā uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ pravrājya upasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ
V03vinv172u:35_70_1: vaibhiḍiṃgyāṃ vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī kāśīnāṃ nigamas tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_73: aśrauṣīt kṛkī rājā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kāśiṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve iti;
V03vinv172u:35_74: śrutvā ca punar vārāṇasyāḥ niṣkramya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_75: upasaṃkramya upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:35_76: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kṛkiṃ rājānaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:35_77: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:35_78: atha kṛkī rājā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kāśyapam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_79: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti;
V03vinv172u:35_80: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkino rājñas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:35_81: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāsyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_82_0: atha kṛkī rājā tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇiṃ
V03vinv172u:35_82_1: pratiṣṭhāpya [A_434b] kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya dūtena kālam ārocayati:
V03vinv172u:35_83: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti;
V03vinv172u:35_84: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena kṛkeḥ rājño bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_85: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_86: atha kṛkī rājā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati;
V03vinv172u:35_87_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ
V03vinv172u:35_87_1: viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāram ādāya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya (SBV II 26) purato 'sthād āyācamānaḥ:
V03vinv172u:35_88: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:35_91: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:35_92: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:35_93: dvir api trir api kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_94: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:35_97: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:35_98: dvir api trir api kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kṛkiṃ rājānam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_99: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:35_100: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ saṃyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_101: asti kaścid bhagavan yo 'py evaṃrūpa upasthāyakaḥ tadyathā aham etarhy? asti mahārāja tavaiva vijite vaibhiḍiṃgī nāma grāmanigamaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_104: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_106_0: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatye āgataphalo 'bhisamitavāṃ
V03vinv172u:35_106_1: nikṣiptaparṇamusalaḥ sa na svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanati na khānayati;
V03vinv172u:35_107: nānyatra, yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvaikāntam upanikṣipyaivam āha:
V03vinv172u:35_108: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī bhavati sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu;
V03vinv172u:35_110: māṃ ca kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayati;
V03vinv172u:35_111: (SBV II 27) ekam ahaṃ mahārāja samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya viharāmi;
V03vinv172u:35_112: so 'haṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam;
V03vinv172u:35_113: [A_435a] sāvādānaṃ vaibhiḍaṃgīṃ piṇḍāya caran yena ghaṭīkarasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:35_115: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ bahir nirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:35_117: śrutvā ca punar evam āhatuḥ; ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati? tāv aham evaṃ vadāmi:
V03vinv172u:35_119: tāv evam āhatuḥ: praviśatu āryaḥ praviśatu bhadramukha ete kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:35_122: so 'haṃ mahārāja uttarakauravaṃ samayam adhiṣṭhāya svayam eva kuṇḍalikāyāḥ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikaṃ gṛhītvā bhuktavān;
V03vinv172u:35_124: adrākṣīn nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam;
V03vinv172u:35_125: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:35_126: amba tāta kenaite kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:35_127: ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam; tāv evam āhatuḥ: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasyāśrauṣva argaḍakasyākoṭanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:35_129: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati? sa evam āha:
V03vinv172u:35_131: tam enam evaṃ vadāvaḥ: praviśatu ārya praviśatu bhadramukha;
V03vinv172u:35_134: bahirgatas te upasthāyakaḥ; tena te kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:35_136_0: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena
V03vinv172u:35_136_1: saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ cāsya satatasahagatā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na vijahāti;
V03vinv172u:35_137: sāvyucchinnā kāye vartate; saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ yathā kuṇḍālikāyāḥ kulmāṣam.
V03vinv172u:35_138: piṭhirikāyaś ca sūpikam evaṃ kuṇḍikāyā odanaṃ piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:35_139: ekam imaṃ mahārāja (SBV II 28) samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya ahaṃ varṣā upagataḥ;

V03vinv172u:35_185: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāny anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:35_186: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;

V03vinv172u:35_192: bodhir hi paramaduṣkarā; tasya karmaṇo vipākena etarhi mayā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:35_193: yadi punar bodhir apavaditābhaviṣyat punar api mayā triṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni ātmabodhinimittaṃ parikhedito 'bhaviṣyam;
V03vinv172u:35_194: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_0: yam eva divasaṃ bodhisatvo nirgatas tam eva divasaṃ yaśodharā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:38_1: yadā bodhisatvo duṣkarāṇi carati tadāntaḥpuram api duṣkaraṃ caritum ārabdhaṃ;
V03vinv172u:38_3: yadā bhagavān niṣkiṃcanaṃ duṣkaram iti viditvā yathāsukham āśvasiti;
V03vinv172u:38_4: yathāsukhaṃ praśvasiti; odārikam āhāram āharaty odanakulmāṣaṃ,
V03vinv172u:38_5: sarpistailābhyāṃ gātrāṇi mrakṣayati sukhodakena ca kāyaṃ pariṣiṃcati;
V03vinv172u:38_7: yathāsukhaṃ praśvasiti, odārikam āhāram āharaty odanakulmāṣān,
V03vinv172u:38_10: tadāsau garbhaḥ punar api puṣṭiṃ gataḥ tasyā (SBV II 31) garbhanimittāni prādurbhūtāni;
V03vinv172u:38_12: tvaṃ bodhisatve tapovanaṃ gate vyabhicaritā iti;
V03vinv172u:38_13: sā kathayati: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ, nāhaṃ vyabhicarāmi; kathaṃ jñāyate? yuṣmākaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:38_14: yāvad asau prasūtā, dārako jātaḥ; yam eva divasaṃ jātaḥ, tam eva divasaṃ rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_15: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ [A_436b] vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:38_17: tasya jñātayaḥ kathayanti: asya janmani rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ tad bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:38_18: jāte kumāre bhūyasyā mātrayā śākyā vibruvate eva;
V03vinv172u:38_19: tayāsau satyopayācanaṃ kṛtvā rāhulabhadro bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyāṃ sthāpayitvā krīḍāpuṣkariṇyām āplāvitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:38_20: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ plavatām iti;
V03vinv172u:38_21_0: plavitum ārabdhaḥ; sā kathayati: pārād apāram āgacchatu iti; sa pārād apāram āgataḥ; te vismayam āpannāḥ; yaśodharā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:38_21_1: bhūyo 'pi bhavatāṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmi yathāyaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:38_22: yadā bhagavān atikrāntaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇy abhisaṃbuddhaḥ kapilavastv anuprāptaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuṃkte,

V03vinv172u:38_24: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ bhagavantam anvāvarteyam it;
V03vinv172u:38_25: kapilavastuni cānyatamā parivrājikā vaśīkaraṇādikarmasv atyarthaṃ pravīṇā;
V03vinv172u:38_27: ārye kārṣāpaṇair vaśīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā preṣaya iti;
V03vinv172u:38_29: yaśodharayā rāhulasya haste datta uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:38_30: putra yas tava pitā tasmai anuprayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:38_31: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:38_33: tasyāpannayāḥ kartavya iti; bhagavatā paṃcabuddhaśatāni nirmitāni;
V03vinv172u:38_34: rāhulena sarvān buddhān pratyavekṣya bhagavato vṛddhānte sthitasya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_36: rāhulena bhakṣitaḥ; bhagavān dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_37: rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhaḥ nirvartyamāno 'pi na nirvartate:
V03vinv172u:38_38: arodīt iti; bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: caramabhaviko 'yaṃ satvaḥ, na śakyam anena gṛhavāse vastum (SBV II 32) iti;
V03vinv172u:38_39: rāhulena bhagavataḥ pratyabhijñātena kṛtena rājā śuddhodanaḥ sāntaḥpurajanaḥ śākyāś ca paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ yaśodharāyāṃ cātyartham abhiprasannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_42: rājñā śuddhodanena śrutaṃ; sa bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_44: bhagavan, yadi rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro 'vaśyaṃ pravrājyate adyaikaṃ divasaṃ tiṣṭhatu yāvad aham asya pūjāṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:38_45: rājñā śuddhodanena rāhulasya mahān utsavaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:38_47: pravrājaya, śāriputra, rāhulaṃ kumāram iti; evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ pravrājitaḥ.
V03vinv172u:38_48: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:38_49: paśya bhadantāyuṣmatā rāhulena bhagavān modakena mahājanakāyasya madhye vijñāta iti;
V03vinv172u:38_50: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhyi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anena rāhulena mālayā vijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:40_0: The story of the great thief
V03vinv172u:41_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:41_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:41_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_437a] putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_4: sa patnīm āmantrayate: bhadre jāto 'smākaṃ dhanaharo ṛṇaharaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_5: gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya mahāsamudram avatarāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:41_6: sā kathayati: āryaputra evaṃ kuruṣva iti; sa paṇyam ādāya mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_8: tatas tasya patnyā śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā sa dārako hastabalena jñātibalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_11: sā tasya svaśilpād bhogasaṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:41_13: tasmin gate anayena vyasanam āpadyante iti;
V03vinv172u:41_14: tayāsau kuvindo 'bhihitaḥ: bhrāta imam api bhāgineyaṃ kuvindakarma śikṣayeti;
V03vinv172u:41_15: sa kathayati: śobhanam evaṃ (SBV II 33) bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:41_16: sa taṃ śikṣayitum ārabdhaḥ; paṭupracāro 'sau; tenālpīyasā kālena kuvindakarma śikṣitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:41_17: sa kuvindaḥ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkte;
V03vinv172u:41_18: sā dārakaḥ kathayati: mātula tvam api tad eva karma karoṣi;
V03vinv172u:41_19: aham api tad eva; atha kasmāt tvaṃ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkṣe;
V03vinv172u:41_20: mama tu na saṃpadyate iti; sa kathayati: bhāgineya ahaṃ karmadvayaṃ karomi,
V03vinv172u:41_22: sa kathayati: mātula yady evam aham api cauryaṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:41_23: bhāgineya śakṣyasi tvaṃ cauryaṃ kartuṃ? mātula śakṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:41_24: sa saṃlakṣayati: jijñāsayāmi tāvad enam iti; sa tam ādāya vīthiṃ gataḥ; tena tatra śaśakaḥ krītvā tasya dattaḥ bhāgineya sādhaya tāvad yad ahaṃ snātvāgacchāmi;
V03vinv172u:41_25: sa snātvā āgataḥ; tena taṃ laghu laghv eva sādhayitvā ekapādo bhakṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_26: sa kuvindaḥ snātvā āgataḥ; bhāgineya sādhitaḥ śaśakaḥ? mātula sādhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_27: paśyāmi tāvat; tena samarpitaḥ; paśyati pādatrayaṃ; sa kathayati bhāgineyāsya caturthaḥ pādaḥ kva gataḥ? sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:41_29: kva gamiṣyati? iti; sa saṃlakṣayati: ahaṃ tāvac coraḥ, ayaṃ tu mahācora iti; sa tam ādāya tripādakaṃ ca śaśakaṃ pānāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:41_30: bhāgineya madyaṃ pibāmaḥ; pibāmaḥ; tābhyāṃ pītaṃ; kuvindaḥ kathayati: bhāgineya madyamūlyam apalapāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_31: sa kathayati: mātula yena pītaṃ so 'palapatu;
V03vinv172u:41_32: ahaṃ naiva pibāmi; kim apalapāmi iti; sa kuvindaḥ saṃlakṣayati: mahācoro 'yaṃ; śakyam anena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:41_33: sa tena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_35: tenocyate: mātula cauryam api na jñāyate tvayā kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:41_38: kulaṃ sarvaṃ vināśam upaiti; pādau prakṣipa iti; tena pādau prakṣiptau; tataś coraś cora iti kolāhalo jāta iti padbhyāṃ gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_39: mahājanakāyo lagnaḥ; sa eko na śaknoty ākarṣṭuṃ; sa śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_40: amātyai rājño nivedita: deva ekaś coraḥ sandhiṃ praviṣṭo gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_41: tasya ko 'pi śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_42: rāja kathayati: bhavantaḥ yaḥ śiraś (SBV II 34) chitvā prakrāntaḥ sa mahācoraḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_43: gacchata taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe tiṣṭhata;
V03vinv172u:41_44: yas taṃ gṛhītvā roditi tenaikacoreṇa bhavitavyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:41_45: gṛhṇīta iti; tatas te rājapuruṣāḥ taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe sthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_46: sa ekacoraḥ saṃlakṣayati: na nāma mayā mātulaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā roditavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:41_47: sa unmattakaveṣam [A_437b] ātmānaṃ kṛtvā striyam api kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti;
V03vinv172u:41_48: puruṣam api vṛkṣam api aśvam api vṛṣabham api mahiṣam api chāgam api kukkuram api grahītum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_49: yadā lokena vijñāta unmattako 'yam iti tadā taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:41_50: rājapuruṣai rājño niveditaṃ: deva unmattakas taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrānta iti;

V03vinv172u:43_0: Yaśodharā seeks to bring the Buddha back to her
V03vinv172u:44_0: yaśodharā saṃlakṣayati: yadi rāhulasya pitā antaḥpuraṃ praviśati tathāivānucaritavyo yathā na bhūyo nirgacchati iti;

V03vinv172u:44_2: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vineyajanāpekṣā antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ;

V03vinv172u:90_0: yadā āyuṣmān ānando bhagavatā sārdhaṃ gacchati tadāsya bhagavati tīvraprasādagauravaṃ [A_445b] hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ chambitatvaṃ copatiṣṭhati;

V03vinv172u:90_7: kathaṃ kṛtvā; yadāhaṃ bhagavatā sārdhaṃ gacchāmi tato mama bhagavato 'ntike tīvraprasādagauravaṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ chambitatvaṃ copatiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:90_8: yadā buddhanirmāṇena tadā na tathā iti
V03vinv172u:90_11: digvidikṣu śabdo visṛtaḥ ānando bhikṣur nimittakuśalaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:90_12: atha bhagavān yathābhiramya rājagṛhe vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:90_15: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat;
V03vinv172u:90_17: sa saṃlakṣayati: ayaṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ ānando bhikṣuḥ,
V03vinv172u:90_19: pṛcchāmi tāvad enam asyāḥ śiṃśapāyāḥ kiyanti patrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:90_20: sa tena pṛṣṭaḥ: ārya asyāḥ śiṃśapāyāḥ kiyanti patrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:90_21: sa kathayati: etāvanti śatāni sahasrāṇi śatasahasrāṇi ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:90_22: tena brāhmaṇena katipayāni patrāṇy apanīya gaṇayitvā choritāni;
V03vinv172u:90_24: tena brāhmaṇena bhūya uktaḥ; ārya idānīṃ jānīṣva asyāḥ śiṃśapāyāḥ kiyanti patrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:90_25: sa kathayati: pūrvam etāvanti śatāni sahasrāṇi śatasahasrāṇi ca;
V03vinv172u:90_26: ata etāvanty apanītāni iti uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:90_29: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:90_30: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatānandena karma (SBV II 57) kṛtaṃ yena nimittakuśalo jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:90_31: bhagavān āha: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.

V03vinv172u:102_42: tadyathā siṃho mṛgarājā [A_447b] giriguhāgato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta daṃṣṭrāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:102_43: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_44: tadyathā rājño nāgo matto mātaṅgaḥ kuñjaraḥ ṣaṣṭihāyana īṣādanto vyūḍhoraskaḥ saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ saṃgrāmamadhyagato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta dantāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:102_45: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_46: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ.
V03vinv172u:102_47: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:102_48: yat khalu āyuṣman jānīyaḥ bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:102_49_0: bhāṣitaṃ codgrahīṣyati, svaṃ cārthaṃ na riṃciṣyati; tadyathā kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ vā uttarāyatāyāṃ prācīnāyatāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:102_49_1: pūrveṇa vātāyanena sūryaraśmayaḥ praviṣya paścimāṃ bhittiṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyuḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_50: evam eva bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:102_51: bhāṣitaṃ codgrahīṣyati, svaṃ cārthaṃ na riṃciṣyati; utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
V03vinv172u:102_53: evam aham āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utasahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ sacen me bhagavān trīn varān dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:102_56: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
V03vinv172u:102_57: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavān imān trīn varāṃ dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:102_59: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavata upasthāyakam utsāhya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:102_60: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:102_61: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:102_62: utsāhita āvābhyaṃ bhadanta bhikṣur bhagavata upasthāyako yadutāyuṣmān ānanda;
V03vinv172u:102_63: sa evam āha: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavāṃs trīn varān dadyād evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:102_66: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
V03vinv172u:102_67: saced bhagavān imān trīn varān dadyāt,
V03vinv172u:102_69: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_70: sa paśyaty anāgataṃ (SBV II 63) sabrahmacāriṇām antikād vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyaṃ dharmaṃ;
V03vinv172u:102_74: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_75: sa paśyaty anāgataṃ sabrahmacāriṇām antikād vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyaṃ dharmaṃ;
V03vinv172u:102_78: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit*;
V03vinv172u:102_79: sa kālaṃ jñāsyaty ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:102_80: ayam akālaḥ; ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya upāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:102_81: ayam akālaḥ; amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_83: idaṃ na saukhopacayāya; maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit;
V03vinv172u:102_84: sa kālaṃ jñāsyati ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:102_85: ayam akālaḥ; ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyopāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
V03vinv172u:102_86: ayam akālaḥ; amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_88: idaṃ na saukhopacayāya; ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_89: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_90: sa cetaḥparyāyakuśalaḥ; evaṃ saṃjñāsyati tathāgataṃ sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthitaṃ nimittena vā parikathayā vā ādeṣṭum;
V03vinv172u:102_91: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa bhagavān bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv172u:102_92: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa sugato bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv172u:102_93: yac ca yadā ādekṣyati tat sarvaṃ tathaiva bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv172u:102_94: nānyathā; ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:102_96: bhāṣitaṃ codgrahīṣyati, svaṃ cārthaṃ na riṃciṣyati; yan maudgalyāyanānando bhikṣuḥ tathāgatam upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:102_98: svaṃ cārthaṃ na riṃciṣyati, ayam ānandasya bhikṣoḥ āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ.
V03vinv172u:102_99: yadāyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām āyuṣmān ānando bhagavata upasthāyaka utsāhitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:102_100: bhagavatā cānuvarṇitaḥ, tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:102_101: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ,
V03vinv172u:102_102: upasthāyako, bahuśrutaḥ., śrutadharaḥ, śrutasannicaya iti; bhagavān āha: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:104_0: The story of Bhānumān and Bhānumantaḥ
V03vinv172u:105_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ bhānur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:105_1: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:105_2: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_3: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:105_5: amātyāḥ kathayanti; [A_448b] pitāsya bhānuḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya bhānumān iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:105_8: pitrā yauvarājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ; bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_9: tasyāpi jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā bhānumanta iti nāma kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:105_11: sa pitaraṃ paśyati dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:105_12: sa saṃlakṣayati; aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:105_13: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:105_14: sa pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:105_16: sa kathayati: putra yasyārthe yajñā ijyante homā hūyante tapāṃsi tapyante tat tava karatalagataṃ rājyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:105_17: kasyārthe pravrajasi iti; sa nivāryamāṇo 'pi nāvatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:105_21: bhānumatā ṛṣimadhye pravrajitena ekānte prakramya anācāryakeṇa anupādhyāyakena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv172u:105_23: sa itaś cānutaś ca paribhraman vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_24: rājñā śrutaṃ; bhānumatā (SBV II 65) pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā,
V03vinv172u:105_25: sa ceha iti; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:105_26: maharṣe tvaṃ piṇḍakenārthī, ahaṃ puṇyena; ihaiva madīye udyāne prativasa;
V03vinv172u:105_27: ahaṃ te sarvopakaraṇair vaighātaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:105_28: tenādhivāsitaṃ; rājñā tasya bhānumantaḥ kumāraḥ upasthāyako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_32: sa tenoktaḥ: bhrātaḥ kimarthaṃ na pravrajasi? iti;
V03vinv172u:105_33_0: sa kathayati: maharṣe pravrajāmi; yady evaṃ gaccha, pitaram avalokya; sa rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ; deva anujānīhi māṃ, pravrajāmi;
V03vinv172u:105_33_1: rājā kathayati: tava bhrātā pravrajitaḥ; mamātyayāt tvam eva rājā; kimarthaṃ pravrajasi iti; sa na labhate pravrajyāṃ; sa
V03vinv172u:105_33_2: pratyekabuddhaḥ svayam eva rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_36: pravrajyā śreyasi bhāno yasmāt saṃvarṇitā jinaiḥ // iti;
V03vinv172u:105_37: rājā kathayati: maharṣe tvaṃ pravrajitaḥ; eṣa mamātyayād rājā bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:105_38: ihaiva dānāni dāsyati; puṇyāni kariṣyati; kimarthaṃ pravrajati iti; pratyekabuddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:105_39: anyathā cintitā hy arthā anyathā parivartitāḥ /
V03vinv172u:105_40: alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ bhāno paraṃ saptāham eva tu //
V03vinv172u:105_41: maharṣe asya saptāhaṃ jīvitaṃ? pratyekabuddhaḥ kathayati,
V03vinv172u:105_42: saptāhaṃ; rājā kathayati: maharṣe yady evam anujñāto bhavatu;
V03vinv172u:105_43: pravrājaya; sa ātmanaḥ alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ jñātvā tīvreṇa prasādena tasyopasthānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_45: tasya pātraṃ karatale hṛhītvā bhuṃjānasya vāyunā hastaḥ kampate;
V03vinv172u:105_46: tatas tena rājakumāreṇa kaṭakam avatārya pātrasya [A_449a] ādhārako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_47: tatpātraṃ niścalaṃ sthitaṃ; sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:105_48: yathaitat pātraṃ niścalaṃ, evaṃ mamānena (SBV II 66) kuśalamūlena ye dharmasantāne praviśeyuḥ te niścalā avatiṣṭheyuḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:105_49: sa tasya pūrvaṃ parimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:105_50: sa kathayati: tvaṃ pūrvam āgārikabhūtaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padair vyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayasi;
V03vinv172u:105_52_0: kimarthaṃ na deśayasi iti; sa kathayati: nāhaṃ deśayāmi; artho ko deśayati? ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te
V03vinv172u:105_52_1: buddhā bhagavantaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayanti iti;
V03vinv172u:105_53: tena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ; yo 'sau buddho bhagavān parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati,
V03vinv172u:105_55: sa tena pratyekabuddhena pravrājitaḥ uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:105_56: vatsa etad eva te manasi kartavyaṃ mayā saptāhasyātyayāt martavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:105_57: tena tena saptāhena na kiṃcid adhigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:105_59: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya bahuśrutaḥ syāṃ,
V03vinv172u:105_60: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ pratyekabuddhasya bhrātā eṣa evāsāv ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:105_61: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya bhrātur upasthānaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ upasthāyako bahuśrutaḥ śrutadharaḥ śrutasannicayaś ca.
V03vinv172u:105_62: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:105_63: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavatā bahuśrutāṇāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti;
V03vinv172u:105_64: bhagavān āha: ānandenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:107_0: Ānanda is the foremost among the learned monks
V03vinv172u:108_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:108_2: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm (SBV II 67) upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:108_5: yasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ bhagavatā kāśyapena bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agro vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:108_7: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
V03vinv172u:108_9: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:108_10: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti;
V03vinv172u:108_11: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:108_12: yathā ca me upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena bahudhārāṇām [A_449b] śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:108_13: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavān śākyamunir śākyādhirāja bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agraṃ vyākuryād;
V03vinv172u:108_14: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:108_16: ṛddhiḥ śāstā tṛkā vaktā caṇḍālenāyaṃ gayā /
V03vinv172u:108_17: yasya caite parādhyanti satvaśrāṇāś ca kukkurāḥ // (SBV II 68)
V03vinv172u:110_1: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'”, Fests. Bechert (1997)
V03vinv172u:111_1: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:111_2: tatra ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddher lābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:111_4: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:111_6: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:111_8: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:111_10: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:113_0: Devadatta strives to win magical power
V03vinv172u:113_1: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'”, Festsch. Bechert (1997)
V03vinv172u:114_1: etarhi durbhikṣaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:114_2: ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddhilābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_4: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_6: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_8: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_10: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_12: aham api yadi ṛddher lābhī syām aham api yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjīya;
V03vinv172u:114_14: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_16: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_18: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_20: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
V03vinv172u:114_22: [A_450a] atha ko nu me pratilabhaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti;
V03vinv172u:114_24: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:114_26: vyapadiśatu me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti;
V03vinv172u:114_27: atha bhagavān devadattasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannaṃ viditvā devadattam idam (SBV II 69) avocat:
V03vinv172u:114_28: adhiśīle tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:114_29: ṛddhiś ca te bhaviṣyati, anyac ca; adhicitte adhiprajñe tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru;
V03vinv172u:114_30: ṛddhiś ca te bhaviṣyati, anyac ca; atha devadattasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:114_31: na vyapadiśati me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:114_35: athāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinyo bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:114_36: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:114_37: ṛddhiś ca te bhaviṣyati, anyac ca; atha devadattasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:114_38_0: sthaviro 'pi me kauṇḍinyo na vyapadiśati ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā āyuṣmān aśvajid bhadriko bāṣpo mahānāmā pūrṇo vimalo gavaṃpatiḥ
V03vinv172u:114_41: atha paṃca sthaviraśatāni bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:114_42: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:114_43: ṛddhiś ca te bhaviṣyati, anyac ca; vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:114_44: ṛddhiś ca te bhaviṣyati, anyac ca; atha devadattasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:114_45: paṃcāpi sthaviraśatāni ṛddher mārgaṃ na vyapadiśanti;
V03vinv172u:114_46: kiṃ punar ebhir āyuṣmadbhir bhagavatā sārdhaṃ purvam eva saṅgītaṃ bhaviṣyati? tathā hi me na kaścid vyapadiśanti ṛddher mārgaṃ;
V03vinv172u:114_48: atha ko nu me pratibalaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ?
V03vinv172u:116_0: Daśabalakāśyapa teaches to Devadatta the way to obtain magical power
V03vinv172u:116_1: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'”, Festsch. Bechert (1997)
V03vinv172u:117_0: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapo rāhagṛhe viharati senikāguhāyaṃ [A_450b] atha devadattasyaitad abhavat*:
V03vinv172u:117_1: ayaṃ sthaviro daśabalakāśyapo dīrgharātram aśaṭha amāyāvī;
V03vinv172u:117_2: ṛjukaṛjukajātīyo bhrātṛsālohitasya ca me nandasya upādhyāyo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:117_3: pratibalaś ca me sthaviro daśabalakāśyapaḥ ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti viditvā yenāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapas tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:117_4: upasaṃkramya (SBV II 70) āyuṣmato daśabalakāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:117_5: ekāntasthito devadattaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ daśabalakāśyapam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:117_7_0: athāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ bhagavato mānasam avyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam
V03vinv172u:117_7_1: icchāgatam utpannam ity aviditvā ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadiśati;
V03vinv172u:117_8: tatra devadattena pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā;
V03vinv172u:117_10: bahudhā bhūtvā ekībhavati: āvirbhāvatirobhāvaṃ jñānadarśanena pratyanubhavati;
V03vinv172u:117_11: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥprākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati tadyathā ākāśe;
V03vinv172u:117_14: ākāśe paryaṅkena krāmati tadyathā pakṣī śakunakaḥ imau vā sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi.
V03vinv172u:117_16_0: kiṃ punar me yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:117_16_1: sataś ca bhikṣūn śeṣeṇa saṃvibhaktuṃ? yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām
V03vinv172u:117_16_2: āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ? śataś ca bhikṣūn śeṣeṇa saṃvibhaktuṃ? uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya
V03vinv172u:117_16_3: taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ? śataś ca bhikṣūn śeṣeṇa saṃvibhaktuṃ? cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān
V03vinv172u:117_16_4: ca devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ? śataś ca bhikṣūn śeṣeṇa saṃvibhaktuṃ? ye vā te janapadā
V03vinv172u:117_16_5: ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:120_1: kiṃ punar aham asmin magadhakṣetre pradhānapuruṣam anvāvartayeyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:120_4: ayam ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pitur atyayāt paitryarājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāsyati;
V03vinv172u:120_7: atha devadattaḥ abhijāto hastyājāneyo bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya [A_451a] niveśanam apadvāreṇa praviśya dvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:120_8: dvāreṇa praviśya apadvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati abhijātaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ bhikṣur api muṇḍaḥ saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:120_9: dahro 'pīdānīṃ kumāraḥ suvarṇamekhalādhārī bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya utsaṅge āvartate;
V03vinv172u:120_10: parivartate saṃvartate; ajātaśatrur api enaṃ kumāram āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
V03vinv172u:120_12: tad api devadatto 'bhyavaharati yathāpital lābhasatkāreṇa abhibhūtaḥ paryādattacittaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:120_13: tatrājātaśatruḥ kumāro bhūyasyā mātrayā pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratilabdhavān:
V03vinv172u:120_14: mahardhikataro batāryo devadattaḥ śāstur antikāt* iti;
V03vinv172u:120_16: paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:120_17: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:122_0: The gifts and honours of Ajātaśatru infatuate Devadatta and his magical powers leave him entirely
V03vinv172u:122_1: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan;
V03vinv172u:122_2: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ;
V03vinv172u:122_4: rājāsya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatruḥ vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:122_5: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:122_6: devadattaḥ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra (SBV II 72) upaniṣīdati iti;
V03vinv172u:122_7: śrutvā punaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrantāḥ;
V03vinv172u:122_8: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:122_9: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:122_10: iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ prāvikṣāma;
V03vinv172u:122_11: aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caranto:
V03vinv172u:122_13: rājasya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:122_14: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:122_15: devadatto 'pi paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra upaniṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:122_16: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavo devadattasya lābhasatkāraṃ spṛhayata;
V03vinv172u:122_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? vadhāya devadattasya lābhasatkāraḥ;
V03vinv172u:122_19: tadyathā bhikṣavo vadhāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti parābhavāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:122_22: tadyathā vadhāya veṇur naḍaḥ phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:122_28: yāvac ca bhikṣavo devadattasya ayam evaṃrūpo lābhasatkāraḥ utpadyate,
V03vinv172u:122_29: tat kasya bhaviṣyati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya duḥkhāya;
V03vinv172u:122_30: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yal lābhasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:122_31: na ca na utpanno lābhasatkāraḥ cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati;
V03vinv172u:122_33: phalaṃ vai kadalīṃ hanti phalaṃ veṇuṃ phalaṃ naḍam* /
V03vinv172u:122_35: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
V03vinv172u:122_36: hanti bālasya śuklāṃsaṃ mūrdhno 'py asya nipātayat* //
V03vinv172u:122_37: atha devadattasya lābhasatkārābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:122_38: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:122_39: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:122_41: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāram anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:122_42: sahacittotpādāt sa punar devadattas tasya ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:122_43: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇaḥ iti.
V03vinv172u:124_0: Maudgalyāyana informs the Buddha as Devadatta is aiming at the direction of the congregation
V03vinv172u:125_0: tena khalu samayena kakudo bhikṣuḥ kroḍaputro bhagavataḥ śrāvako bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā caturo brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā,
V03vinv172u:125_1: kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya, tadbahulavihārī brahmalokasabhāgatāyām utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:125_2: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhārgaveṣu viharati śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:125_3: atha kakudo brahmā devadattaṃ tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv172u:125_4: tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkucitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv172u:125_5: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkucayed evam eva kakudo brahmā brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya purastād;
V03vinv172u:125_6: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*;
V03vinv172u:125_7: yat khalu bhadanta maudgalyāyana jānīyā devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:125_8: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:125_9: aho (SBV II 74) vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:125_11: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:125_12: sahacittotpādāt sa punas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:125_13: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:125_14: bhadanta sādhu maudgalyāyana [A_452a] yena bahagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeḥ;
V03vinv172u:125_15: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ vistareṇārocayeḥ anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv172u:125_16: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ kakudasya brahmaṇas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:125_17: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:125_18: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ aciraprakrāntaṃ kakudaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:125_19: yathā samāhite citte bhārgeṣv antarhitaḥ rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:125_21: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:125_22: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano yāvān evābhūt kakudena brahmaṇā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ vistareṇārocayati;
V03vinv172u:125_23: evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:125_24: na khalu maudgalyāyana devadattaḥ pūrvam eva cetasā spharitvā viditaḥ? kiṃ tataḥ paścāt kakudena brahmaṇā ārocitam? evaṃ bhadanta iti;
V03vinv172u:125_25: iyaṃ ca punar bhagavata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena sārdham antarākathā viprasṛtā.
V03vinv172u:127_0: Devadatta visits the Buddha and departs indignant
V03vinv172u:128_0: atha devadattaś catubhir bhikṣubhiḥ sahāyakaiḥ kokālikena khaṇḍadravyeṇa kaṭamorakatiṣyeṇa samudradattena ca sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:128_1: adrākṣīd bhagavān devadattaṃ dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:128_2: rakṣedānīṃ maudgalyāyana, rakṣedānīṃ maudgalyāyana, eṣa gacchati devadattaḥ; idānīṃ eṣa mohapuruṣo mama purastād ātmanaivātmānaṃ vyākariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:128_3: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhagavataḥ (SBV II 75) pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:128_4: yathā samāhite citte veṇuvane 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve.
V03vinv172u:128_6: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:128_8: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:128_9: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:128_12: śāriputramaudgalyāyanayos tāvad ahaṃ mohapuruṣa peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāriṇor api bhikṣusaṃghaṃ na pratinisṛjāmi;
V03vinv172u:128_13: kutaḥ punas tvayi nisrakṣyāmi śave kheṭāśake?
V03vinv172u:128_17: tatra devadatto [A_452b] bhagavato 'ntike kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca mānaṃ ca mrakṣaṃ ca āghātaṃ ca akṣāntiṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca prāviṣkārṣīt*;
V03vinv172u:128_18: atha devadatto hum iti kṛtvā triḥ śiraḥ kampayitva bhagavato antikāt prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:130_1: The sermon on the five Teachers
V03vinv172u:131_0: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā ca bhagavantaṃ vījayamānaḥ;

V03vinv172u:133_0: Devadatta decides to bring about schism in the congregation
V03vinv172u:134_2: tiṣṭhate eva śramaṇasya gautamasya samagraṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhetsyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:134_3: cakrabhedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ; tad asmākam abhyatītakālagatānāṃ digvidikṣu udāraḥ kalyāṇaḥ kīrtiśabdaślokaḥ abhyudgamiṣyati;
V03vinv172u:134_4_0: tiṣṭhata eva śramaṇasya gautamasya tāvanmahardhikasya tāvanmahānubhāvasya devadattena kokālikena khaṇḍadravyeṇa kaṭamorakatiṣyeṇa
V03vinv172u:134_4_1: samudradattena samagraḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ bhinnaś cakrabhedaś ca kriyate iti;
V03vinv172u:134_5: te kathayanti: na śakṣyāmo vayaṃ devadatta bhagavataḥ samagraṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhettuṃ;
V03vinv172u:134_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? santy āyuṣman devadatta bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ mahardhikā mahānubhāvā divyacakṣuṣaḥ paracittavidaḥ;
V03vinv172u:134_7: ye dūrād api paśyanti, antike 'pi na dṛśyante; te cetasā cittaṃ spharitvā manasā mano vijānanti;
V03vinv172u:134_8: te asmān parisarpata eva jñāsyanti iti;
V03vinv172u:134_9_0: sa kathayati: asti kokālika upāyaḥ; ete vayaṃ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūn upasaṃkramāmaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ alpotsukhā bhavantu
V03vinv172u:134_9_1: sthavirā vayaṃ sthavirāṇāṃ sarvopakaraṇair avighātaṃ kariṣyāma iti;
V03vinv172u:134_10: navakāṃś ca bhikṣūn upasthāpayāmaḥ upalāḍāyāmaḥ pātreṇa cīvareṇa śikyena saritena kāyabandhanena uddeśena pāṭhena svādhyāyena yogena manasikāreṇa;
V03vinv172u:134_11: asty eṣa āyuṣman devadatta upāya iti;
V03vinv172u:134_12: tatra devadattaḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramitum ārabdhaḥ.
V03vinv172u:136_0: The behaviour of Devadatta is discussed in the congregation
V03vinv172u:137_0: sthavirasthavirair bhikṣubhiḥ parisarpann eva vijñātaḥ devadattaḥ,

V03vinv172u:137_5: ājñāpayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavo devadattaṃ (SBV II 80) meṣakena iti,
V03vinv172u:137_6: yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃjātīyaḥ [A_454a] evaṃ ca punar ājñāpayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:137_7: mā tvaṃ devadatta samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrama;

V03vinv172u:139_0: The behaviour of the four monks followers of Devadatta is discused in the congregation
