V03vinv172u:142_0: The monks inform the Buddha of the result of the motion (jñapti).
V03vinv172u:142_1: Devadatta gets stronger in his resolution to bring about the schism in the congregation
V03vinv172u:143_2: ājñāpyamānas te tad eva vastu sthāmaśaḥ parāmṛśyābhiniviśya anuvyavaharati:
V03vinv172u:143_3: idam eva satyaṃ moham anyad iti;
V03vinv172u:143_5: pratibalo me bhikṣavo devadattaḥ samagraṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhettuṃ cakrabhedaṃ ca kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:143_6: tathā cāsya catvāro bhikṣavaḥ sahāyakāḥ anuvartino vyagravāditāyāṃ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ.
V03vinv172u:143_7: devadattena śrutaṃ vyākṛto 'haṃ śramaṇena gautamena pratibalo me bhikṣavo devadattaḥ samagraṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhettuṃ cakrabhedaṃ ca kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:143_8: tathā cāsya catvāro bhikṣavaḥ sahāyakāḥ anuvartino vyagravāditāyāṃ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:143_11: vyākṛto 'haṃ śramaṇena gautamena pratibalo devadattaḥ samagraṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhettuṃ cakrabhedaṃ ca kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:143_12: tathā cāsya catvāro bhikṣavaḥ sahāyakāḥ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattā iti;
V03vinv172u:143_13: yannv ahaṃ bhūyasyā matrayā saṃghabhedāya parākrameya iti;
V03vinv172u:143_14: sa paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdham ante ārāmasya gaṇabhojanaṃ bhuṅkte;
V03vinv172u:143_16: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? kimarthaṃ tathāgatena trikabhojanam anujñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:143_17: gaṇabhojanaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ? nanu dvāv arthāu saṃpaśyatā,
V03vinv172u:143_18: kulodayatāṃ ca pratītya, pāpecchānāṃ (SBV II 86) ca pudgalānāṃ pakṣapralopanārthaṃ;
V03vinv172u:143_19: mā haiva pāpecchaḥ pudgalaḥ saṃgham evāgamya,
V03vinv172u:143_20: saṃgham evoddiśya, saṃgham evāvedayitvā pāṣaṇḍika iva kṛtvā saṃghenaiva sārdhaṃ vigṛhya vivādaṃ sthāpayet iti.
V03vinv172u:146_0: yadā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena devadattasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:146_1: tadāsau bhikṣubhir ucyate: kasmāt tvayā sthavira devadattasya pāpecchasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ? sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:146_2: nāham āyuṣmanto jāne yathāyaṃ pāpeccha iti;
V03vinv172u:146_3: yadi mayā jñātam abhaviṣyat ṛkāro 'py asya mayā na vyapadiṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat;
V03vinv172u:146_4: prāg eva ṛddher mārgaḥ iti; tato devadattaḥ bhikṣubhiḥ praṇayam āsthāyocyate;
V03vinv172u:146_7: na tvaṃ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmasi iti;
V03vinv172u:146_8: te saṃlakṣayanti: apy eva nāmāyam asmābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmet;
V03vinv172u:146_9: sa evaṃ pratinivartayet iti; sa evaṃ praticoditaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:146_10: kiṃ mama tena kṛtaṃ? nanu mayā vīryam ādhāya,
V03vinv172u:146_11: pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā iti;
V03vinv172u:146_12: sa vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tayā akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:146_13: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:146_14: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:146_15: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ akṛtajñatayā vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:148_0: The story of an out-caste versed in magic and of a brāhmaṇa student
V03vinv172u:149_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:149_1: (SBV II 87) tatra caṇḍālo vidyāmantradharo vidyāmantrakuśalaḥ gāndhārīvidyāṃ parivartya ṛddhyā gandhamādanāt parvatāt akālartukāni puṣpaphalāny ādāya rājñe brahmadattāyopanayati;
V03vinv172u:149_3: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo mantrārthī mantragavaṣī śravaparampayā janapadāt vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_4: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tasya caṇḍālasya vidyāmantradhāriṇaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_5: upasaṃkramya kathayati: icchāmy aham upādhyāyasya śuśrūṣāṃ kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:149_6: na vidyā kasyacid deyā martavyaṃ saha vidyayā /
V03vinv172u:149_7: prayacched vidyayā vidyāṃ śuśrūṣābhir dhanena vā // <iti>
V03vinv172u:149_8: sa kathayati: upādhyāya yady evam ahaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:149_10: dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ śuśrūṣayā dīyeta vā na vā;
V03vinv172u:149_12: tata ārādhanaparamaḥ satkṛtya guruśuśrūṣāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_13: yāvad apareṇa samayenāsau caṇḍālo madyamadākṣipto gṛham āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_14: sa māṇavaḥ saṃlakṣayati; ayam upādhyāyaḥ atīva madyamadākṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_18: māṇavaḥ śrutvā pratibuddhaḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati: upādhyāyaḥ duḥkhaṃ śayiṣyate;
V03vinv172u:149_19: yannv aham aṅgaṇikāyāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ datvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_20: dharmatā hy eṣā śauṇḍānāṃ yo balavāṃs tasya vāntir bhavati;
V03vinv172u:149_23: sa saṃlakṣayati: yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yad upādhyāyaḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pratibuddho na punaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayet;
V03vinv172u:149_25: yāvad caṇḍālaḥ svayam eva pratibuddhaḥ paśyati taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:149_26: tataḥ pṛcchati, ko 'yaṃ; sa kathayati: upādhyāya ahaṃ somaśarmā; vatsa (SBV II 88) kim asy evaṃsthitaḥ? tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:149_27: so 'bhiprasannaḥ kathayati: vatsa parituṣṭo 'haṃ; gatvā snātvā āgaccha; vidyāṃ tubhyam anuprayacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:149_28: somaśarmā āgataḥ; tena tasmai vidyā dattā; capalā brāhmaṇā bhavanti; sa vegam asahamānaḥ cintayati;
V03vinv172u:149_30: tato 'nyatra gamiṣyāmi iti; tena sā vidyā parivartitā; bhavanatalam utpatya, āśv eva gandhamādanaṃ parvataṃ gatvā,
V03vinv172u:149_33: tenāpi rājñe brahmadattāya; rājā kathayati: kutas tavaitāni; sa kathayati: viprakṛṣṭād deśān māṇavo 'bhyāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_34: tenaitāni mama dattāni; sa cātyarthaṃ vidyāmantradhārī akāmakaraṇīyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_35: kim anena caṇḍālena sarvalokapratyākhyātena? tasya vṛttim ācchidya asmai māṇavāya dīyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:149_36: rājā kathayati: evaṃ kāraya iti; tataḥ purohitena caṇḍālād vṛttim ācchidya tasmai brāhmaṇāya dattā;
V03vinv172u:149_37: sa tayā akṛtajñatayā tasya vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:149_38: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau caṇḍālaḥ eṣa evāsau daśabalakāśyapaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:149_39: so 'sau māṇavaḥ eṣa eva asau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:149_41: adyāpy eṣa ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ; tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:149_42: svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ prāg eva prabhūtataram;
V03vinv172u:152_0: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:152_1: magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gayām anuprāptaḥ gayāyāṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:152_2: [A_457a] rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni prāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:152_4: paśya vṛddharājā śramaṇasya gautamasya kīdṛśān kārān karoti;
V03vinv172u:152_6: asmākam api tvayā piṇḍakena avighātaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
V03vinv172u:152_8: devadattasyājātaśatruṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pratimārgaṃ preṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:152_12: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:152_13: paśya bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur apātram apātravarṣī ca iti;
V03vinv172u:152_14: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi, rājā ajātaśatrur apātram apātravarṣī,
V03vinv172u:152_15: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ apātram apātravarṣī;
V03vinv172u:154_0: The story of a mango tree
V03vinv172u:154_1: (concerning a previous birth of prince Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:155_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane ṛṣīṇām āśramapadaṃ,
V03vinv172u:155_3: jaṭāvalkaladhāriṇaḥ, pramuktaphalabhojinaḥ; yāvat tasminn āśramapade āmravṛkṣaḥ phalabhārāvanataśākhaḥ pakvaphalas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:155_4: Ṛśayaḥ phalāni yācante; yā tasmin vṛkṣe adhyuṣitā devatā sā mātsaryābhibhūtā na prayacchati;
V03vinv172u:155_5: tatas te ṛṣayaḥ mūlārthinaḥ ekam ṛṣim āśramapade sthāpayitvā bhrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:155_6: tatsamanantaram eva paṃca coraśatāny āśramapadam anuprāptāni;
V03vinv172u:155_7: tair asau vṛkṣo dattaḥ; te kathayanti: katham asmāt phalāni paribhoktavyāni iti;
V03vinv172u:155_8: corasenāpatiḥ kathayati: vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā mūle chitvā phalāni bhakṣayata iti;
V03vinv172u:155_9: evam ukte devatayā sarvāṇi phalāni bhūmyāṃ pātitāni;
V03vinv172u:155_11: ṛṣaya āgatāḥ pṛcchanti: kena tāny āmraphalāni bhakṣitāni? coraiḥ;
V03vinv172u:155_12: dadāti vṛkṣo na phalaṃ śāntānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ /
V03vinv172u:155_13: dadāti tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ corāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇāṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:155_14: te pṛcchanti: ṛṣe kim etat? tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:155_15: te avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ; mātsaryābhibhūtayā devatayā phalāni ṛṣīṇāṃ na dattāni;
V03vinv172u:155_17: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yāsau devatā eṣa evāsav ajātaśatruḥ tena kālena tena samayena;

V03vinv172u:173_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:173_1: yo 'sau hastināgaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:176_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ mahendrasena nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:176_2: yat kiṃcit svapne paśyati sarvaṃ tat tathaiva bhavati;
V03vinv172u:176_3: tasya ca rājño vijite suvarṇapārśvo nāma bodhisatvaḥ mṛgeṣūpapanno mṛgāṇām adhipatiḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_5: prārthanīyaś ca; yas taṃ paśyati sa nirīkṣamānas tatraiva tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:176_7: sa lubdhakabhayād anyalokabhayāc ca bhītaś carati;
V03vinv172u:176_8: dharmatā hy eṣā aciravyativṛtte lokasanniveśe tiryañco 'pi vākpravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:176_11: bho mātula kasmāt tvam evaṃ bhītabhītaś carasi? iti;
V03vinv172u:176_12: sa kathayati: bhāgineya mamedaṃ rūpaṃ sarvalokaśubhaṃ saṃprārthanīyaṃ ca;

V03vinv172u:176_14: sa kathayati: mamāpy atīvolūkabhayaṃ; tad anyonyaṃ rakṣāṃ kurvaḥ; ahaṃ tvāṃ divā rakṣāmi; tvaṃ māṃ rātrau rakṣa iti; tāv evaṃ kṛtamaryādau vyavasthitau;
V03vinv172u:176_15: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣo dviṣadbhiḥ paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho navāmbupūrṇāyāṃ hemalohyāṃ hemamālinyāṃ śīghrasrotasi nadyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_17: bhavāmi kasya dāso 'haṃ kasya vā paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:176_18: yo me 'dya jīvitaṃ dadyād yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti;

V03vinv172u:176_22: no tu cittena; tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatiḥ kāruṇyād āmreḍitahṛdayaḥ sahasā nadīm avatartum ārabdhaḥ;

V03vinv172u:176_29: tato 'sau puruṣaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ pādayor nipatya taṃ mṛgādhipatim idam avocat:

V03vinv172u:176_35: api tu vatsa idaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:176_36: kṛte pratyupakārāt nāhaṃ tvayā kasyacin nivedyaḥ;

V03vinv172u:176_39_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena candraprabhā devī ratiparikhedakhinnā mahāśayane atyarthaṃ middham avakrāntā rātryāḥ paścime yāme
V03vinv172u:176_39_1: svapnam adrākṣīd atiparamaramaṇīyaśarīraṃ mṛgādhipatiṃ siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:176_40: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyakṣavat svapnadarśanasaṃjanitasaumanasyā laghu laghv eva mahāśayanād utthāya rājño niveditavatī;
V03vinv172u:176_41: śrutvā rājā tasyāḥ satyasvapnāyāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:176_42: aniṣṭagatyupapannena satā kathaṃ nāma siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmo deśayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:176_43: tataś candraprabhā devī priyamadhuracāturyakathāsamudācārayogena muhūrtaṃ rājānam upalāḍya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:176_44: deva kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ tasya mṛgasyānayanāya iti;
V03vinv172u:176_46: bhavanto yāvanto madviṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakās tiṣṭhanti te sarve matsakāśam upaneyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:176_48: devaḥ samājñāpayati madviṣayanivāsibhir mṛgalubdhakair ihāgantavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:176_49: tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvamṛgalubdhakā iha preṣayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:176_50: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ preṣitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_51: amātyai rajñe upanītāḥ; rājā kathayati: bhavanto śrutaṃ mayā madvijite paramaramaṇīyarūpavigraho mṛgo 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:176_52: sa yuṣmābhir mṛduśithilabandhanopanibaddho matsakāśam akhedita upaneyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:176_53: te kathayanti: deva vayaṃ tajjīvina eva; iyatā kālena devasya vijite paryaṭadbhir na kadācid evaṃvidho mṛgavaraḥ śrutapūrvaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_54: kimuta dṛṣṭaḥ tam arhati devaḥ śravaparamparayā samanveṣya amuṣmin deśe tiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv172u:176_55: asmākam ājñātum; evaṃ devasya vayaṃ niyatam ājñāṃ saṃpādayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:176_57: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata samājñāpayati devaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_59: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:176_61: amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:176_62: śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgatāś ca janāḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_63: deva evaṃ samājñāpayati madvijite atiparamaramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir asti;
V03vinv172u:176_64: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:176_68: āhosvit kṛtajñatām? iti; kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya (SBV II 99) nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa kāmanidānotthena dveṣavahnitīvreṇa santāpitahṛdayaḥ saṃlakṣayti:
V03vinv172u:176_69: tiṣṭhatu kṛtajñatā; śatror vairaniryātanāya samupasthitaḥ kālaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_70: kiṃ mayā punas tādṛśī avasthā prāpayitavyā? tasya tāvad vairaniryātanaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:176_71: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ rājñaḥ parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇasya rājakāryam adhitiṣṭhataḥ,
V03vinv172u:176_72: anivārite rājakuladvāre nānāvicitrasurabhipuṣpāṇy ādāya dauvārikāmātyaparaṃparayā rājānaṃ saṃśrāvya parṣadam abhyavagāhya satkāravidhipūrvakeṇa rājño niveditayati:
V03vinv172u:176_73: amuṣmin deśe nānātaruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite viśvastamṛgapakṣiṇi suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir anekamṛgagaṇaparivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:176_74: ahaṃ taṃ devasya atiramaṇīyavigrahaṃ mṛgavaram upadarśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:176_75: tato rājā tacchravaṇasaṃjanitasaumanasyaḥ anekāmātyaśatasahasraparivṛtaḥ kutūhalajātenānyena nānādeśābhyāgatena vārāṇasīnivāsinā ca paurajānapadena saṃpuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:176_76: deśitamārgas tena puruṣeṇa, anupūrveṇa taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_77: yāvad asau kākaḥ bodhisatvasya kṛtāvadhiḥ diśām avalokakaḥ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍavṛkṣaśikhare niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_80: mṛgarāja mayā tvaṃ pūrvam uktaḥ akṛtajñā manuṣyāḥ,
V03vinv172u:176_81: akṛtavedinaḥ, nopakāraṃ manyate iti; ayaṃ sa puruṣo mahatā prābhṛtenāgataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:176_86: kāmaṃ svaprāṇavināśo na tu satvādhyupekṣaṇam iti viditvā rājānaṃ pratyudgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_87: tataḥ sa puruṣo nirghṛṇahṛdayas tyaktaparaloko mṛgadarśanād āvarjitamatis taṃ mṛgavaram ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām upadarśayann āha:
V03vinv172u:176_89: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi na vipākakālam apekṣante;
V03vinv172u:176_90: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tasya puruṣasya ubhau pāṇī pṛthivyāṃ nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:176_91: tataḥ sa rājā saṃvegajātas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān:
V03vinv172u:176_92: bhoḥ puruṣa kim idam? iti; sa duḥkhavedanābhyāhataḥ sagadgadaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:176_93: nāsau coro mahārāja haraty arthaṃ nihatya yaḥ /
V03vinv172u:176_94: sa tu coro mahārāja yasya nāsti kṛtajñatā // (SBV II 100)
V03vinv172u:176_102: tato rājā bodhisatvasya tāṃ prabhāvamahattāṃ jñātvā amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:176_104: gacchata; nagaraśobhāṃ mārgaśobhāṃ ca kārayata iti;
V03vinv172u:176_106: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddham ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭādāmakalāpaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:176_108: evaṃ mārgaśobhā kāritā; vārāṇasīnivasī janakāyaḥ malyopahāraśobhām ādāya pratyudgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_109: tato rājñā asāv atiramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir mahatyā vibhūtyā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ praveśya siṃhāsane niṣāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_110: tato mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena rājā sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadais parivārya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:176_111: atha mṛgādhipatibodhisatvena samantāt tāṃ parṣadam avalokya rājñas tasyāś ca parṣadas tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:176_112: yaṃ śrutvā rājñā saparivāreṇa paṃcaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni;
V03vinv172u:176_116: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:176_117: yo 'sau puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:176_120: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:178_0: The story of a lord of monkeys and of a maker of garlands
V03vinv172u:179_2: sa divā divasam eva nadīpuṣpāṇy (SBV II 101) uccinoti;
V03vinv172u:179_3: yāvad apareṇa samayena nadīm uttaratā āmraphalam uhyamānam anārtavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:179_5: dauvārikeṇa pratīhārāya; pratīhāreṇa rājñe; rājñā devyai; devyā tad āsvāditam; āsvādya rasābhigṛddhayā rājā vijñaptaḥ:
V03vinv172u:179_6: deva īdṛśāny āmraphalāni dātum arhasi iti;
V03vinv172u:179_7_0: rājñā pratīhāraḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: kutas tavāmraphalāni? iti; sa kathayati: dauvārikeṇa dattam iti; dauvārikaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:179_7_1: mālākāreṇa dattam iti; rājā kathayati: bhavanta aāhūyatāṃ mālākāraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:179_8: rājapuruṣair āhūtaḥ; rājā kathayati: mālākāra kutas tvayā āmraphalaṃ labdhaṃ? tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:179_9: rājñā tasyaivājñā dattā: gaccha, tādṛśāny āmraphalāny ānaya iti;
V03vinv172u:179_10: akopyā narādhipāṇām ājñā; sa śaṅkāparihatahṛdayaḥ āmrāṇi samanveṣṭum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_11: tena pūrvakāmraphalānusāreṇa sambalam ādāya gacchatā parvataikadeśe sa āmravṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_12: sa markaṭānāṃ gamyo, na manuṣyāṇāṃ; tataḥ sa mālākāras taṃ vṛkṣam itaś cāmutaś ca nirīkṣate samdhiroḍhuṃ;
V03vinv172u:179_14: tasy tatra āmraphalāśayād bahavo divasā atikrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_15: pathyadanaṃ parikṣīṇaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati: evam ahaṃ pathyadanavirahāt prāṇāir viyokṣye;
V03vinv172u:179_16: yathā vā tathā vā adhiruhāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:179_17: sa pāṣāṇan avalambya avalambya adhiroḍhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_19: tasmiṃś ca parvate vānarabhūto bodhisatvo vānarāṇām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:179_20: daivād asau tasmin parvate yūtham apahāya taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_22: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:179_23: sa tasya hitādhānatatparatayā na śakyate kramam antareṇa uddhartum iti pāṣāṇair abhyāsaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_24: yadāsya parividitaḥ śaknomy aham enam uddhartum iti tadā sa tena prapātāt krameṇoddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_25: pāṣāṇavyāyāmāt tasya ca mālākārasyoddharaṇād atīva pariśrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_27: tenāsu pṛṣṭaḥ; kimarthaṃ tvam evaṃvidhaṃ saṅkaṭam āpannaḥ? iti;
V03vinv172u:179_29: bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati: gato (SBV II 102) 'py ayam āmraphalair vinā anarthaṃ prāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:179_31: anikṣiptotsāhaḥ sa mahātmā parahitādhānatatparaḥ pariśrānto 'pi taṃ vṛkṣam adhiruhya āmraphalāni pātayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_33: utsaṃgaṃ ca pūritaṃ; tadāsau vānarādhipatir avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_35: sa taṃ puruṣam uvāca: bhoḥ puruṣa digavalokanaṃ tāvat kuru;
V03vinv172u:179_36_0: pariśrānto 'smi; muhūrtaṃ svapāmi iti; sa kathayati: evaṃ kuruṣva; sa middham avakrāntaḥ; puruṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati: kṣīṇapathyadano
V03vinv172u:179_36_1: 'haṃ yady āmraphalaṃ bhakṣayan gamiṣyāmi rājñaḥ kiṃ mayā deyaṃ? [A_461b] tasmād etam eva vānaraṃ hatvā śuṇḍīvallūrakāṇi kṛtvā
V03vinv172u:179_37: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena mahatyā śilayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:179_39: ekatyās tu manuṣyāḥ kṛtam upakāraṃ na jānanti //
V03vinv172u:179_40: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau markaṭādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:179_41: yo 'sau mālākaraḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:179_44: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:181_0: The story of a lord of a dārukoṭaka bird and a lion
V03vinv172u:182_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane parvatagiriguhāpravaṇe puṣpaphalasamṛddhe pakṣiṣūpapanno dārukoṭako babhūva;
V03vinv172u:182_1: tasminn eva ca parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgarājaḥ yatheṣṭapracāravihāratayā mṛgān praghātya praghātya bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:182_2: tasyāpareṇa samayena māṃsaṃ bhakṣayataḥ asthi dantāntareṇa praviṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:182_4: āhāram āhartuṃ na śaknoto; daivāt sa dārukoṭako vṛkṣāntarasañcārābhyāsād yasmin pradeśe mṛgādhipatis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_6: uktaś ca: mātula kim asi kāhalaḥ? iti? sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:182_8: kīdṛśaṃ tava duḥkhaṃ? tena vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:182_9: sa kathayati: mātula ahaṃ tava cikitsāṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:182_11: śaktaḥ sarvopakāraṃ kartuṃ; tat tvayā mama kālena kālaṃ yogodvahanaṃ kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:182_12: sa kathayati: evaṃ bhavatu; kariṣyāmi iti; sa dārukoṭakaḥ saṃlakṣayati: tathāsya cikitsāṃ karomi yathā kṛtam api na jānīte;
V03vinv172u:182_13: svasthas tu saṃjānīte; sa tasyācāravihārasamanveṣaṇayā hitādhānatatparas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:182_14: yāvad asau mṛgādhipatiḥ sukhavāyusaṃsparśaviṣkambhitāsyo mahatyāṃ pṛthivīśilāyāṃ vāmapārśvaṃ śirasy ādhāya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_15: tato 'sau dārukoṭakas tasya mṛgādhipates samīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_17: sa saṃlakṣayati: ayaṃ sa kālo 'sya cikitsāyāḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_18: iti viditvā suparīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā dantānataravilagnam asthi pakṣanipātakrameṇa sahasā apakṛṣya mukhavivarān niṣkramya tam eva nirīkṣamāṇo vṛkṣe 'vasthitaḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_19: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatir asthiśalyāpahārasaṃjanitasaumanasyo nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya utthāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_20: athāsau dārukoṭakaḥ taṃ mṛgādhipatiṃ vyapagataduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ viditvā pramuditamanās tatsamīpam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:182_21: mātula idaṃ tad asthi tava duḥkhanimittabhūtam iti;
V03vinv172u:182_22: tato 'sau mṛgādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:182_23: bhāgineya asyopakārasya mayā tavāvaśyaṃ pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkramethāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:182_24: śobhanam eva tathā bhavatu ity uktvā sa dārukoṭakaḥ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:182_25: yāvad apareṇa samayena sa [A_462a] mṛgādhipatir māṃsaṃ bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:182_26: sa ca dārukoṭakaḥ śyenakasya pakṣiṇaḥ kramāntaraparibhraṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:182_27: mṛtam iva ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṣudhāparigatahṛdayaḥ tasya mṛgādhipateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ ārtinivedanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:182_28: mātula kṣudhābhibhūto 'haṃ; māṃsastokaṃ (SBV II 104) prayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:182_30: daṃṣṭrāntarālasaktas tvaṃ jīvan na bahumanyase // iti
V03vinv172u:182_33: naṣṭaṃ kāpuruṣe sevā akṛtajñe ca yat kṛtam // iti
V03vinv172u:182_34: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau dārukoṭakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:182_35: yo 'sau siṃho mṛgarājaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:182_38: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:184_0: The story of a lord of a bear and a poor man
V03vinv172u:185_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:185_2: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_4: tataḥ sa puruṣaḥ yuktaṃ vāyuktaṃ vā idam iti sthānāntarasamanveṣaṇayā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntaraṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:185_5: tathāpy ativṛṣyata eva; sa vṛkṣāntaracāratayā anupūrveṇa parvataguhāṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_7: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_8: ṛkṣaḥ kathayati: vatsa kiṃ trasto 'si; nāsti te matsakāśād bhayaṃ; tiṣṭha iti; sa jātaśaṅko 'pi sādhvasān na śaknoti gantuṃ;
V03vinv172u:185_9: tatas tena ṛkṣeṇa bāhubhyām upagṛhya dhāritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_10: mūlaphalaiś ca santarpitaḥ; saptāhadurdinaṃ ca saṃvṛttaṃ;
V03vinv172u:185_11: varṣaty eva devaḥ, na tiṣṭhati; saptāhasyātyayād aṣṭame divase vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake deve ṛkṣeṇa caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya prabhūtāni mūlaphalāni datvā sa puruṣaḥ abhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:185_12: vatsa apetaṃ durdinaṃ; vybhraṃ dinaṃ; vigatabalāhako devaḥ; yathāsukhaṃ gaccha iti; sa puruṣaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:185_13: tāta gacchāmi; api tu mayā tava pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:185_14: sa kathayati (SBV II 105) vatsa etad eva me kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv172u:185_15: yathā māṃ na kasyacin nivedayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:185_16: sa kathayati: tāta evaṃ bhavatu utu; sa taṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayor nipatya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_17: sa ca vārāṇasīṃ praviśati; anyatamaś ca mṛgalubdhako mṛgavadhāya nirgacchati;
V03vinv172u:185_18: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ uktaś ca: mitra tvam iyatā kālena ihāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_19: putradāraṃ te viklavībhūtam; atīva virauti: tvaṃ kilākālasāptāhikameghena śvāpadena vā praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:185_23: sa kathayati: vayasya kāmaṃ yena vā tena vā jīvikaṃ kalpayāmi,
V03vinv172u:185_25: sa tena tathā tathā pratilobhito māṃsapratyaṃśadvayena yathā pratipanno mārgam upadarśayan saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_26: yāvad anupūrveṇa [A_462b] guhām anuprāptaḥ yatrāsau mahātmā ṛkṣas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:185_27: tato nairghṛṇyam āsthāya akṛtajñatāṃ ca kathayati:
V03vinv172u:185_29: tatas tena lubdhena paraprāṇoparodhinā guhāyām agnir dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_30: atha sa mahātmā ṛkṣo dhūmavyākulīkṛtamanā aśruparyākuleṣaṇo gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:185_31: kasya kiṃ vyapanītaṃ me vasatā girigahvare /
V03vinv172u:185_35: ity uktvā kālagataḥ; tatas tair viśasyamāṃsasya bhāgān kṛtvā sa kṛtaghnapuruṣo 'bhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:185_38: pṛthivyāṃ nipatitau; tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā hā kaṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭam ity uktvā svakān api pratyaṃśān parityajya prakrāntam;
V03vinv172u:185_39: etad atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyas tasmin pradeśe sannipatitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_42: tato rājā brahmadattas tasya carma gṛhītva vismayotphullalocanaḥ (SBV II 106) etam arthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāya nivedayāmīti taṃ saṃghārāmaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_43: carma puṣkariṇyāṃ sthāpayitvā vṛddhānte niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃghasyaitam arthaṃ vistareṇa rocayati;
V03vinv172u:185_46: pūjanīyas tribhir lokaiḥ tvayāpy eṣa narottama // iti
V03vinv172u:185_47: rājā saṃlakṣayati: kartavyāsya pūjeti; bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti: deva bhadrakalpiko 'yaṃ bodhisatvaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_48: saṃvidhātavyāsya pūjā iti; tato rājā brahmadattaḥ sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhāny ādāya taṃ pradeśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_49: sarvaṃ tan māṃsam asthi kalebaraṃ ca ekadhye kārayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:185_50: bhavantaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:185_51: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:185_53: mahaś ca prasthāpitam –Ed. pratisthāpitam–; yaiś ca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ te sarve mokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ.
V03vinv172u:185_54: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:185_55: yo 'sāv akṛtajñaḥ puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:185_58: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:187_0: Another story of a bear of a poor man
V03vinv172u:188_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:188_2: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_3: tatparvatapradeśe vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhe aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ ṛkṣeṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_4: yāvad asau kāṣṭhahārakaḥ kāṣṭhāni paryeṣamāṇaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe vyāghreṇābhidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_5: maraṇabhayabhīto daivāt taṃ (SBV II 107) vṛkṣam abhirūḍho yasminvṛkṣe sa ṛkṣo bodhisatvas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:188_8: sa ca vyāghra āhāragṛddhas taṃ vṛkṣatalaṃ naiva muñcati;
V03vinv172u:188_9: kathayati [A_463a] ca: bho mahātmann ete manuṣyāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ akṛtajñāḥ bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:188_10: pātayainaṃ; bhakṣayitvā gacchāmi iti; prāyaḥ śaraṇāgatavatsalā anya 'pi manuṣyāḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_11: prāgeva bodhisatvāḥ; sa kathayati: mamāyaṃ śaraṇāgataḥ; nāham etaṃ pātayāmi iti; tathāpy asau vyāghraḥ māṃsaśoṇitābhilāṣī tiṣṭhaty eva;
V03vinv172u:188_12: na tasmād viprakrāmati; athāsau ṛkṣas taṃ puruṣam āha:
V03vinv172u:188_13: śrānto 'haṃ; tvaṃ tāvat tiṣṭha; ahaṃ viśramāmi iti; sa tasyotsaṅganiṣaṇṇaḥ śramakheditapariṣrāntaś ca middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_14: sa vyāhgraḥ kathayati: bhoḥ puruṣa kiyantaṃ kālaṃ tvayātra sthātavyaṃ? pātayainaṃ;
V03vinv172u:188_15: bhakṣayitvā gamiṣyāmi: iti; sa nirghṛṇahṛdayaḥ pāpakarmā tyaktaparalokaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:188_16: śobhanam eṣa kathayati; kiyantaṃ kālaṃ mayātra sthātavyaṃ? pātayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:188_17: sa tena pātitaḥ; tena mahātmanā patatābhihitaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi ity uktvā patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_19: sa tasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:188_21: yenaivaṃ kathayati iti; tasya tṛṣṇāndhasya pralāpo lagnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_23: hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:188_24: sa jñātibhir gṛhaṃ nītaḥ; pralapaty eva na santiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:188_25: te vidyāmantradhāriṇo bhūtacikitsakān anyāṃś ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān suhṛtsambandhibāndhavān pṛcchati;
V03vinv172u:188_26_0: te bahudhā kathayanti; na kaścit cikitsāṃ karoti; tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre āśramapade vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite
V03vinv172u:188_27: tasya puruṣasya jñātayas taṃ puruṣan ādāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:188_28: maharṣe ayam asmākaṃ jñātiḥ; muhur muhur evaṃ pralapati; kim asya kartavyam iti; pāpakārī ayaṃ satvaḥ; anena durātmanā kṛtopakārī bodhisatvo vyāghrasya purastāt pātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:188_29: tena mahātmanā cintitam asmai dharmaṃ deśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:188_30: so 'nena pātitaḥ; tasya patato bhrāntasya daśānāṃ ślokānām ekaikam akṣaraṃ pratibhātaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:188_32: upādhyāya kathayasva tāvat kīdṛśas te ślokāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:188_33: sa ṛṣir anupūrveṇa tān ślokān kathayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:188_34: hā kāṣṭaṃ bata loke 'smin adharmaḥ khalu dāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:188_35: asaty eṣu manuṣyeṣu hiṃsā mitreṣu vidyate // 1 //
V03vinv172u:188_36: naivāsane na śayane nāpi caiva ca caṅkrame /
V03vinv172u:188_37: na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ mitradruk sukham edhate // 2 //
V03vinv172u:188_38: vāṇī te karuṇārttena tatā yā caiva bhāṣitā /
V03vinv172u:188_39: sā tvāṃ dahati durbuddhe khāṇḍavaṃ jvalitaṃ yathā // 3 //
V03vinv172u:188_40: tena hi tvaṃ pare loke 'nubhaviṣyasi vedanām //
V03vinv172u:188_42: hā heti krandamānas tvaṃ raurave bhṛśadāruṇe /
V03vinv172u:188_44: kiṃ te na prakṛtaṃ karma raudrasyāśubhakarmaṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:188_46: cittaṃ pāpaṃ vyavasyanti dharmalopo [A_463b] hi dhāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:188_47: smara ṛkṣaṃ ca vyāghraṃ ca yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ tvayā // 7 //
V03vinv172u:188_48: durbuddhe tvaṃ na jānīṣe yathā mitreṣu vartitum /
V03vinv172u:188_49: hantāraṃ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati // 8 //
V03vinv172u:188_50: sevitas tvaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ prāpte vyāghramahābhaye /
V03vinv172u:188_51: rakṣitaś ca śayānas tvaṃ tvayāsau kiṃ na rakṣitaḥ // 9 //
V03vinv172u:188_54: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo? yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:188_55: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥ satvaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:188_58: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:190_0: The story of the king Śibi
V03vinv172u:191_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo śibighoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śibir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ (SBV II 109) cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:191_1: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgi nissaṅgaparityāgī mahati ca tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:191_2: tasya nāsti kiṃcid adattam aparityaktaṃ yaduta śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo vaṇīpakebhyaḥ adhvagebhyaḥ yācanakebhyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:191_3: yadbhūyasā tu glānebhyaḥ ācaritaṃ tasya rājñaḥ;
V03vinv172u:191_4: kālyam evotthāya mātāpitarāv abhivādya glānāvalokyanaṃ kṛtvā arthādhikaraṇe niṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:191_6: sa sarvavaidyapratyākhyāto nirapekṣo jīvite maraṇābhimuktaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaḥ śibighoṣāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:191_7_0: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukākokilajīvañjīvonnādite
V03vinv172u:191_8: sa ca vyādhitas tīvrarujopatāpasaṅjanitadaurmanasyo muhuḥ śvāsoparudhhyamānatanur aśruparyākulekaṇo daṇḍapāṇiḥ śanaiḥ śanai rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:191_11: prayaccha jīvitam iti; tataḥ śibirājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tatra eva pratinivṛttaḥ amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:191_13: tais sarve vaidyā āhūtāḥ; rājña upanītāḥ; tato rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ śabdayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:191_16: deva yaḥ puruṣaḥ janmano na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvaḥ tasya rudhireṇa yavāgūṃ sādhayitvā yadi bhojyate,
V03vinv172u:191_17: evam ayaṃ svasthībhavati; nānyathā iti; śrutvā rājā saṃlakṣayati: kiṃ mamānena evaṃvidhena jīvitena,
V03vinv172u:191_18: rājyaiśvaryādhipatyena vā? īdṛśena yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śaknomi śāntiṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:191_19: evaṃ vicintya rājā svasantatiṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:191_20: tena dhātrī pṛṣṭā: amba asty ahaṃ kasyacid ruṣitapūrvaḥ? sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:191_21: deva yadā [A_464a] tvaṃ mamāṃsagatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:191_22: prāgeva tvam iti; tato mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:191_23: putra yadā tvaṃ mama kukṣigatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā,
V03vinv172u:191_24: prāgeva tvam iti; rājā kathayati: idānīṃ saṃpannaṃ bhaiṣajyam iti;
V03vinv172u:191_25: tena vaidyā uktāḥ: mama paṃcasu gātreṣu śirāṃ (SBV II 110) muñcata iti;
V03vinv172u:191_26: te kathayanti: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣasyārthāya devasya kāye śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:191_27: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:191_28: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:191_29: rudhirasya karparaḥ pūrṇaḥ; tataḥ peyā sādhayitvā dattā; anuraktapaurajānapadaḥ sa rājā;
V03vinv172u:191_32: kathaṃ nāma ekasya prākṛtasatvasyārthāya iyantaḥ satvāḥ parityajyante? iti;
V03vinv172u:191_34: tad anenopāyena ṣaṇ māsān paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:191_35: yavāgūṃ bhojitaḥ; rājñaḥ śibeḥ taccharīraṃ cālanīsadṛśaṃ saṃvṛttam;
V03vinv172u:191_36: ojaḥ parihātum ārabdhaḥ; śuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:191_38: na śobhanaṃ; te tasya pratyaham oja upaharanti,
V03vinv172u:191_39: yenāsau yāpayati; yadā tasya puruṣasya vyādhir upaśāntaḥ,
V03vinv172u:191_40: tadā śibinā rājñā paṃcabhir grāmavaraiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:191_43: śibinā rājñā paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:191_44: svarudhireṇa glānasya iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:191_45: sa ca svasthīkṛtaḥ iti; tataḥ kutūhalajātaḥ satvā āgamya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchanti:
V03vinv172u:191_46: bhoḥ puruṣa satyaṃ tava kila śibinā rājñā iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtam? iti;
V03vinv172u:191_47: sa kathayati: kiṃ mamānena kṛtaṃ? duṣṭaśoṇitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vā choryeta anyasya vā dīyeta,
V03vinv172u:191_48: kim atra āścaryam iti; vaco 'vasānasamanantaram evāsya gṛhe agnir nipatitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:191_49: yenāsya gṛhaṃ sarvaṃ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhaṃ.
V03vinv172u:191_50: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo? yo 'sau śibī rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:191_51: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥpuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:191_54: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:194_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:194_1: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:194_2: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ (SBV II 111) kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:194_3: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:194_4: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāso [A_464b] sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
V03vinv172u:194_6: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:194_8: amātyāḥ kathayanti: devāsya janmani anekāni kalyāṇasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni;
V03vinv172u:194_9: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalyāṇakārīti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:194_12: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:194_13: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:194_14: bhūyaḥ sa rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:194_15: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:194_16: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:194_17: dārako jātaḥ; tasyāpi janmani akalyāṇasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni;
V03vinv172u:194_20: kalyāṇakārī kumāro maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatveṣu dayāvān dānarucir dānābhirataḥ;
V03vinv172u:194_22: sa pitrā ucyate: putra mā tvaṃ satataṃ dānam anuprayaccha;
V03vinv172u:194_23: kuto 'smākam etāvad dhanajātaṃ bhaviṣyati yannv aham anvaham evaṃ dāsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:194_24: dharmatā hy eṣā dātur dānapater yad bahujanasya priyo bhavati manāpaś ca;
V03vinv172u:194_26: tasyānyatareṇa bhūmyantareṇa rājñā guṇamāhātmyaṃ śrutvā duhitā dattā;
V03vinv172u:194_28: kalyāṇakārī kathayati: na tāvad ahaṃ bhāryopādānaṃ karomi,

V03vinv172u:197_92: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ rājā sarvāḥ striyo jugupsate;
V03vinv172u:197_93: na paśyatīmāṃ satīṃ pativratāṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhenādāya paribhramatīm iti;
V03vinv172u:197_95: rājñā ca saṃlakṣitaṃ; sa kathayati: āhūyatāṃ sā strī paśyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:197_97: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā //

V03vinv172u:197_99: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā // iti
V03vinv172u:197_100: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;

V03vinv172u:200_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyām viśvāmitro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ
V03vinv172u:200_2: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_3: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:200_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:200_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:200_6: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_7: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:200_9: jñātaya ūcuḥ; ayaṃ dārako viśvāmitrasya rājñaḥ putraḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_10: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viśvantara iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:200_12: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikadhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:200_13: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:200_14: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:200_15_0: yāni tāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ [A_468a] janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam
V03vinv172u:200_15_1: abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ (SBV II 120) pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau
V03vinv172u:200_15_2: dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe
V03vinv172u:200_15_3: śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_16_0: viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ
V03vinv172u:200_16_1: sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:200_17: tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād api arthinaḥ abhyāgacchanti;
V03vinv172u:200_19_1: pavanabalasamajavaiḥ kanakarajatamaṇighaṇṭikāvighūrṇitaravaiḥ caturbhis turagair yuktaṃ syandanavaram abhiruhya nagarād udyānābhimukho
V03vinv172u:200_20: atha kecid viprā vedavedāṅgavido viśvantaram abhigamyocuḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_22: sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
V03vinv172u:200_23: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
V03vinv172u:200_24: ity evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ laghu laghv eva tasmād rathād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram upadarśayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_25: yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
V03vinv172u:200_26: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām // (SBV II 121)
V03vinv172u:200_27_1: rājavardhanaṃ nāma gajavaram abhiruhya parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiḥ candra iva nakṣatragaṇaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃprāpte
V03vinv172u:200_28: atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprās tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantaraṃ kumāram abhigamya ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:200_31: dātum etaṃ gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:200_32: evam uktaś ca bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghu laghv eva avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_33: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
V03vinv172u:200_34: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
V03vinv172u:200_35: śuśrāva ca rājā viśvāmitraḥ: putreṇa ca tebhyo viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo dattaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:200_36: [A_468b] śrutvā ca punaḥ rājñā visvāmitreṇa kopakupitena viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:200_37: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:200_38: tato viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ pitrā parityaktaḥ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:200_39: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktaḥ
V03vinv172u:200_40: tad gṛhe vartamānena dānaṃ deyaṃ yathābalam /
V03vinv172u:200_41: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśritya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
V03vinv172u:200_42: tad ahaṃ gṛham utsṛjya prayāsyāmi tapovanam /
V03vinv172u:200_43: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_44: athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśam abhigamya etad vistareṇa nivedayāmāsa;
V03vinv172u:200_45: tataḥ sā mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva (SBV II 122) priyaviprayogāśaṅkitahṛdayā kṛtakarapuṭā bodhisatvam uvāca:
V03vinv172u:200_46: āryaputra yady evam aham api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:200_47: na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:200_48: gaganam iva candrahīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
V03vinv172u:200_49: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā bhavet tathā nārī // iti
V03vinv172u:200_50: bodhisatva uvāca: avaśyam āvayor ante viyogena bhavitavyam,
V03vinv172u:200_51: eṣa lokasvabhāvaḥ; tvaṃ ca pravarānnapānaśayanāsanasaṃvasanopacitā paramasukumāraśarīrā;
V03vinv172u:200_57: tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:200_58: tatra bhavatyā na kiṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_59: tat punar api tāvat saṃpradhāryatām iti;
V03vinv172u:200_60: mādrī kathayati: āryaputra yathāśaktyā aham āryaputram anuvartiṣye iti;
V03vinv172u:200_61: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñā iti;
V03vinv172u:200_62: tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram upagamya mūrdhnā ca praṇipatyovāca
V03vinv172u:200_63: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
V03vinv172u:200_64: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūt // iti
V03vinv172u:200_66: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti;
V03vinv172u:200_68: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteya mahīpate //
V03vinv172u:200_69: ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ; tataḥ putraduhitṛkalatrasahitaḥ śokotkaṇṭhaḥ paurajānapadasahasrair anugamyamānaḥ tasmān nagarān nirjagāma;
V03vinv172u:200_70: kaścit puruṣaḥ taṃ rudanaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā anyataraṃ puruṣam uvāca:
V03vinv172u:200_71: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanasya ruditaśabdaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:200_72: sa uvāca: kiṃ bhavān na jānīte (SBV II 123)
V03vinv172u:200_76: paurāḥ sametya subhṛśaṃ karuṇaṃ rudanti // iti
V03vinv172u:200_77: tato bodhisatvas tasmān nagarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyyam abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:200_78: nivartantu bhavantaḥ; suciram api hi priyasaṃyogo bhūtvā avaśyam evānte [A_469a] viprayogāvasānaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_80: sarveṣu lokeṣv avaśasya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavantīti matvā /
V03vinv172u:200_81: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakampyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_82: atha triṃśadyojanātikrāntaṃ bodhisatvam avekṣya anyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:200_85: tad arhati bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:200_86: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_87: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajam /
V03vinv172u:200_88: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute // iti
V03vinv172u:200_89: bodhisatva uvāca: na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ; kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:200_90: yady ete na bhaveyur artharucayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
V03vinv172u:200_91: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
V03vinv172u:200_93: dānādyābhir avāpnuvanti niyataṃ sarvajñatām uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:200_94: tato bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ pareṇa harṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvā uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_95: anena mātsaryamalapravāhinā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija / (SBV II 124)
V03vinv172u:200_96: maharṣibhiḥ sadbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_97: tato viśvantaraḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau;
V03vinv172u:200_99: tato viśvantaras tasmiṃs tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra;
V03vinv172u:200_105: tadarthaṃ bālakāv etau mama tvaṃ dātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:200_106: evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati muhūrtaṃ cintāparo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:200_109: yathā śibiḥ śruto nityaṃ tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:200_110: evam ukto bodhisatvas taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca: bho mahābrāhmaṇa
V03vinv172u:200_112: kiṃ punaḥ svasutatyāge mama syān matir anyathā //
V03vinv172u:200_116: mā bhūd vaktā ca me kaścit kumārau nirghṛṇo bhṛśam /
V03vinv172u:200_117: bālau tyajati nātmānaṃ sādhu brāhmaṇa māṃ naya // iti
V03vinv172u:200_119_0: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra naitad bhavataḥ pratirūpaṃ mahati rājavaṃśe prasūtasya sarvasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ khyātayaśasaḥ sarvaprāṇiṣu
V03vinv172u:200_119_2: sarvamanorathaparipūrakasya amoghadarśanasya yat mama vandhyam āgamanaṃ bhavet,
V03vinv172u:200_120: mogho vā mārgaśramaḥ nirarthakaṃ vā darśanam;
V03vinv172u:200_121: aphalā sā āśā cirakālāśāsito vā cetasy āśāsakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_122: tat śighraṃ saṅkkalpaturagasya manorathasya tadvacananāstikyapratyāhatasya me nirvṛttir bhavet;
V03vinv172u:200_123: tad arhati bhavān paripūrṇamanorathaṃ māṃ visarjayituṃ kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:200_127: na tava sudaṃṣṭra samo 'sti dānaśaktyā // iti
V03vinv172u:200_128: athaitad vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasyopaśrutya viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ imāṃ cintām āpede tanayasnehaviklavaḥ
V03vinv172u:200_130: prāpsyāmy ahaṃ ca mādrī ca duḥkhaṃ putraviyogajam //
V03vinv172u:200_133: kāmaṃ putraviyogārto bhuvi śokaṃ vrajāmy aham /
V03vinv172u:200_134: bhagnapratijño na tv eva bhaviṣyāmi kṣatavrataḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_135: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati kṛtaniścaya uvāca: eṣa bho
V03vinv172u:200_136: lokaṃ duḥkhamāharṇave pratibhaye majjantam ārtaṃ bhṛśam
V03vinv172u:200_139: bālāv aśrujalāmbupūrṇanayanau viprāya tasmai dadau // (SBV II 126)
V03vinv172u:200_142: tārayeyam ahaṃ tena lokaṃ saṃsārasāgarāt // iti
V03vinv172u:200_143: dattamātrayoś ca punas tayor bāladārakayoḥ iyaṃ ca vasumatī ṣaḍvikāraṃ cacāla;
V03vinv172u:200_144: tatas tena bhūmikampena tadvanavāsinas tāpasāḥ saṃtrastāḥ anyonyam ūcuḥ
V03vinv172u:200_146: jñatavyam iha suvyaktaṃ prabhāvaḥ kasya īdṛśaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_148: sa teṣām ṛṣīṇām etam arthaṃ nivedayāmāsa
V03vinv172u:200_152: viśvantaras tyajati kampati yena bhūmiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_153: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:200_156: ambā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
V03vinv172u:200_157: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān // iti
V03vinv172u:200_158: tato bodhisatvaḥ snehaviklavaḥ sāśrudurdinanayanaḥ tau bāladārakau [A_470a] parityajyovāca:
V03vinv172u:200_159: na me hṛdayam asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇam /
V03vinv172u:200_161: apy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
V03vinv172u:200_163: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgam avagamya karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
V03vinv172u:200_164: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
V03vinv172u:200_165: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum amba tvam arhasi // iti (SBV II 127)
V03vinv172u:200_167: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabhāvāt
V03vinv172u:200_168: yady apriyaṃ vacanam anyad udāhṛtaṃ vā /
V03vinv172u:200_169: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca paripūritam eva na syāt
V03vinv172u:200_171: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanalālasau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramād viniścakrāmatuḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_172: tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapovanaparṇakuṭīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_173: niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca bāladārakayoḥ ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_174: anekaiś ca devatāsahasraiḥ hāhākṛtam antarikṣaṃ babhūva
V03vinv172u:200_175: aho pradānamāhātmyam aho khalv asya niścayaḥ /
V03vinv172u:200_176: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_177: tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāya āśramābhimukhī saṃprasthitā;
V03vinv172u:200_178: tena ca mahatā bhūmikampena tvaritam āśramapadaṃ pratasthe;
V03vinv172u:200_179: anyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyāvasthitā,
V03vinv172u:200_180: mā haiva mādrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:200_191: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:200_192: tato mādrī nimittāny apraśastānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:200_194: yathā vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vikrośanaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:200_195: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:200_196: dhruvaṃ tau bālakau tyaktau yathā me matir utsukā //
V03vinv172u:200_197: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkampo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
V03vinv172u:200_198: vyaktau tau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati // iti
V03vinv172u:200_199: sā evam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:200_201: na paśyati putrakau; tato viklavahṛdayā vepamānā asthānapadānusāraṃ vikalpayati:
V03vinv172u:200_202: asmin pradeśe jālinaḥ kumāraḥ sahabhaginyā mṛgapotakair [A_470b] abhīkṣṇaṃ krīḍitavān;
V03vinv172u:200_204_0: imāni ca tayoḥ krīḍanakāni; tau tu na paśyāmi; atha vā ambā na dṛśyate iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ ity evam
V03vinv172u:200_204_1: āśaṅkāparigatahṛdayā sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchati:
V03vinv172u:200_207: tasya tau dārakau dattau tvam anujñātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:200_208: athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta;
V03vinv172u:200_209: jalāśayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ karoti sma;
V03vinv172u:200_215: kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
V03vinv172u:200_219: vrajatas tasya vaśe na duḥkhitau // (SBV II 129)
V03vinv172u:200_244: tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāyapālitakās tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
V03vinv172u:200_249: punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakān āśramavāsino mṛgaśābakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ vacanam uvāca (SBV II 130)
V03vinv172u:200_254: tato yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny anṛjukāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca [A_471a]
V03vinv172u:200_261: tato bodhisatvas tāṃ tathā paridevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_262: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
V03vinv172u:200_263: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
V03vinv172u:200_265: prāpnuvanti mahāsatvāḥ śibivad bodhim uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:200_268: dadyāṃ svān dārān vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ
V03vinv172u:200_269: sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // iti
V03vinv172u:200_270: atha mādrī dhairyam ālambya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_271: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
V03vinv172u:200_272: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ prayaccha mām //
V03vinv172u:200_275: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tārayan hi bhavāj jagat // iti
V03vinv172u:200_276_0: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ ca mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam āgamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ upari
V03vinv172u:200_276_1: (SBV II 131) vihāyasā tadāśramapadam upagamya udāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_279: tvam eko niḥsaṅgas tyajasi tanayān snehajanakān
V03vinv172u:200_280: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalavirajaṃ prāpsyasi padam // iti
V03vinv172u:200_281: tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:200_284: tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_288: nirlajjaś cāpi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:200_289: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām // iti
V03vinv172u:200_290: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_292: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
V03vinv172u:200_293: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:200_300: idam asmin vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
V03vinv172u:200_302: iti viditvā mādrīpāṇau gṛhitvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_304: mama bhāryām imām iṣṭāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama // iti
V03vinv172u:200_306: ṣaḍvikārā mahī kṛtsnā cacālāmbuni naur yathā //
V03vinv172u:200_307: tato mādrī bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhā brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛrahitā idam abhravīt
V03vinv172u:200_308: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
V03vinv172u:200_309: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
V03vinv172u:200_310: tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_311: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
V03vinv172u:200_312: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
V03vinv172u:200_314: tad brūhi kiṃ varam ihecchasi matsakāśāt // iti
V03vinv172u:200_318: tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramapadaṃ praviśya bodhisatvam upajagmivān;
V03vinv172u:200_319: mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhitvā bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:200_320: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
V03vinv172u:200_321: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_322: tato śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigrahītāraṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathā anyanagaraśaṅkayā tad eva nagaram upetya tau bāladārakau vikretum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_324: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
V03vinv172u:200_325: jālinaṃ caiva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte sudāruṇaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:200_330: yāvad anyenāmātyena rājñaḥ sakāśam upanītau (SBV II 133)
V03vinv172u:200_337: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam // iti
V03vinv172u:200_338: tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasya svabhavanam upajagāma;
V03vinv172u:200_339: paścāc ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadāśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān;
V03vinv172u:200_341: sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:200_347: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmin loke paratra ca // iti
V03vinv172u:200_348: yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_350: yā ca kācit tava śrīr asau viśvantaraṃ kumāram āgamya iti;
V03vinv172u:200_351: sa kathayati: kiṃ mama viśvantareṇa kṛtam uttamavarṇaprasūto 'haṃ;
V03vinv172u:200_352: dakṣiṇīyo lokasya; yena mama bhogā upanamanti iti
V03vinv172u:200_353: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:200_354: yo 'sau jujjukaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:200_357: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśyayiṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:200_358: prāg eva prabhūtaṃ; ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam (SBV II 134)
V03vinv172u:203_1: tena khalu samayena campāyāṃ potalo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:203_2: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:203_4: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:203_5: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:203_6: sā upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇaiḥ uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ vaidyaprajñaptair āhāraiḥ,
V03vinv172u:203_7: nātitiktaiḥ nātyamlaiḥ nātilavaṇaiḥ nātimadhuraiḥ nātikaṭukaī nātikaṣāyaiḥ tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukaṣāyavivarjitaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_8: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī apsarā iva nandane vane vicāriṇī maṃcān maṃcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmiṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_9: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad garbhasya paripākāya
V03vinv172u:203_10: tena khalu samayena potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:203_11: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt śravaṇe nakṣatre prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:203_13: tasya pādatalayor adhastāt caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi suvarṇavarṇavarṇāni jātāni;
V03vinv172u:203_14: yāvat potalakasya gṛhapateḥ svamanuṣyaḥ tvaritatvaritaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ,
V03vinv172u:203_16: gṛhapate diṣṭyā vardhase putras te jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:203_17: sa prītisaumanasyajātaḥ bhūyaḥ pṛcchati kiṃ kathayasi gṛhapate putras te jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_19: atha tasya puruṣasyaitad abhavat kim ayaṃ gṛhapatir bhūyo bhūyaḥ pṛcchati? mā māṃ pralāpayitukāmaḥ iti viditvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_20: gṛhapatiḥ kathayati: bhoḥ puruṣa kṣūṇas tvaṃ; yadi tvayā śatam api vāṅ niścāritābhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:203_21: mayāpi tava mukhaṃ suvarṇasya pūritam abhaviṣyat iti;
V03vinv172u:203_22: tataḥ potalakena gṛhapatinā tasya puruṣasya trīn vārān suvarṇena mukhaṃ [A_472b] pūritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_23: koṣṭhāgārikasya ca sandiṣṭaṃ dārakasyāvalehikāmūlyaṃ viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭīr dehi iti
V03vinv172u:203_24: potalako gṛhapatiḥ prītamanāḥ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ deva putro me jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:203_25: rājā kathayati: śobhanam eva; dadāmy (SBV II 135) ahaṃ tasya campāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saptahastikaṃ dānīyam iti;
V03vinv172u:203_26: potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājānaṃ bimbisāram avalokya campām āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_27: tato gṛhapater jñātayaḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:203_28: anye kathayanti: ayaṃ dārakaḥ śravaṇanakṣatre jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_29: pitrā cāsya janmani viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭyaḥ avalehikāmūlyaṃ dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_30: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:203_31: tasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_33: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_34: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:203_35: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_36: uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_37: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu udghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_38: tasya puṇyamaheśākhyatāṃ śrutvā samānakulīnair bahubhir dārikā dattāḥ;
V03vinv172u:203_39: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_40: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_41: trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyaiṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasaṃ;
V03vinv172u:203_42: sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:203_43: tasya dine dine paṃcaśatikāḥ pāko bhojanārthaṃ sādhyate
V03vinv172u:205_0: Ajātaśatru, impelled by Devadatta, seeks to take his father King Bimbisāra's life but fails in the attempt
V03vinv172u:206_1: kumāra sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ yadā śirasi palitaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V03vinv172u:206_2: tadā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ (SBV II 136) rājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpya pravrajanti;
V03vinv172u:206_3: bhavataḥ pituḥ keśās tṛtīyaṃ varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:206_4: tathāpi kāmeṣv adhyavasita eva nopaśamaṃ gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:206_5: ajātaśatruḥ kathayati: kim asya karomi iti; devadattaḥ kathayati parākramasva iti;
V03vinv172u:206_7: yāvad rājā bimbisāro bhagavato ghṛtapītasya maṇḍaṃ pātukāmasya maṇḍam adhiṣṭhāya veṇuvanaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:206_8: ajātaśatruṇā dṛṣṭaḥ; tena kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ; rājā śabde kṛtāvī, tena tasya maṇḍasthālī bhagnā;
V03vinv172u:208_0: The Buddha, desiring to convert Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa,
V03vinv172u:208_1: sends Maudgalyāyana to him, who appears to him in the orb of the sun,
V03vinv172u:208_2: and talks to him of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:209_0: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:209_2: vinipātito maudgalyāyana ajātaśatruṇā akalyāṇamitropagūḍhena tathāgatasya piṇḍapātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:209_3: gaccha campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya sakāśāt piṇḍapātam ādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:209_4: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte rājagṛhe 'ntarhitaś campāyāṃ pratyaṣṭhāt;
V03vinv172u:209_6: sa dine dine kālyam evotthāya ādityaṃ namasyati;
V03vinv172u:209_7: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyayānaḥ ṛddhyā ādityamaṇḍalaṃ bhitvā avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:209_8: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:209_9: pratyakṣam evāham ādityaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:209_13: syāt kiṃ nv ayaṃ dinakaro dhanadaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
V03vinv172u:209_15: āyuṣmān api mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 137)
V03vinv172u:209_17: nāhaṃ vaiśravaṇo cāsmi bhagavān nāsmīśvaras suvrataḥ /
V03vinv172u:209_18: putraṃ mām avagaccha śāntamanaso buddhasya dīptaujasaḥ
V03vinv172u:209_19: bhaikṣārthaṃ tu tavāham abhyupagataḥ piṇḍena kāryaṃ punaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:209_20: śroṇaḥ kathayati: kiṃ bhavān muniḥ? sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:209_21: meruṃ prāpya yathā hi kāṃcanagiriṃ syāt sarṣapo 'bhyāgataḥ
V03vinv172u:209_22: sūryaṃ prāpya yathā bhavec ca tulitaḥ khadyotajantuḥ kṣitau /
V03vinv172u:209_23: ratnāḍhyaṃ ca sametya sāgaram iha syād goṣpadaṃ saṃsṛtam
V03vinv172u:209_24: buddhaṃ prāpya tathā narottamaguruṃ māṃ viddhi śāstātmajam // iti
V03vinv172u:209_30: ko 'sau bhagavān? asti gṛhapatiputra śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:209_33: tasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā saromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭāṇi;
V03vinv172u:209_34: tenābhiprasannena sa eva paṃcaśatikaḥ pākaḥ āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pratipāditaḥ
V03vinv172u:211_0: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa fills his bowl with food of extraordinary fragrance,
V03vinv172u:211_1: which Mahāmaudgalyāyana carries back to the Buddha
V03vinv172u:212_0: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasyāntikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte campāyām antarhito rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād venuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:212_2: bhagavān bhoktum ārabdhaḥ; rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ dvitīyaṃ sthālipākam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:212_3: yāvat paśyati sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena (SBV II 138) [A_473b] surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:212_4: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ upanītaḥ;

V03vinv172u:214_0: King Bimbisāra desires to see Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa
V03vinv172u:215_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:215_1: tena amātyānām ājñā dattā: sannāhayantu bhavantaḥ caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:215_3_0: devasyāsau viṣayanivāsī; ihaivāhūyatāṃ; puṇyamaheśākhyo 'sau satvaḥ; na tasya ājñā dātavyā; deva vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmaḥ,
V03vinv172u:215_3_1: yathā ājñāṃ na dāsyāmaḥ; sa cāgamiṣyati; evaṃ kuruta iti; taiś campāyā lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:215_6: rājā āgamiṣyati; iti śrutvā parituṣṭāḥ; bhūyo lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ; bhavanto na rājā āgamiṣyati; api tu kumāra āgacchati it; te santrastāḥ: karkaśaḥ (SBV II 139) kumāraḥ,
V03vinv172u:215_8: bhuyo likhitaṃ; na rāja āgacchati; nāpi kumāraḥ; api tu yuṣmābhir gaṅgā tathā baddhavyā yathā pratilomā vahati;
V03vinv172u:215_11: yenaivaṃ likhati iti tair amātyānām anena arthena lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:215_12: tair vācayitvā punas teṣāṃ yathābhūtaṃ sandiṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:215_13: bhavantaḥ eṣa paramārthaḥ; na rājā āgacchati; na kumāraḥ; nāpi gaṅgābandhena kiṃcit prayojanam;

V03vinv172u:215_22: sa kathayati: bhavanto yady evaṃ samayataḥ anujānāmi;
V03vinv172u:215_23: yadi yuṣmākam api putrāḥ śroṇena sārdhaṃ gacchati iti;

V03vinv172u:218_0: atha potalako gṛhapatir yena śroṇakoṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:218_3: sa kathayati: tāta yady evaṃ gacchāmi iti; putra nūnaṃ sa rājā tava pādayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi draṣṭukāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:218_4: na tvayā tasya pādau utkṣipya darśayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:218_5: rājāna asthānaprakopinaḥ; mā te anarthaṃ kariṣyanti; ayaṃ muktāhāraḥ; etaṃ rājñaḥ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvā praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā tasya purastāt paryaṅkaṃ badhvā niṣīda;

V03vinv172u:218_8: tasyaitad abhavat; nauyānam eṣāṃ varaṃ; nauyānena preṣayāmi iti; tena nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ nausaṅkramo māpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:218_10: vividhāni vāditrāṇi, naryaś ca nānālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ samāropitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:218_13: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutaṃ potalakaputraḥ āgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:218_14: tena yāvac ca rājagṛhaṃ, yāvac ca nādī gaṅgā atrāntarāt khātam asyāḥ pūrayitvā tanmadhyena naur ākṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:218_15_0: rājagṛhaṃ ca tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddham
V03vinv172u:218_15_1: āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam ucchṛtadhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ devānām iva nandanavanodyānaṃ;
V03vinv172u:218_17: tato 'sau rājñaḥ siṃhāsanasthasya muktāhāraṃ pādayor datvā,

V03vinv172u:220_0: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa and King Bimbisāra go together to the Bamboo grove in order to see the Buddha
V03vinv172u:221_0: dṛṣṭvā kathayati: śroṇa dṛṣṭas te bhagavān? no deva;
V03vinv172u:221_1: āgaccha gacchāmaḥ; sa pṛcchati deva kiṃ bhagavān yānena gaccchati? āhosvīt pādābhyām? iti;
V03vinv172u:221_3: kiṃ tasya yānena? iti; sa kathayati: deva yady evam aham api pādābhyām eva gacchāmi iti,
V03vinv172u:221_4: pādābhyām eva saṃprasthitaḥ; tasya pauruṣeyair vastrāṇi pṛthivyām āstīrṇāni;
V03vinv172u:221_5: sa kathayati: kiṃ bhagavān āstīrṇena gacchati? āhosvis anāstīrṇena? iti;
V03vinv172u:221_7: sa kathayati: apanyata vastrāṇi; aham apy anāstīrṇena gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:221_9: amanuṣyakair āstīrṇāni; sa kathayati: bhavanto yūyaṃ mayā nivāritāḥ? iti;
V03vinv172u:221_10: te kathayanti: deva nivāritāḥ; atha kena punar āstīrṇāni? iti;
V03vinv172u:221_11: deva puṇyamaheśākhyas tvam; amanuṣyakair āstīrṇāni iti; tenāśayato vāṅ niścāritā apanayantu amanuṣyā vastrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:221_12: tair apanītāni; tena pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ; ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:221_13: iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī calati, saṃcalati, saṃpracalati; vyathate saṃvyathate saṃpravyathate;
V03vinv172u:221_14_0: pūrvo digbhāga unnamati, paścima avanamati; paścima unnamati; pūrvo 'vanamati; dakṣiṇa unnamati, uttaro 'vanamati; uttara
V03vinv172u:221_14_1: unnamati, dakṣiṇo 'vanamati; anta unnamati, madhyo 'vanamati; madhya (SBV II 141) unnamati,
V03vinv172u:221_15: anto 'vanamati; tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:221_16: ito bhikṣava ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācit potalakaputreṇa anāstīrṇāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:221_18: no tu puṇyaparikṣayāt; tenāyaṃ ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:224_0: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:224_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:224_2: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
V03vinv172u:224_3: yāṃ śrutvā śroṇena koṭīviṃśena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:224_4: sa dṛṣṭasatya utthāya āsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:224_5: yena bhagavāṃs tena añjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:224_6: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaya pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:224_7: bhagavān āha: na khalu gṛhaputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā ananujñātaṃ kulaputraṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti upasaṃpādayanti vā;
V03vinv172u:224_9: rājā kathayati ahaṃ bhadanta prabhuḥ sarvādhikaraṇānām;
V03vinv172u:224_10: arthe mamaiva dharmatayā ayaṃ putro bhavati;
V03vinv172u:224_11: aham enam anujānāmi; pravrājayatu bhagavān yathāsukham iti;
V03vinv172u:224_12: tato bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:224_14: saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ; pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmasruḥ varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣor īryāpathenāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:224_20: ayaṃ tāvan nītapiṇḍakaḥ; ekāntaghaṭake śāsane kiṃ viśeṣam adhigamiṣyati iti (SBV II 142) sa tair avasphaṇḍito yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:224_22_0: kataro bhadanta ānanda bhagavatā ekāntaghaṭakasya bhikṣoḥ yogānukūlas samādhir uktaḥ āyuṣman śroṇa bhagavatoktaṃ caṅkramata
V03vinv172u:224_22_1: avigatasamādhiś cirasthitiko bhaviṣyatīti tena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ gatvā caṅkramo 'dhiṣṭhitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:224_23: tatrāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne yuktaḥ;

V03vinv172u:226_0: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa gives himself to severe penances. The example of the lute
V03vinv172u:227_0: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇakoṭīviṃśasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi;
V03vinv172u:227_1: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:227_2: ahaṃ teṣām anyatamaḥ; atha ca punar me nānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:227_3: saṃvidyante ca me jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;
V03vinv172u:227_4: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅjīya;
V03vinv172u:227_5: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya anyatamaṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:227_6: ehi tvaṃ bhikṣo; yena śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasamkrāma;
V03vinv172u:227_7: upasaṃkramya śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam evaṃ vada śāstā tvāṃ śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:227_8: evaṃ bhadantety sa bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yanāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:227_9: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:227_10: śāstā tvām āyuṣman śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:227_11: evam āyuṣman ity āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tasya bhikṣoḥ pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:227_12: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṇte sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:227_13: āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśaṃ bhagavān idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:227_14: na te śroṇa ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi? yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:227_15: ahaṃ teṣām anyatamaḥ; atha ca punar me nānupādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:227_16: saṃvidyante ca me (SBV II 143) jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;
V03vinv172u:227_17: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuñjīya;
V03vinv172u:227_18: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭīviṃśasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:227_20: iti viditvā bhītas trastas saṃvignaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:227_21: evaṃbhadanta; tena hi śroṇa tvām eva pṛcchāmi;
V03vinv172u:227_23: kiṃ manyase śroṇa? kuśalas tvam abhūḥ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane;
V03vinv172u:227_24: tathyam ahaṃ bhadanta kuśalo 'bhūvaṃ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane:
V03vinv172u:227_25: kiṃ manyase śroṇa? yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atyātatā bhavanti,
V03vinv172u:227_26: api nu tasmin samaye [A_475b] vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati? manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā? no bhadanta;
V03vinv172u:227_27: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atiślathā bhavanti api nu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati? manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā? no bhadanta;
V03vinv172u:227_28: atha punar yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ nātyātatā bhavanti nātiślathāḥ saha guṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:227_29: nanu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā vā bhavati? manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā? evaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv172u:227_30: evam eva śroṇa atyārabdhaṃ vīryam atyauddhatyāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv172u:227_33: tena ca mā maṃsthāḥ; tasmiṃś ca pramādaḥ; tasmiṃś ca nimittam udgṛhṇīṣva;
V03vinv172u:227_34: anena tvaṃ śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:227_36: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ; kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ; nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi iti
V03vinv172u:229_0: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa follows the advice of the Buddha, and in a short time becomes an arhat
V03vinv172u:230_0: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:230_1: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavatā anena vīṇopamena avavādenāvavāditaḥ eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīt;
V03vinv172u:230_2: eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan,
V03vinv172u:230_3: yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy (SBV II 144) ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
V03vinv172u:230_4: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayate:
V03vinv172u:230_5: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ; uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ; kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ; nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:230_6: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ
V03vinv172u:230_7: athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇāsya koṭīviṃśasya arhatvaprāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedinaḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:230_8: ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ,
V03vinv172u:230_9: paryupasanāya iti; athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ sāyāhne oratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena hagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:230_10: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv172u:230_11: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat
V03vinv172u:233_0_0: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati arhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ
V03vinv172u:233_0_1: samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sa tasmin samaye ṣaṭ sthānāny adhimukto bhavati;

V03vinv172u:233_63: bhagavān āha: śroṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ koṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;

V03vinv172u:236_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:236_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:236_2: sa dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīrājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
