V03vinv172u:238_0: Rājagṛha's people begins tu murmur against Ajātaśatru and Devadatta
V03vinv172u:239_0: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattākalyāṇamitropagūḍhena rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:239_1: tatra kecid rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣante ayaṃ pituḥ śatrutve vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:239_2: kasmān na jātamātra eva praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:239_3: apare kathayanti: na bhavanto rājño 'parādhaḥ; kiṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavati? vinīta evāyaṃ kumāraḥ;
V03vinv172u:239_6: apare kathayanti; na bhavanto rājño doṣaḥ nāpi devadattasya;
V03vinv172u:239_7: api tu bhagavata eva doṣaḥ; yena devadattaḥ pravrājitaḥ; no tu lokadhātvantaraṃ nītvā avasthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:239_8: apare kathayanti: bhagavato nāyam aparādhaḥ; api tu saṃghasya yenāsya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma na kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:239_9: tatra yena rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate tena (SBV II 150) na rājā ārtīyate karmāṇy etāni mayā pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu kṛtāni upacitāni iti;
V03vinv172u:239_10: yena tu bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate,
V03vinv172u:239_12: madīyena durnītena loko bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣate iti
V03vinv172u:239_13: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
V03vinv172u:239_14: paśya bhadanta anyair aparāddham [A_478a] anye doṣeṇa lipyante iti,
V03vinv172u:239_15: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany anyair aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:241_0: The story of Kūla and Upakūla
V03vinv172u:241_1: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta and Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:242_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:242_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:242_2: tasya dvau kukkurau kūlaś ca upakūlaś ca;
V03vinv172u:242_4: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājño brahmadattasya saṃgrāmaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:242_5: tena amātyānām ājñā dattā; pratyavekṣata bhavantaḥ aśvasannāhabhāṇḍikām iti;
V03vinv172u:242_6: te pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ, paśyanti sarvāṃ chinnapracchinnāṃ;
V03vinv172u:242_7: tai rājñe niveditaṃ: deva aśvasannāhabhāṇḍikā kukkureṇa bhakṣitā iti;
V03vinv172u:242_8: rājā kathayati; bhavanto yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kukkurāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:242_9: tatra kecit praghātitāḥ; kecin niṣpalāyitāḥ; yāvad anyatamo jānapadaḥ kukkuraḥ janapadād vārāṇasīṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:242_11: pṛṣṭāś ca: bhavantaḥ kimartham evaṃ yūyaṃ santrastāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:242_13: sa kathayati: kimarthaṃ rājā yuṣmābhir na vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:242_14: te kathayanti: kaḥ śaknoti rājānaṃ vijñapayitum anya praghātitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:242_16: sa kathayati: tiṣṭhatu yūyam; ahaṃ yuṣmākam arthe rājānaṃ vijñapayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:242_18: tatas tena saṃpātavelāyāṃ śravaṇopavicāre sthitvā rājā gāthayā vijñaptaḥ
V03vinv172u:242_22: aghātyaghāto na hi deva yuktaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:242_23: rājñā śrutaṃ; tena prabhātāyaṃ rajanyām amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:242_24: bhavanto yenāhaṃ rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ tasya samanveṣaṇaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:242_25: taiḥ rakṣiṇām ājñā dattā; samanveṣatat bhavantaḥ kena devo rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:242_27: rājā kathayati: bhavantaḥ parīkṣāṃ kuruta kiṃ kūlopakūlābhyāṃ bhakṣitam āhosvit anyaiḥ kukkuraiḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:242_29: bhavanto devenaivājñā dattā kukkurāṇāṃ parīkṣāṃ kuruteti;
V03vinv172u:242_30: tat katham eṣāṃ parīkṣā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:242_31: anye kathayanti: kim atra parīkṣitavyaṃ keśāṇḍukaṃ datvā chardāpayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:242_33: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yau kūlopakūlau etāv eva devadattājātaśatrū tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:242_34: tadāpi etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:242_35: etarhy api etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:242_36: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:244_0: The story of a hunter and an ungrateful man
V03vinv172u:245_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:245_1: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ [A_478b] paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_3: niṣpalāyamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ; so 'pi tadbhakṣaṇādhyavasāyas tatraiva patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_6: yāvat sarve kūpe nipatitāḥ; tena sarva eva vyāpannāḥ; parasparam abhilaṣante vyāpādanāya;
V03vinv172u:245_7: siṃhaḥ kathayati: bhavantaḥ sarve yūyaṃ mama gamyāḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_9: niścalās tiṣṭhata; māyaṃ vyāpādanakālaḥ iti; yāvat daivān mṛgalubdhako mṛgān paryeṣamāṇas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_13: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena jñātvā pūrvataraṃ siṃha uddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_15: kṛtajñas te bhaviṣyāmi; kiṃtu atrakṛṣṇaśiraskas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:245_16: sa tvayā noddhartavyaḥ; kṛtaghnā hy eta bhavanti ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_17: yāvat tena mṛgalubdhakena sarve anupūrveṇa uddhṛtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_18: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhena mṛgo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_19: sa ca mṛgalubdhakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_20: siṃhena taṃ parijñāya sa mṛgaḥ pādayor nipatya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_21: apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa;
V03vinv172u:245_22: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_23: antaḥpurajano viśvastavihārī udyāne caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati middham avakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:245_24: vastrāṇi śodhayati; alaṃkārāṇy apanīya pārśve sthāpayati;
V03vinv172u:245_25: yāvad anyatamā antaḥpurikā alaṃkāram avamucya pārśve sthāpayitvā middham avakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:245_26: tat śyenakenāpahṛtya tasmai lubdhakāya kṛtajñatayā dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:245_27: rājā brahmadatto nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_30: na paśyati; tayā rājñe niveditaṃ: deva udyāne me alaṃkāraḥ apahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:245_31: rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā: bhavantaḥ alaṃkārāḥ udyāne apahṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_33: te samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ; sa kṛṣṇaśiraskaḥ tasya mṛgalubdhakasya kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:245_34: tena tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāmatā upāṃśunā vijñātam asyālaṃkāro 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:245_36: tato rājñā paramakopakupitena mṛgalubdhako rājapuruṣair āhvāyya uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:245_37: bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā udyānād alaṃkāro 'pahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:245_38: tatas tena santrastena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyāya asāv alaṃkāro rājñe samarpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_39: tathāpy asau puruṣaḥ cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_41: tena kṛṣṇaśiraskena pāpakāriṇā asmākaṃ kalyāṇamitro rājñā cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:245_42: āśīviṣaḥ kathayati: bhoḥ lubdhaka ahaṃ rājānaṃ [A_480a] daśāmi;
V03vinv172u:245_43: tvayā ebhir mantrapadair ebhiś ca oṣadhaiḥ cikitsitavyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_44: evaṃ sa rājā abhiprasanno niyataṃ tvāṃ muñcati;
V03vinv172u:245_46: sa kathayati: śobhanam evaṃ kuru; āśīviṣeṇa rājā daṣṭaḥ; lubdhakena gatvā mantraiś cauṣadhaiś ca cikitsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:245_49: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:245_50: yo 'sau kṛtaghnapuruṣaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:245_53: punar api yathā akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:247_0: The story of Nanda, the Mungoose
V03vinv172u:248_4: yāvad asau nakulas taṃ mūṣikam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:248_7: niścalās tiṣṭhata iti; tatrāśīviṣasya saṃjñākaraṇaṃ priyasena iti;
V03vinv172u:248_8: nakulasya nāma nanda iti; mūṣikasya gaṅgadatta iti; iti; priyasena nandena ca gaṅgadatta uktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:248_9: anālakṣya gaccha; asmākam āhāraṃ paryeṣaya iti;
V03vinv172u:248_10: sa ṛjuko bhadrāśayaḥ; tayor arthāya āśayena āhāraṃ paryeṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:248_14: priyasenaḥ saṃlakṣayati kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāpto 'py eṣas tasya badhāya parākramati;
V03vinv172u:248_15: prāg eva yady asau vinā āhāreṇa āgacchati;
V03vinv172u:248_17: tena tasya sandiṣṭaṃ; nanda evaṃ kathayati: yadi gaṅgadattaḥ vinā āhāreṇāgacchati sa eva mayā bhakṣayitavya iti;
V03vinv172u:248_18: gaṅgadattena āhāraṃ paryeṣamāṇena na kiṃcid āsāditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:248_19: sa saṃlakṣayati niyatam asau māṃ bhakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:248_24: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau gaṅgadattaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:248_25: yo 'sau nandanāmā nakulaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:248_27: etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī (SBV II 154)
V03vinv172u:249_1: bhuṅkṣva likhir naṭaḥ kākaḥ cakraḥ kumbhīracandanam /

V03vinv172u:251_0: King Bimbisāra makes exceeding grants to Ajātaśatru
V03vinv172u:252_0: yadā ajātaśatruṇā rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājñā upālabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:252_1: kumāra kimarthaṃ tvayā mama kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:252_2: deva roṣāt; devasya bhogāḥ saṃvidyante; mama na [A_480b] saṃvidyante;
V03vinv172u:252_3: rājā kathayati: putra yady evaṃ gaccha campā sādhāraṇā tava bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:252_4: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudito devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:252_5: ārya mayā campā sādhāraṇā labdhā iti;
V03vinv172u:252_6: sa kathayati: kumāra dṛṣṭaṃ te parākramasya phalam ārya dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:252_7: bhūyaḥ parākramasva; ativṛddhis te bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:252_10: kecid rājagṛhaṃ gatāḥ; kecid deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ; amātyai rājño dūto 'nupreṣitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:252_12: janaḥ pīḍyamāno niṣpalāyate; tad arhati devaḥ kumārasya nivāraṇaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:252_13: rājā kathayati: kumāra kasmāj janapadān pīḍayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:252_14: sa kathayati: deva sādhanaṃ na puṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:252_15: rājā kathayati: yady evaṃ rājagṛham ekaṃ tyaktvā magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhāṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:252_16: magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:252_17: ārya mayā (SBV II 155) rājagṛham ekaṃ muktvā sarvo magadhaviṣayo labdhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:252_18: sa kathayati: īdṛśaṃ parākramasya phalaṃ; bhūyaḥ parākramasva iti; sa magadhaviṣayaṃ nāśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:252_21: nivartyatām iti; sa rājñā āhūyoktaḥ kumāra kimarthaṃ magadhaviṣayaṃ nāśayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:252_22: sa kathayati deva prabhūto janakāyo na puṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:252_23: rājā kathayati; kumāra yady evaṃ kośam ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:252_24: sa rājagṛham api gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:252_25: ārya mayā kośam ekaṃ muktvā, sarvabhogā labdhāḥ iti; sa kathayati parākramaphalam etat;
V03vinv172u:252_27: yasya kośaḥ sa rājā; kośārthaṃ parākramasva iti; sa rājagṛham api nāśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:252_28: rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ anyaś ca magadhanivāsī campeyaś ca sarva eva santrastāḥ yathā ajātaśatrur na paśyati tathā dūtasaṃpreṣaṇena rājānaṃ vijñapayitum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:252_30: kumāreṇātyantaṃ niḥsvīkṛtāḥ; prāyo devasya janapadā niṣpalāyitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:252_31: vayam api niṣpalāyāmaḥ iti; dharmapradhānaḥ sa rājā; karuṇātmakaś ca; tena samutpannamanyunā ajātaśatrur āhūya priyamadhuravaconukūlatayā śiras parāmṛśyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:252_34: sa kathayati: deva kośabalino rājānaḥ; mama kośabalaṃ nāsti; kiṃ karomi iti; a kathayati: yady evam antaḥpuram ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:252_35: tathāpy asau duṣṭaprakṛtiḥ pāpasahāyaś ca nāśayaty eva,
V03vinv172u:252_36: nāvatiṣṭhate; rājñā sopālambham uktaḥ: sakośakoṣṭhāgārajanapadās tavaiva dattāḥ;
V03vinv172u:254_0: Ajātaśatru casts his father in prison, there to die of hunger
V03vinv172u:255_0: sa evam ukte ruṣitaḥ amātyānāṃ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:255_1: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate,
V03vinv172u:255_2: tasya ko daṇḍaḥ iti; amātyāḥ kathayanti: deva vadho daṇḍaḥ iti; sa kathayati: pitā mama; katham enaṃ praghātayāmi? gacchata;
V03vinv172u:255_4: sa cārake prakṣiptaḥ; anuraktapaurajānapadaḥ sa rājā;
V03vinv172u:255_5: tadviṣayanivāsī ca janakāyaḥ śrutvā (SBV II 156) durmanāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:255_6: ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ iti nāsya kaścit parivādaṃ mantrayati;
V03vinv172u:255_11: te kathayanti: deva jananī te sthālīpākaṃ praveśayati iti;
V03vinv172u:255_12: ajātaśatruṇā ājñā dattā: dhārayata bhaktaṃ pānaṃ ca yathā na bhūyaḥ praveśayati iti;
V03vinv172u:255_13: antaḥpure cājñā dattā na kenacic cārake bhaktaṃ pānaṃ praveśayitavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:255_14: yaḥ praveśayati tasya vadho daṇḍaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:255_15: tasya raudrakarmatāṃ jñātvā na kaścid bhaktaṃ sādhayati;
V03vinv172u:255_16: kuta eva praveśayiṣyati; tato vaidehī bhartṛsnehoparuddhyamānahṛdayā saktukalkena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā nūpurāṇi ca pānīyasya pūrayitvā praveśayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:255_17: tenāsau yāpayati; cārakapuruṣaiḥ so 'py upāyo vijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:255_18: kiṃtu anurāgāt tasya rājñaḥ ajātaśatror na nivedayanti;
V03vinv172u:255_21: tair istareṇa samākhyātaṃ; sa kathayati: bhavanto vaidehīṃ dhārayata, yathā na bhūyaḥ praviśati iti;
V03vinv172u:255_22: tato bhagavān tatkuśalamūlāvaropaṇārthaṃ gṛddhrakūṭaparvate vātāyanābhimukhaṃ caṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:255_23: rājā bimbisāraḥ vātāyanena bhagavantam avalokya prāmodyam utpādayati yena prāṇair na viyujyate;
V03vinv172u:255_24: ājātaśatruḥ ca bhūyaś cārakapuruṣān pṛccchati bhavantaḥ annapānaṃ vidhāritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:255_26: te kathayanti: bhagavāṃs tasyānugrahārthaṃ gṛddhrakūṭe parvate caṃkramyate;
V03vinv172u:255_27: tam asau sthitaḥ pratidinaṃ parīkṣate iti;
V03vinv172u:255_29: tasya ca pādau kṣureṇa nirlikhata iti;
V03vinv172u:255_30: tair vātāyanānāni pihitāni; tasya ca pādau ksureṇa nirlikhitau;
V03vinv172u:255_32: na māṃ bhagavān kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaṃ samanvāharati iti
V03vinv172u:257_0: The Buddha sends Maudgalyāyana to visit and comfort the old king
V03vinv172u:258_0: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcit buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:258_1_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ (SBV II 157) śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ
V03vinv172u:258_1_2: pañcāṅgaviprahīnānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ

V03vinv172u:258_3: kasya anavaropitāni kuśalamulāni avaropayeyaṃ? kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyaṃ? kasya pakvāni vimocayeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:258_5: gaccha maudgalyāyana; rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ madvacanād ārogya;
V03vinv172u:258_6: evaṃ sa vada: bhagavān kathayati: yat kalyāṇamitreṇa karaṇīyaṃ kṛtaṃ tat te mayā;

V03vinv172u:260_0: The tardy repentance of Ajātaśatru and the death of Bimbisāra

V03vinv172u:285_3: parityajata yantram iti; te yantraṃ parityajya gṛdhrakūṭe itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanti,
V03vinv172u:285_6: teṣāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhagavatā sopānaṃ nirmitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:285_8: bhavantaḥ kuto 'tra sopānaḥ? bhagavata eṣo 'nubhāvaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:285_9: bhūyasyā mātrayā cittam abhiprasādya sopānena avatīrya,
V03vinv172u:285_11: bhagavān api tadvinayanāpekṣayaiva gṛdhrakūṭe parvate caṅkramyamāṇo 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:285_12: tatas te bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya:
V03vinv172u:285_13: bhagavatā teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
V03vinv172u:285_14: yāṃ śrutvā tair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:285_16: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā;
V03vinv172u:285_17: na rājñā neṣṭena svakanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair,
V03vinv172u:285_18: na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ, yat bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtaṃ; uddhṛto narakatiryakpretebhyaḥ pādaḥ;
V03vinv172u:285_19: pratiṣṭhāpito devamanuṣyeṣu; paryantīkṛtaḥ saṃsāraḥ; ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ;
V03vinv172u:285_20: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ; pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi; vivṛtāni svargadvārāṇi; anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:285_21: abhikrāntā vayaṃ bhadanta, abhikrāntāḥ; ete vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ śraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
V03vinv172u:285_22: dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca; upāsakāṃ ca asmān bhagavān dhārayatu adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetān,
V03vinv172u:285_23: śaraṇāgatān, abhiprasannān; ity uktvā bhagavato 'ntikāt paṃca śikṣāpadāni grahitum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv172u:287_0: Devadatta perceives that the workmen and the mechanic too ran away,

V03vinv172u:288_4: na patatīti kṛtvā svayam eva tāny anyāni paṃca manuṣyaśatāny ādāya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam (SBV II 168) abhiroḍhum ārabdhaḥ;

V03vinv172u:288_9: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: mayaiva etāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:288_10: mayaiva etāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? iti viditvā tāni paṃca manuṣyaśatāni idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:288_11: bhavanto devadattas tīvraparyavasthānāvasthito gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhāḥ;

V03vinv172u:291_8: devadattena paṃcaśataparivāreṇa yantram āmreḍya bhagavataḥ śilā kṣiptā;
V03vinv172u:291_9: vajrapāṇinā yakṣeṇa cūrṇitā; ardhaṃ bhagavataḥ sthāne patitukāmaṃ kumbhīrayakṣeṇa gṛhṇatā na sugṛhītaṃ kṛtaṃ;

V03vinv172u:291_21_0: atha yakṣapūrviṇo devaputrasya etad abhavan na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyaṃ

V03vinv172u:293_1: (concerning a previous birth of yakṣa Kumbhīra)
V03vinv172u:294_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:294_1: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nātidūre anyatarasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:294_3: tasya cāśramapadasya sāmantakena mṛgalubdhako mṛgān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:294_4: sa tasya ṛṣeḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:294_5: tasyāsau ṛṣiḥ śrāntasya mūlaphalair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:294_6: apy evāyaṃ lubdhako matsarī (SBV II 171) samīpanivāsino mṛgān na praghātayed iti;
V03vinv172u:294_10: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ kālyam evotthāya mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:294_11: tena mṛgaḥ śaraparamparayā tāḍitaḥ utpatitaḥ taya ṛṣer āśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:294_12: tatrāpi rājñā nārācena marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:294_14: kalirājas tvaṃ durācāro yena me śaraṇopagato mṛgaḥ praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:294_15: evam ukte sa rājā dveṣaparyavasthānaniviṣṭabuddhir amātyānāṃ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:294_16: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate tasya ko daṇḍaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:294_17: amātyāḥ kathayanti: vadho daṇḍaḥ iti; rājā kathayati: yady evaṃ parityakto me ayam ṛṣiḥ;
V03vinv172u:294_19: daivāt sa lubdhakas tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:294_20: āgata eva sa saṃlakṣayati; mama jīvataḥ katham ṛṣiḥ praghātyate iti;
V03vinv172u:294_21: sa yoddhum ārabdhaḥ; ṛṣir niṣpalāyitaḥ; sa mahatā balakāyena praghātitaḥ
V03vinv172u:294_22: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:294_23: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ eṣa eva sa kumbhīrayakṣaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:294_25: etarhy apy anena mamārthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:296_0: Jīvaka prescribes a very rare substance called gośīrṣacandana in order to stop the hemorrhage at the foot of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:297_2: jīvako vaidyarājo bhagavato rujāvalokakaḥ trikālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:297_3: rājagṛhanivāsī śrāddho janakāyaḥ nānādeśabhyāgatāś ca samyagdarśanasaṃpannāḥ dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:297_4: tatra kecit kathayati: jīvaka idam atra bhaiṣajyaṃ śobhanam iti;
V03vinv172u:297_5: anye kathayanti: idaṃ śobhanam iti; jīvako vaidyarājaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:297_7: kiṃ tu tad durlabhaṃ; āyuṣmān ānanda kathayati: jīvaka kiṃ tat; sa kathayati: gośīrṣacandanaṃ; tena khalu samayena goṣīrṣacandanasya prāptir eva samucchinnā;
V03vinv172u:297_8: yāvad anyatamena vaṇijā gośīrṣacandanam ātyayikaṃ sthāpitam:
V03vinv172u:297_9: ayaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ;
V03vinv172u:297_10: yady asya daivād gośīrṣacandanena prayojanaṃ bhavati (SBV II 172) niyatam asyābhāvat śiraśchedam api karoti;
V03vinv172u:297_11: yasmād ahaṃ kālānukālaṃ gośīrṣacandanavikrayaṃ kṛtavān iti;
V03vinv172u:297_12: tena śrutaṃ yathā jīvakena vaidyarājena bhagavato rujāpraśamanaṃ gośīrṣacandanam upadiṣṭam iti;
V03vinv172u:297_13: sa saṃlakṣayati: ayam ajātaśatrur devadattavigrāhito bhagavaty abhiniviṣṭabuddhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:297_14: yady ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ pradāsyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:297_15: punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: bhagavān devamanuṣyapūjitaḥ; yadi tasyārthāy prāṇaviyogo bhavati,
V03vinv172u:297_16: bhavaty eva; yannv ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ prayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:297_17: sa gośīrṣacandanam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:297_18: bhagavann upalabdhaṃ mayā bhagavato gośīrṣacandanena prayojanam iti;
V03vinv172u:297_19: idaṃ tat pratigṛhṇātu bhagavān anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:297_21: pratigṛhṇīṣva ānanda asya mahātmanaḥ sakāśād gośīrṣacandanam iti;
V03vinv172u:297_23: tato 'sau vaṇik prītiprāmodyajātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv172u:297_25: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātāḥ arciṣaḥ mukhān niścarya kāścid adhastād gacchanti;

V03vinv172u:299_0: The hemorrhage does not stop, and Jīvaka prescribes the milk of a young woman
V03vinv172u:300_1: nāvatiṣṭhate; jīvakaḥ kathayati: idānīṃ kanyākṣīreṇa pariṣeko dīyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:300_2: bhikṣavo na jānate kīdṛśaṃ kanyākṣīram iti;
V03vinv172u:300_3: āyuṣmān ānandaḥ kathayati: jīvaka kīdṛśaṃ kanyākṣīram iti;
V03vinv172u:300_4: sa kathayati: yā tu prathamaprasavā (SBV II 173) nārī sātra kanyā abhipretā;
V03vinv172u:300_5: tasyā yat kṣīraṃ tat kanyākṣīram ity ucyate iti;
V03vinv172u:300_6: āyuṣmatā ānandena kanyākṣīranimittaṃ catasro 'pi parṣadaḥ prayuktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_8: bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakā upāsihyaś ca bhūyasā sarva eva rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sthāpayitvā devadattaṃ devadattapakṣyāṃś ca;
V03vinv172u:300_9: te catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ janakāyasya ca paryeṣamāṇasya yais tair upāyaiḥ vighnaṃ kurvanti;
V03vinv172u:300_10: yāvad rājagṛhe anyatamā prathamaprasavā kanyā svalpakṣīrā svakam api puraṃ kṣīreṇa na santarpayati;
V03vinv172u:300_11: kutaḥ punar anyasya dāsyati? tayā śrutaṃ yathā bhagavataḥ kanyākṣīreṇa prayojanam iti;
V03vinv172u:300_12: sā saṃlakṣayati: yadi dāsyāmi dārako me svalpaprāṇaḥ kṣīravirahāt prāṇair viyokṣyate;
V03vinv172u:300_13: na kevalam ayaṃ ādīnavaḥ; ayam aparaḥ, devadattaḥ bhagavato dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_14: tadvigrāhitaś ca rājā ajātaśatruḥ devadattapakṣyāś ca kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_16: punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: kāmaṃ svaprāṇaviyogaḥ putraviyogaś ca;
V03vinv172u:300_17: na tu devamanuṣyapūjitasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ vyādhiduḥkhavedanānubhavanaṃ yena sarva eva rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ samākulaḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_18: yannv ahaṃ kṣīram ādāya gaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:300_19: sā bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasādya nave bhājane kṣīraṃ dugdhvā yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv172u:300_20: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:300_21: upalabdhaṃ mayā bhadanta jīvakena bhagavataḥ kanyākṣīram upadiṣṭam iti;
V03vinv172u:300_22: tad idaṃ kanyākṣīraṃ pragṛhyatāṃ mamānugrahāya iti;
V03vinv172u:300_26: tena pratigṛhītaṃ kṣīraṃ; sā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā
V03vinv172u:300_28: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātāḥ arciṣaḥ mukhān niścarya kāścid adhastād gacchanti;
V03vinv172u:300_29_0: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ sañjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṅghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tāpanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudam
V03vinv172u:300_29_1: aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti;
V03vinv172u:300_32: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:300_35: na haiva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_36: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ; api tu ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_37: asya anubhāvena asmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:300_39: tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti
V03vinv172u:300_40_0: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti tāś cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān yāmān tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikān
V03vinv172u:300_40_1: brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān
V03vinv172u:300_40_2: bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmā ity udghoṣayanti;
V03vinv172u:300_42: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
V03vinv172u:300_43: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
V03vinv172u:300_45: atha tā arciṣas trisahasramahāsahasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti;
V03vinv172u:300_46: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
V03vinv172u:300_49: purastād antardhīyante; narakopapattiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati pādatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:300_53: balacakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati vāme karatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:300_54: cakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati dakṣiṇe karatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:300_58: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante
V03vinv172u:300_59: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:300_77: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:300_78: bhagavān āha: dṛṣṭas tvayā ananda sā dārikā,
V03vinv172u:300_79: yayā mamāntike cittam abhiprasādyakṣīraṃ dattaṃ dṛṣṭā bhadanta;
V03vinv172u:300_80: eṣā sā ānanda dārikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca kṣīraprado nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:300_81: ayam asyā deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:303_1: nāvatiṣṭhate; nānādeśanivāsino bhikṣavaḥ abhyāgatāḥ bhagavata evaṃvidham ābādhaṃ (SBV II 174) śrutvā anye ca śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ;
V03vinv172u:303_5: samaṃ te bhagavaṃś cittaṃ putreṣv api ariṣv api /
V03vinv172u:303_6: anena satyavākyena tiṣṭha kṣataja mā srava // iti
V03vinv172u:303_8_0: bhikṣavaḥ pramuditamanasaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakāḥ upāsikyaḥ bhūyasā sarva eva rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sthāpayitvā
V03vinv172u:303_9: bhagavān jānann eva yo yathā cikitsāṃ karoti,
V03vinv172u:303_11: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:303_12: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena satyopayācanayā sravad rudhiraṃ vidhāritam iti;
V03vinv172u:303_13: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani aham anena viṣakṛtena paryākulīkṛto nirviṣīkṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:306_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:306_1: tatra ṛṣiḥ prativasati phalamūlāmbubhakṣaḥ ajinavalkalavāsāḥ vidyāmantradhārī ca;
V03vinv172u:306_4: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:306_5: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:306_6: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:306_7: dārako jātaḥ; tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:306_9: sa caṃkramyamāṇaḥ [A_488b] sthito śayito vā kuśalaṃ cittam atikuśalaṃ ca karma karoti;
V03vinv172u:306_10: tasya janakāyena dharmakāma iti saṃjñā kṛtā;
V03vinv172u:306_11: sa kiṃkuśalagaveṣitayā karvaṭakān niṣkramya kālānukālaṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:306_12: upasthānaṃ cāsya karoti; tapasvina upasaṃkrāmatīti tāpasas (SBV II 175) tāpasa iti saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:306_16: sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:306_17: maharṣe upasthāyakas te viṣakṛtena prāṇair viyujyate;
V03vinv172u:306_18: cikitsāṃ kuruṣva iti; sa satyopayācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ
V03vinv172u:306_19: samaṃ te dāraka cittaṃ mitreṣv api ripuṣv api /
V03vinv172u:306_20: anena satyavākyena nirviṣo bhava dāraka // iti
V03vinv172u:306_22: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:306_23: yo 'sau ṛṣiḥ eṣa eva sa daśabalakāśyapaḥ;
V03vinv172u:306_25: etarhy apy aham anena satyopayācanena svasthīkṛtaḥ
V03vinv172u:309_1: vyarthaṃ mayā śramaṇasya gautamasya śilā kṣiptā;
V03vinv172u:309_4: sa vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā cintāparaḥ kṛtakena paryaṅkaṃ badhvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:309_9: kiṃ bhavanto yadvā tadvā asamīkṣya kathayanti nanu paśyata devadattam asmin vṛkṣamūle;
V03vinv172u:309_11: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:309_12: paśya bhadanta amī kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ ātmanā alajjinaḥ alajjino devadattasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante iti;
V03vinv172u:309_13: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani ete alajjina alajjino varṇam abhāṣanta;
V03vinv172u:311_0: The story of a jackal and a crow
V03vinv172u:311_1: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta, etc.)
V03vinv172u:312_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājagṛhīyakair manuṣyaiḥ rājñā ca kenacit kāraṇena kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā dve śmaśāne vyavasthāpite,
V03vinv172u:312_1: ekasmin pradeśe puruṣāś chorayitavyāḥ ekasmin striyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:312_3: sa na ekasmin śmaśāne avakāśaṃ labhate,
V03vinv172u:312_4: na dvitīye; rājagṛhasyānyatamasmin pradeśe udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:312_7: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe trikaṇṭakedārairaṇḍavṛkṣāś ca santi;
V03vinv172u:312_8: tatra sa paṇḍako choritaḥ; kuṇapagandhena sṛgāla āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:312_11: tasya buddhir utpannā: sṛgālasya varṇaṃ bhāṣe; kadācid bhakṣitaśeṣaṃ dadyād iti;
V03vinv172u:312_12: sa tasya gāthayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:312_13: siṃhasya te yathā grīvā ṛṣabhasya yathā kaṭiḥ /
V03vinv172u:312_14: mṛgarāja namas tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
V03vinv172u:312_17: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvāḥ bhrājate ratnapiṇḍavat // iti
V03vinv172u:312_20: mṛharāja nams tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
V03vinv172u:312_23: ākrandacāriṇāṃ śreṣṭha ehi bhuṅkṣva yathāsukhaṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:312_24: so 'vatīrṇaḥ sṛgālena saha kuṇapaṃ bhakṣayan tena ṛṣiṇā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 177)
V03vinv172u:312_26: vṛkṣādhamasya cchāyāyāṃ bhuñjate kuṇapaṃ saha // iti
V03vinv172u:312_27: kākena śrutaṃ; sa sāmarṣaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:312_28: yadi siṃho myūraś ca bhuñjate varajāṅgalam /
V03vinv172u:312_31: pakṣiṇām adhamaḥ kākaḥ jambukaś ca catuṣpadām /
V03vinv172u:312_32: eraṇḍaś cāpi vṛkṣāṇāṃ mauṣyānāṃ ca paṇḍakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:312_34: tataḥ kāko bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃjātāmarṣo ṛṣer agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya vyavalokayitum ārabdho na paśyati kiṃcit;
V03vinv172u:312_36: yāvad asau ṛṣir agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya paśyati kamaṇḍaluṃ bhagnaṃ;
V03vinv172u:312_37: sa saṃlakṣayati: tasyaitad duṣkākasya karma nānyasya;
V03vinv172u:312_38: na rocyās tādṛśāḥ kecid alajināḥ krūrāśayāḥ /
V03vinv172u:312_40: avarṇārho na varṇārhaḥ na vācyaṃ khalu sarvathā /
V03vinv172u:312_41: kiṃcin matimatā nityaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:312_42: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:312_43: sṛgālo devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena,
V03vinv172u:312_44: kākaḥ kokālikaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:312_45: tadāpy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇam abhāṣātām;
V03vinv172u:312_46: etarhy apy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇaṃ bhāṣete
V03vinv172u:312_47: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:312_48: kutra bhadanta bhagavato devadattasya ca tatprathamato vairūkṣyam utpannam iti;
V03vinv172u:314_0: The story of the two birds Dharma and Adharma
V03vinv172u:314_1: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:315_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau jīvajīvakau ekena kāyena samudratīre prativasataḥ dharmaś cādharmaś ca;
V03vinv172u:315_2: dharmo jāgarti; tena amṛtaphalam uhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:315_3: tena tad gṛhītaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati: kiṃ tāvad enam utthāpayiṣyāmi? āhosvid bhakṣayāmi? iti;
V03vinv172u:315_4: bhūyaḥ saṃlakṣayati: bhakṣayāmi: ekasminn eva śarīre vipakṣyate iti;
V03vinv172u:315_5: sa tena notthāpitaḥ; svayam eva [A_489b] bhakṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:315_6: sa pratibuddhaḥ; tasmin pradeśe dharmasya aṃrtaphalodgāraḥ utthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:315_7: adharmeṇa ghrātaḥ; sa kathayati: kasya eṣa udgāraḥ iti; sa kathayati: amṛtaphalasya; kutra labdhaṃ?; sa kathayati: mayā tava suptasya amṛtaphalaṃ labdhaṃ;
V03vinv172u:315_8: tan mayā bhakṣitaṃ; tvaṃ notthāpitaḥ: ekasminn eva śarīre vipakṣyate iti;
V03vinv172u:315_9: sa kathayati: na śobhanaṃ kṛtam; aham api kālajño bhaviṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:315_10: yāvad apareṇa samayena dharmo middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:315_11: adharmo jāgarti; tena viṣaphalam uhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:315_12: tena tad bhakṣitaṃ; tāv ubhāv api mūrcchitau; adharmo viṣaphalena paryākulīkṛtaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:315_13: tatra tatropapadyeya, yatra yatra janmani tava vadhakaḥ syāṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:315_14: dharmaḥ kathayati: aham api yatra yatropapadyeya,
V03vinv172u:315_15: tatra tatra janmani tava maitryupasaṃhāraṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:315_16: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dharmaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:315_17: yo 'sāv adharmaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:317_0: The story of Sūryanemi the poet
V03vinv172u:317_1: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:318_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sarjaraso nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:318_1: tena bhūmyantarasya rājñaḥ sakāśād dārikā labdhā;
V03vinv172u:318_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:318_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ sā dārikā kālāntareṇa āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:318_4: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt sūryodaye prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:318_5: dārako (SBV II 179) jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_6: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyte kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:318_7: amātyāḥ kathayanti: ayaṃ dārakaḥ sūryodaye jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_11: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:318_12: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:318_13: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:318_14_0: yāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya
V03vinv172u:318_14_1: adhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe
V03vinv172u:318_14_2: aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe
V03vinv172u:318_14_3: akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_15: sa pitrā yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ [A_490a] sarjarasasya rājñaḥ agramahiṣī dharmā nāma;
V03vinv172u:318_18: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā sarjarasaḥ dharmayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:318_19: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ dharmā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:318_20: sā naimittikair vyākṛtā: putraṃ janayiṣyati; sa rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭe badhvā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:318_24: śarīrāvasthā paricchinnā; sa saṃlakṣayati: mamātyayāt sūryanemī rājā bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:318_26: kim atra prāptakālaṃ; iti bhūyaḥ sa saṃlakṣyati: ayam amātyo goniṣādaḥ mayā praṇītair bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:318_27: pratipālitaś ca; asya dharmāṃ samarpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:318_28: tena goniṣāda āhūyoktaḥ:mama dharmā agramahiṣī: tvaṃ cāgrāmātyaḥ; mama śarīrāvasthā paricchinnā;
V03vinv172u:318_30: tvayā matpriyatayā tathā anuṣṭheyaṃ yathā dharmā sūryaneminā jīvitān na vyaparopyate (SBV II 180) iti;
V03vinv172u:318_31: sa kathayati: deva tad api na śakyaṃ te kartum;
V03vinv172u:318_32: alpotsuko bhavatu devaḥ; tathā kariṣye yathā na praghātyate iti
V03vinv172u:318_35: iti rājā sarjaraḥ kālagataḥ; sa chatradhvajapatākādiśobhayā mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_37: tenāmātyānām ājñā dattā; dharmāṃ ghātayata iti; goniṣādaḥ kathayati: deva kim asamīkṣya praghātyate? na jñāyate kiṃ dārakaṃ janayiṣyati? uta dārikām iti;
V03vinv172u:318_38: tad yadi dārakaṃ janayiṣyati sa eva jīvitād vyaparopyate iti;
V03vinv172u:318_39: sūryanemī rājā kathayati: evaṃ bhavatu; tvayaiva saṃrakṣyā iti; tena gṛhe sthāpitā; sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:318_40: dārako jātaḥ; tasminn eva divase kaivartī prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:318_41: tasyā dārikā jātā; sa jātamātra eva kaivartīṃ dhanena pralobhya parivartitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_42: goniṣādena rājño niveditaṃ: deva dharmā prasūtā; dārikā jātā iti; rājā kathayati: śobhanaṃ; muktāḥ smaḥ iti; sa dārakaḥ kaivartyā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ mahān saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_43: lipyakṣarāṇi pāṭhitaḥ; kāvyaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ; tasya kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:318_46: sā kathayati: paśyāmi tāvat kīdṛśaḥ iti; sa kathayati: alaṃ; kiṃ tena dṛṣṭena iti; sā kathayati: putrābhilāṣiṇī ākāṃkṣaty eva darśanaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate iti;
V03vinv172u:318_47: tasyā goniṣādena avaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā upāyasaṃvidhānena matsyāṃ kṛtvā praveśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_49: [A_490b] eṣa kaviḥ kaivartadārako rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya,
V03vinv172u:318_50: svayam eva paṭṭāṃ badhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:318_51: rājñā śrutaṃ; tenāmātyānām ājñā dattā: gṛhṇīta yathā na paribhraśyate iti;
V03vinv172u:318_53: sa itaś cāmutaś ca niṣpalāyamāno vṛddhayuvatyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_54: sa tayā gopāyitaḥ; tato haridratailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā maṃce āropya mṛta iti kṛtvā niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_55: sa ca śmaśāne choritaḥ; utthāya niṣpalāyitaḥ; tasmin pradeśe anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣpaphalāni paryeṣate;
V03vinv172u:318_58: tair asau puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: bho (SBV II 181) puruṣa na tvayā īdṛśaḥ pramāṇena varṇena ca anena pathā gacchan kaścin manuṣyo dṛṣṭaḥ? sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:318_59: dṛṣṭaḥ; anena pathā gacchata iti; te tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_63: rajakena vastravaraṇḍena veṣṭayitvā gardabhe āropya karvaṭakān niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_64: snānaśālāyāṃ nitvā muktaḥ; utthāya caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya niṣpalāyitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_69: gacchata śīghram iti; te saṃprasthitāḥ; so 'py aparasmin grāme carmakāragṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_71: sa kathayati: pṛṣṭhato mukhe upānahau kuru iti;
V03vinv172u:318_72: sa kathayati: na mayā kadācid evaṃrūpā upānahā kṛtapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:318_76: yat pṛṣṭhaṃ tad iha mamāgrataḥ kuruṣva // iti
V03vinv172u:318_77: tenāsau carmakāraḥ śikṣitaḥ; carmakāreṇa tādṛśyau upānahau kṛte;
V03vinv172u:318_79: sa tena upānahau prāvṛtya upacchidreṇa niṣpalāyitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_83: rājñā śravaparamparayā śrutaṃ yathā asau nāgair nāgabhavanaṃ praveśitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:318_84: rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā: bhavanto ye madviṣayanivāsinaḥ āhituṇḍikāḥ,
V03vinv172u:318_86: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsinaḥ āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ upanītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_87: rājñā teṣām ājñā dattā: bhavanto gacchata; amuṣmin nāgabhavane nāgam uddharata iti;
V03vinv172u:318_88: evaṃ deveti sarve āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya tannāgabhavanaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_89: anyatarasyāṃ cāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma yakṣo māṃsarudhirabhakṣaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_90: tasya bhayāt śvāpadā api tam aṭavīṃ parityajanti;
V03vinv172u:318_91: kim uta manuṣyāḥ sā piṅgalāṭavīti prakāśā (SBV II 182) saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:318_92: āhituṇḍikena sa nāgas tathā mantrabalādhānād upadruto yathā [A_491a] santrastaḥ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ chorito na śaktas tām atikrāmayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:318_93: nāgāḥ saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti: na śobhanam asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ yad asau piṅgalāṭavīṃ nātikrāmitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_97: sa nāgarājaḥ kathayati: etam artham āhituṇḍikānāṃ nivedayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:318_103: rājā kathayati: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi samanveṣyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:318_104: sa piṅgalāṭavyām itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_105: piṅgalaś ca yakṣaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe kukkuraiḥ parivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:318_106: tenāsau kukkuraiś ca dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_107: sa saṃlakṣayati: kiṃ mamānena mṛtapravṛttiḥ śrutā? yenāyam atra praviṣṭa iti;
V03vinv172u:318_108: tena tasya kukkurā utsṛṣṭāḥ; sa niṣpalāyamāno vṛkṣam abhirūḍhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_110: piṅgalaḥ kathayati: bhoḥ puruṣa na tvayā śrutaṃ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma amanuṣyakaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:318_111: yas tatra praviśati sa taṃ praghātayati iti;
V03vinv172u:318_112: prāptas te kālaḥ; avatara iti; sa kathayati: yāvaj jīvāmi tāvat tiṣṭhāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:318_114: sa pracālayitum ārabdhaḥ; tena tasyopari vastraṃ kṣiptaṃ;
V03vinv172u:318_115: kukkurāḥ saṃlakṣayanti: sa evāyaṃ manuṣyaḥ patitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:318_117: sa vṛkṣāt śanair avatīrya prakrāntaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍan;
V03vinv172u:318_118: sa saṃlakṣayati: mama mātulaḥ ṛṣīṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_119: tasya sakāśaṃ gacchāmi iti; tasya ca ṛṣer anyatamasmin parvate udyānaṃ mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:318_120: so 'nupūrveṇa śravaparamparayā tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_123: te taṃ grahītum ārabdhāḥ; tena parvataprapātād ātmā muktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_124: sa patann anyatamena puruṣeṇa śikhāyāṃ gṛhītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_125: śikhā utpaṭitā; sa patitaḥ; te saṃlakṣayanti: mṛto 'yaṃ; gacchāmaḥ iti te śikhām ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:318_127: iyam asya śikhā iti; rājā parituṣṭaḥ; tena te bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_131: na samanvāharas? iti; sa kathayati: yadi mayā na samanvāhṛto 'bhaviyat prāṇair viyuktaḥ abhaviṣyad iti;
V03vinv172u:318_132: sa ṛṣir vidyāmantradhārī; īdṛśīṃ vidyāṃ jānīte yayā puruṣaḥ strī bhavati strī puruṣo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:318_133: sa tena tāṃ vidyāṃ grāhitaḥ; uktaś ca: gacchedānīm; akutobhayo vihara iti; so 'nyaṃ pratirūpaṃ strīveṣaṃ [A_491b] vidyayā abhinirmāya vārāṇasīṃ gatvā rājakīye udyāne sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_134: udyānapālair dṛṣṭaḥ; paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ; tair laghu laghv eva gatvā sūryanemino rājñaḥ samākhyātaṃ:
V03vinv172u:318_136: iti; tenājñā dattā ānīyatām iti; sā mahatā śrīsamudāyena rājakulaṃ praveśitā;
V03vinv172u:318_137: rājā sūryanemis tayā sārdham atīva saṃraktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_138: tatas tayā avasaraṃ jñātvā rahasi sthito jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_139: punaś ca vidyāṃ parivartya puruṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_140: tataḥ svayam eva paṭṭaṃ badhvā goniṣādasyāmātyasya nivedya rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:318_141: nāsau hato yaya śiro na chinnaṃ
V03vinv172u:318_145: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sūryanemī rājā sarjarasya rājñaḥ putraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:318_146: yo 'sau kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:318_149: bhūyo 'pi yathaiṣa mama vairānubaddhas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:320_0: The story of the two jewellers
V03vinv172u:320_1: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:321_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake dvau maṇikārau prativasataḥ;
V03vinv172u:321_2: tena khalu samayena anyatamaḥ parikṣīṇavibhavo vaṇik;
V03vinv172u:321_3: sa maṇibhājanam ādāya taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:321_4: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya ekasya maṇikārasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:321_6: tena svalpaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtaṃ; sa kathayati: kim evaṃ kathayasi? yady api ahaṃ bhogebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ na tu prajñayā;
V03vinv172u:321_8: sa tasya sakāśam (SBV II 184) upasaṃkramya dvitīyasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:321_9: idam maṇibhājanaṃ; mūlyam asya kuruṣva iti; tena tasya puṣkalaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:321_10: sa parituṣṭaḥ kathayati: gṛhāṇā, dehi mūlyam iti; sa kathayati: nāsti me etāvan mūlyam iti; sa kathayati: yad asti tad anuprayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:321_11: tena gṛhītaṃ; tenānyena maṇikāreṇa śrutaṃ; sa saṃjātāmarṣas tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:321_12: mayaitat pūrvaṃ gṛhaṃ nītaṃ; mayā cāsya mūlyaṃ kṛtaṃ; tvaṃ kasmād gṛhṇīṣe? iti; tayoḥ parasparaṃ vairūkṣyam utpannam
V03vinv172u:321_13: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau maṇikāraḥ yena maṇibhājanasya svalpaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:321_14: yo 'sau dvitīyo maṇikāraḥ yena puṣkalaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:321_16: punar api yathā vayoḥ vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ;
V03vinv172u:323_0: The story of the elder son of a gṛhapati
V03vinv172u:323_1: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:324_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:324_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:324_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_492a] kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:324_4: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:324_5: dārako jātaḥ; sā asya patnī kālagatā; sa saṃlakṣayati: dārakaṃ kaḥ samvardhayiṣyati? anyām ānayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:324_6: tenānyā ānītā; sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:324_7: tasyā api putro jātaḥ; sāpi kālagatā; sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati: yady anyām ānayāmi, sāpi kālaṃ kariṣyati; jyeṣṭhasya putrasya niveśanaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:324_9: tasya bahavaḥ putrā duhitaraś ca jātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:324_10: sā tasya bhāryā kathayati: āryaputra eṣa dārakas tava ko bhavati? iti:
V03vinv172u:324_11: sa kathayati: kanīyān bhrātā; sā kathayati: ārya tava bahavaḥ putrāḥ; ayam ekaḥ; eṣāṃ cāsya ca tulyo gṛhabhogo deyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:324_12: sa kathayati: bhadre eṣa lokadharmaḥ iti; sā kathayati: yady evaṃ praghātaya enam iti;
V03vinv172u:324_13: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa puṣpaphalavyājena aṭavīṃ nītvā praghātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:324_14: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jyeṣṭho gṛhapatiputraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:324_15: yo 'sau kanīyān aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:324_18: yathā punar apy āvayor vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ;
V03vinv172u:326_0: The story of a girl and an astrologer
V03vinv172u:326_1: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:327_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:327_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:327_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:327_4: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:327_6: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati: yo mamādya gṛhaṃ brāhmaṇo bhikṣārthī praviśati,
V03vinv172u:327_8: yāvad anyatamo māṇavaḥ bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:327_10: tena brāhmaṇenāhūyoktaḥ: māṇava iyaṃ mama duhitā; mayā kanyābhikṣā tubhyaṃ dattā iti;
V03vinv172u:327_11: sa kathayati: nādya pratigṛhṇāmi; divasamuhūrtena pratigrahiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:327_12: sa prakrāntaḥ; yāvad anyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:327_14: sa tena brāhmaṇenāhūyoktaḥ: māṇava iyaṃ mama duhitā; mayā kanyābhikṣā tubhyaṃ dattā iti;
V03vinv172u:327_15: sa kathayati: aparo 'tra māṇavaḥ bhikṣārthī praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:327_17: sa kathayati: yad brūte nakṣatram aśobhanam iti;
V03vinv172u:327_18: sa kathayati: yady evaṃ pratīṣṭā bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:327_19: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati: tvaṃ punaḥ kimarthaṃ nakṣatraṃ na paśyati? iti;
V03vinv172u:327_20: nakṣatraṃ bhadrakaṃ sarvaṃ sarve kalyāṇakā dināḥ /
V03vinv172u:327_23: artho hy arthasya nakṣatraṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jyotibhiḥ punaḥ //
V03vinv172u:327_24: sa pratigṛhītvā prakrāntaḥ [A_492b] tenānyena māṇavena śrutaṃ sā brāḥmaṇakanyā anena māṇavena pratīṣṭā iti;
V03vinv172u:327_25: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ (SBV II 186) kathayati:
V03vinv172u:327_26: māṇavakaḥ sā kanyā kimarthaṃ tvayā pratīṣṭā? mayā pūrvalabdhā iti;
V03vinv172u:327_27: sa kathayati: tvaṃ nakṣatragaṇanāparaḥ; nakṣatraṃ tāvat parīkṣa; mama tu śobhanaṃ nakṣatram iti;
V03vinv172u:327_28: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrvamāṇavaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:327_29: yo 'sau paścimako māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:327_31: etrhy apy asya mamāntike vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ
V03vinv172u:329_0: The very ferocious elephant of Ājātaśatru, Dhanapālaka by name
V03vinv172u:330_0: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:330_1: tena khalu samayena yo 'sau rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ dhanapālako nāma duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:330_3: deva dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:330_4: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
V03vinv172u:330_5: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:330_6: rājā kathayati evaṃ bhavatu; gacchata iti; rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā: āhūyantāṃ bhavanto hastidamakāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:330_7_0: tair hastidamakā āhūtāḥ; rājā kathayati: bhavanto rājagṛhanivāsinā janakāyena abhihito 'smi dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam
V03vinv172u:330_8: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
V03vinv172u:330_9: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:330_11: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:330_12: hastidamakāḥ rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ pratiśrutya pādayor nipatya prakrāntāḥ (SBV II 187)
V03vinv172u:332_0: Devadatta's attempt to kill the Buddha by means of the elephant Dhanapālaka
V03vinv172u:333_0: rājagṛhe cānyataro gṛhapatiḥ āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_1: tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_2: devadattena śrutaṃ yathā amukena gṛhapatinā buddhapramuko bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:333_4: uktaś ca: amukena gṛhapatinā śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_5: tat tvayā dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:333_6: sa kathayati: ārya evaṃ bhavatu; kiṃtu yathā vā tathā vā devam avalokaya iti;
V03vinv172u:333_7: tato devadatto yena rājā ajātaśatrus tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_9: śaktas tvaṃ māṃ buddhatve na pratiṣṭhāpayitum;
V03vinv172u:333_10: [A_493a] api tu tvaṃ pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya rājye pratiṣṭhapitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_11: aham api śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ praghātya sarvajñatvaṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:333_13: ajātaśatruḥ kathayati: na tvayā śrutam? adāntadamakā buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:333_14: sa kathayati: yady adāntadamakāḥ syuḥ aham eva tāvad anena dāntaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:333_15: sa taṃ yathā vā tathā vā avalokya hastidamakānāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:333_16: niveditaṃ mayā devasya; tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvo dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:333_19: śvo hastināgo mucyate; tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvaḥ sarvaprayatnena ātmarakṣā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:333_21: īdṛśo 'haṃ mandabhāgyaḥ; mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_23: kathaṃ mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:333_24: punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: sādhayāmi pākaṃ; tatraiva nītvā bhagavantaṃ bhojayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:333_25: sa śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ sādhayitvā kālyam evotthāya bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ:
V03vinv172u:333_26: bhagavan rājagṛhe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śvo dhanapālako hastināgo mucyate;
V03vinv172u:333_30: bhagavān kathayati: alpotsukas tvaṃ gṛhapate bhava;
V03vinv172u:333_34: annapānaṃ (SBV II 188) samanvāhṛtya āsanādi prajñapya bhagavantam udīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_35: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_37: adrākṣīd dhanapālako hastināgo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:333_38: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhrūkuṭiṃ kṛtvā nādaṃ ca muktvā yena bhagavāṃs tena sabalam ājavena prādhāvat
V03vinv172u:333_39: atha devadattaḥ ajātaśatrusahīyaḥ apariprāsādam abhiruhya avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_41: tato devadattaḥ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ uccair gāthām uvāca
V03vinv172u:333_43: saśrāvakaś śākyasuta tvam adya na bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:333_44: bhagavān āha: nīco 'si devadatta; pravādaṃ tvaṃ pravadasi daśabalabalinaṃ mām agaṇayitvā;
V03vinv172u:333_45: paśyedānīṃ tu balaṃ daśabalabalinaḥ adbhutasya iti;
V03vinv172u:333_46: tato bhagavatā dakṣiṇe karatale paṃca siṃhāḥ kesariṇaḥ paṭṭadhāriṇo nirmitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_47: sa teṣāṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā mūtrapuriṣam utsṛjan niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_48: bhagavatā sarvā diśaḥ ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitāḥ ekajvālībhūtā adhimuktāḥ sthāpayitvā [A_493b] svakam eva pādamūlaṃ śāntaṃ śītībhūtam adhiṣṭhitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:333_49: tato dhanapālako hastināgaḥ itaś cāmutaś ca pradhāvan sarvam ādiptaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv172u:333_51: dhanapālakaprakopaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve bhikṣavo niṣpalāyitāḥ sthāpayitvā āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ;
V03vinv172u:333_52: tato dhanapālako vigatamadavego mandagatipracāratayā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_53: sa bhagavatā cakrasvastikanandyāvartena anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa śirasi parāmṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333_57: bhadrā hi nāga gatir bhavati // iti+
V03vinv172u:335_0: The elephant Dhanapālaka follows submissively the Buddha,
V03vinv172u:335_1: dies of grief and is reborn in the heaven of the four great kings
V03vinv172u:336_0: tvaṃ tāvad bhadramukha pūrvakeṇa duścaritena pratyavarāyāṃ tiryagyonāv utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_1: sa tvam etarhi paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena parituṣyasi;
V03vinv172u:336_2: itaś cyutasya te kā gatir bhaviṣyasi? kā upapattiḥ ko 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ iti hi bhadramukha sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_3: sarvadharmāḥ anātmānaḥ; śāntaṃ nirvāṇaṃ; mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya adyaiva tiryagyoniṃ virāgayiṣyasi;
V03vinv172u:336_4: ity uktvā yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_7: bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ; sa dvāramūle sthitaḥ; bhagavantam apaśyan gṛhaṃ bhaṅktum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_8: bhagavatā tad gṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ nirmitaṃ yatrānāvṛtaṃ buddhabimbaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv172u:336_9: sa bhagavnataṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhaṅktum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_10: bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ bhuktvā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_14: tvayā mama anarthaḥ kṛtaḥ; taṃ hastinam āgamya sīmāntarā rājānaḥ māṃ nābhidravanti;
V03vinv172u:336_16_0: sa tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā; yadā bhagavān nirgato bhavati tadā bhavadbhir dhanapālaḥ hastināgo dvāraṃ
V03vinv172u:336_16_1: badhvā sthāpayitavyaḥ yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ na nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:336_17: amātyai api hastidamakānām ājñā dattā dhanapālakaṃ hastināgaṃ dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayata yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato na nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:336_18: sa bhagavantam apaśyan pādena śuṇḍām avaṣṭabhya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_20: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
V03vinv172u:336_21: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇā iti;
V03vinv172u:336_26: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkrameyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:336_27: yannv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti;
V03vinv172u:336_28_0: atha [A_494a] nāgapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātraḥ tām eva rātriṃ divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakāṇāṃ
V03vinv172u:336_28_1: puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
V03vinv172u:336_29_0: tataḥ asya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā nāgapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ
V03vinv172u:336_31: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:336_33: na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv172u:336_35: laṃghitā asthiparvatāḥ pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi;
V03vinv172u:336_53_0: atha nāgapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ sasyasaṃpanna iva kārṣakaḥ śūra iva jitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo
V03vinv172u:336_53_1: yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ
V03vinv172u:336_57: kiṃ bhagavan imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraḥ catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:336_58: na bhikṣavo brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ na śakro devānām indraḥ nāpi catvāro lokapālāḥ māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_59: api tu yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa dhanapālo hastināgaḥ,
V03vinv172u:336_60: tāvac caṇḍaḥ tāvad rabhaso yas tathāgatasya vadhāya parākrāntaḥ dṛṣṭo bhadanta:
V03vinv172u:336_61: mayā vinītaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ cāturmahārājijeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_63: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ; sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ svabhavanaṃ gataḥ iti
V03vinv172u:336_64: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:336_65: kiṃ bhadanta dhanapālakena karma kṛtaṃ [A_494b] yasya karmaṇo vipākena tiryakṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:336_66: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:336_67: bhagavān āha: dhanapālakenaiva hi bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:336_68: dhanapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni
V03vinv172u:339_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:339_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:339_2: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:339_3: tasya ca śāsane pravrajita āsīd vaiyāpṛtyakarah;
V03vinv172u:339_4: tatrānena kṣudrānukṣudreṣu śikṣāpadeṣu anādaraḥ (SBV II 192) kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:339_6: yat tatrānena saṃghasya upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena annapānasya lābhī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:339_7: yan mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:339_8_0: yat kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalaṃ āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ
V03vinv172u:339_8_1: sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena devabhūtena mamāntike satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv172u:339_9: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:339_15: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:339_16: paśya bhadanta bhagavān paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:339_18: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany abhiḥ parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_0: The story of the king Dhṛtarāṣṭra, and his faithful captain Pūrṇamukha, etc.
V03vinv172u:341_1: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:341_2: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'navatapte mahāsarasi dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:341_3: tasya dvau putrau pūrṇaś ca pūrṇamukhaś ca;
V03vinv172u:341_5: tato pūrṇaś caṇḍo (SBV II 193) rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_7: keṣāṃcit pakṣān utpāṭayati; keṣāṃcin nakharikābhiḥ kṣataṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:341_9: te haṃsāḥ pratidinam āgamya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya haṃsādhipater nivedayanti;
V03vinv172u:341_10: sa saṃlakṣayati: pūrṇaś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_11: yady aham enaṃ yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi mamātyayād eṣa haṃsayūthaṃ nāśayiṣyati;
V03vinv172u:341_13: tena pūrṇaḥ pūrṇamukhaś ca ubhāv apy uktau;
V03vinv172u:341_14: yaḥ utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni cāvalokya agrato matsakāsam āgacchati tam ahaṃ haṃsādhipatiṃ sthāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:341_16: tāv itaś cāmutaś ca utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni ca avalokayantāv [A_495a] anupūrveṇa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm anuprāptau;
V03vinv172u:341_17: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:341_18: tena vārāṇasyām udyānasya nātidūre brahmāvatī nāma puṣkariṇī saraḥprativiśiṣṭatarākhyā;
V03vinv172u:341_20: tīre samantāc caturṣv api pārśveṣu anekāni puṣpaphalavṛkṣasahasrāṇi ropitāni;
V03vinv172u:341_22: tasyās tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrṇo haṃsaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ avatīrya yatheṣṭagatipracāratayā krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_24: tvam apy avatīrya krīḍa iti; sa kathayati: rājyaṃ tāvat pratīcchāmi; tataḥ paścād āgamya krīḍiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:341_25: tena laghu laghv eva gatvā rājyaṃ pratīṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:341_26: tataḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ vārāṇasīm āgamya brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_27: taṃ tathā pramodavihāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakāyaḥ saṃśayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:341_29: brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm alaṃkṛtya sarvajalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya lokasya spṛhām utpādayati;
V03vinv172u:341_30: yatheṣṭaṃ ca viharati iti; śrutvā sarva eva vārāṇasīnivāsī janakāyaḥ samantād brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ parivārya,
V03vinv172u:341_31: tasya visrabdhavihāratāṃ rūpaśobhāṃ ca nirīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_32: amātyai rājño niveditaṃ: deva kuto 'pi haṃsādhipatir āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_33: sa brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya anekahaṃsaśataparivāraḥ sarvān jalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya (SBV II 194) lokasya spṛhām utpādayan visrabdhavihāratayā tiṣṭhati iti;
V03vinv172u:341_34: rājā kathayati: bhavantaḥ yady evam āhūyantāṃ śākunikāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:341_35: tair āhūtāḥ; rājā kathayati: bhavantaḥ śrūyate brahmāvatyāṃ puṣkariṇyām atiparamadarśanīyavigraho haṃsādhipatiḥ kuto 'py āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_36: sa yuṣmābhir eka akṣataḥ pāśair badhvā matsakāśam āneyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_37: iti; sa taiḥ paramasukumāreṇa pāśena baddhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_39: acikitsya ādāya haṃsayūthaṃ gacchata śīghraṃ hy anavataptam // iti
V03vinv172u:341_41: eko na niṣpalāyitaḥ; tam eva ca baddhaṃ śocamāno 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_42: śākunikās te dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_43: rājabhayān na badhnanti; nāpi praghātayanti; te taṃ haṃsādhipatim ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_44: sa dvitīyaḥ abaddhaḥ; snehapāśapāśitaḥ svayam eva gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:341_46: rājā kathayati: bhavanto 'yaṃ dvitīyaḥ kimartham ānītaḥ? te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:341_47: deva nāsmābhir ayaṃ baddhaḥ; api tu svayam evāgataḥ iti; rājā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:341_49: gacchata; etaṃ haṃsādhipatiṃ saha bhāryayā muñcata;
V03vinv172u:341_50: na ca yuṣmābhiḥ kenacid api etau praghātyau iti;
V03vinv172u:341_51_0: śākunikāḥ kathayanti: deva anya praghātayiṣyanti; janakāyasya nivedyatām iti; rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā: gacchata bhavanto
V03vinv172u:341_51_1: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata deva evaṃ samājñāpayati,
V03vinv172u:341_52: na kenacid madviṣayanivāsinā jalacarāḥ pakṣiṇo ghātayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:341_54: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrṇamukho haṃsādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:341_55: yā sā tasya patnī sa evāsāv ānandaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:341_57: etāny eva tāni ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:341_62: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:341_63: ānandena bhikṣuṇā na parityakta tac chrūyatām (SBV II 195)
V03vinv172u:343_0: The story of Karadaṇḍī, the Sahasrayodha
V03vinv172u:343_1: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:344_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām aṭṭo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:344_1: tasya paṃcāmātyaśatāni yeṣām anubhāvāt prātisīmaiḥ koṭṭarājabhir nābhibhūyate;
V03vinv172u:344_2: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathāt karadaṇḍī nāma sahasrayodhī abhyāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:344_6: tad arhati devo 'sya parigrahaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:344_7: sa rājñā parigṛhītaḥ; bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ; yāvad apareṇa samayena aṭṭasya rājñaḥ bhūmyantarā rājānaḥ upacittabalasādhanāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:344_8: te caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭaṃ rājānam abhigatāḥ yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:344_9: aṭṭo 'pi rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:344_10: aṭṭena rājñā bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ jītāḥ bhītaḥ bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtāḥ svaksvakān viṣayān gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:344_11: taiḥ punar api sannipatya aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃcāmātyaśatāni upaskāreṇa bhagnāni:
V03vinv172u:344_12: āgacchata yūyaṃ; yuṣmān prativiśiṣṭaraiḥ bhogaiḥ saṃvibhajāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:344_13: te saṃpratipannāḥ; tato bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ punar api caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭam rājānam abhigatā yauddhāya;
V03vinv172u:344_14: aṭṭo 'pi nāma caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:344_15: aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃca amātyaśatāni yuddhe vartamāne pratinivartya karaṇḍdinā sahasrayodhena sārdhaṃ yoddhum ārabdhāni [A_496a] rājā dṛṣṭvā vyathitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:344_18: mitraṃ te karadaṇḍī tu tvām eko na prahāsyati // iti
V03vinv172u:344_20: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sāv aṭṭo nāma rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:344_21: yā 'sau karadaṇḍī sahasrayodhaḥ ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:344_22: yāni tāni paṃca amātyaśatāni etāny eva tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;

V03vinv172u:346_0: The story of a lion and his jackal-friend
V03vinv172u:346_1: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:347_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgapatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:347_1: tasya paṃca sṛgālaśatāni vighasakhādakāni nityānubaddhāni parvatam upaniśritya tiṣṭhanti;
V03vinv172u:347_2: siṃhaḥ prāṇino ghātayitvā varamāṃsāni vararudhirāṇi ca pītvā nirapekṣaḥ prakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:347_4: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃho mṛgarājaḥ rātrau prāṇinaḥ samanveṣamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:347_6: ekaḥ kūpataṭe avasthitaḥ; cintayati ca: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenemaṃ samuddhareyam iti;
V03vinv172u:347_7: sa itaś cāmutaś ca kūpasāmantakena paryaṭitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:347_8: yāvat paśyati: kūpasya nātidūre palvalaṃ; tena vicārya ekadeśena suraṅgo nikhātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:347_9: tatas tad udapānaṃ palvalāt salilena pūrṇaṃ;
V03vinv172u:347_10: kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāny api /
V03vinv172u:347_11: paśya siṃhaḥ sṛgālena jīrṇakūpāt samuddhṛtaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:347_12: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sīmhaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:347_13: sṛgāla ānando bhikṣuḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:347_14: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca sṛgālaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:347_16: ānandena na parityaktaḥ; etarhy apy (SBV II 197) aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:347_17: bhūyo 'pi yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:349_0: The story of a Mṛgī and Mṛgādhipati
V03vinv172u:350_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe paṃcānāṃ mṛgaśatānāṃ mṛgādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:350_1: yāvad anyatamena lubdhakena mṛgāṇāṃ vadhāya prabhūtāḥ kūṭapāśāḥ lepāś ca vyavasthāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:350_2: sa ca mṛgādhipatiḥ visrabdhavihāratayā paṃcaśataparivāro mṛgadāve paribhramati;
V03vinv172u:350_4: taṃ baddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mṛgā niṣpalāyitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:350_7: sa śaknoti; taṃ tathā calantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mṛgī gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:350_11: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:350_12: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti
V03vinv172u:350_13: tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ dhanurbāṇapāṇiḥ kāṣāyavastravasitaḥ taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:350_14: adrākṣīt sā mṛgī taṃ lubdhakaṃ vadhāyodyataṃ mṛgādhipatim upasaṃkrāntaṃ;
V03vinv172u:350_15: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:350_17: āgato hy eṣa lubdho 'sau pāśo yenaiṣa āhṛtaḥ //iti
V03vinv172u:350_19: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:350_20: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti (SBV II 198)
V03vinv172u:350_21: tataḥ sā mṛgī śūnyahṛdayā taṃ mṛgalubdhakam imāṃ gāthāṃ tatsamīpe bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:350_23: pūrvaṃ ghātaya māṃ tāvat tataḥ paścān mṛgādhipatam // iti
V03vinv172u:350_25: kas tavaiṣa bhavati? iti; sā kathayati: svāmi iti; sa taṃ gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:350_26: nāhaṃ tvā ghatāyiṣyāmi na haniṣye mṛgādhipam /
V03vinv172u:350_27: saṃgamaṃ te kariṣyāmi priyeṇa patinā saha // iti
V03vinv172u:350_29: yathāhaṃ ludha modāmi priyeṇa patinā saha /
V03vinv172u:350_30: evaṃ tvaṃ lubdha modasva saha sarvaiḥ svabāndhavaiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:350_31: tatas tena lubdhena bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayajātena mṛgo muktaḥ
V03vinv172u:350_32: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:350_33: yā sā mṛgī ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:350_34: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca mṛgaśatāni etāny eva ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:350_36: ānandena na parityaktaḥ; etarhy apy aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:350_37: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:350_38: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ pūtiḥ pūtinā lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:350_39: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ;
V03vinv172u:352_0: The story of a jackal competing with an elephant
V03vinv172u:353_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin paravataikadeśe mahat padmasaraḥ;
V03vinv172u:353_3: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastī tasmāt padmasarasaḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā uttiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:353_4: sṛgālaś cāvatarati; tena hastī uktaḥ; yuddhaṃ vā anuprayaccha mārgaṃ vā iti;
V03vinv172u:353_5: hastī saṃlakṣayati: (SBV II 199) pūtir ayaṃ tapasvī dhvāṅkṣaś ca;
V03vinv172u:353_7: śuṇḍayā vā dantena vā aśucinā vā nāśayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:353_8: punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: sarvathā pūtir ayaṃ pūtinaiva hantavyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:353_9: na tvā padbhyāṃ haniṣyāmi na dantābhyāṃ na śuṇḍayā /
V03vinv172u:353_10: pūtinā tvāṃ haniṣyāmi pūtir hanyeta pūtinā // iti
V03vinv172u:353_11: hastī saṃlakṣayati: apakramyaikānte gacchāmi; niyatam eṣa māṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:353_14: vacanamātreṇaiva eṣa bhagno mayā yena tvaritatvaritaṃ niṣpalāyitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:353_16: hastinā samīpaṃ gataṃ jñātvā tasyopari mahatā vegena purīṣaṃ muktaṃ;
V03vinv172u:353_17: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sṛgālaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena tadāpy eṣa pūtinā pūtir hataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:353_18: etarhy apy eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ

V03vinv172u:355_1: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ iti;

V03vinv172u:357_0: The story of Āgneya, the cat
V03vinv172u:358_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe mūṣikāṇāṃ yūthapatiḥ paṃcaśataparivāro 'vatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:358_1: āgneyo nāma biḍālaḥ; tena taruṇāvasthāyāṃ yasmin pradeśe prativasati;
V03vinv172u:358_5: sa saṃlakṣayati: pūrvam ahaṃ taruṇāvasthāyāṃ śaktaḥ parākrameṇa mūṣikān grahītum;
V03vinv172u:358_6: idānīm aśaktaḥ; kiṃ tu upāyasaṃvidhānena bhakṣayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:358_7: sa śanair (SBV II 200) mandaṃ mandaṃ mūṣikān paryeṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_9: sa muṣikavivarasya nātidūre kṛtakena tapas tapyati;
V03vinv172u:358_10: sa mūṣikair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭaḥ śānteneryāpathena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_12: mātula kiṃ karoṣi iti; sa kathayati:mayā taruṇāvasthāyāṃ prabhūtam apuṇyaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:358_16: te taṃ pratidinaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vivaraṃ praviśanti;
V03vinv172u:358_19: yūthapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati: mama mūṣikāḥ parihīyante; ayaṃ ca biḍālo balavān jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_20: kāraṇenātra bhavitavyam iti; sa biḍālasya viṣṭhāṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_22: sa saṃlakṣayati: niyatam anena mūṣikāḥ praghātyante;
V03vinv172u:358_25: yāvat tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ paścimaṃ mūṣikaṃ bhakṣayan;
V03vinv172u:358_26: sa tam upasaṃkramya dūreṇa gatvā gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:358_29: nāyaṃ śikhī dharmaśikhī arthahetor ayaṃ śikhī /
V03vinv172u:358_30: svasti te 'gneya bhavatu parihīyanti mūṣakāḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:358_31: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena āgneyo biḍālaḥ devadattaḥ saḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_33: etarhy apy anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ
V03vinv172u:358_34: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:358_35: paśya bhadanta ye bhagavato dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_36: ye devadattaḥ dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:358_37: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:358_38: ye dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:360_0: The story of a bull that got entangled other bulls into trouble by bad counsels
V03vinv172u:360_1: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:361_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau paṃcabhiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyaharamāṇau kāntāramārgaṃ pratipannau;
V03vinv172u:361_1: tavyoḥ kāntāramārgapratipannayoḥ kadācid balīvardānāṃ parītto yavaso bhavati;
V03vinv172u:361_3: kadācin nāsty eva; tato 'sau sārthaḥ saha balīvardaiḥ atīva pariśrāntaḥ kṛcchreṇa kāntāmārgaṃ pratipannaḥ paśyati anyatarasmin pradeśe haritaśādvalaṃ salilasaṃpannaṃ ca snātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:361_4: prabhūtaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pītaṃ; tatas te balīvardāḥ parīttena pānyena yavasena ca parikhinnāḥ,
V03vinv172u:361_5: paryāptaṃ yavasaṃ pānīyaṃ ca pītvā viśrāntāḥ;
