V03vinv172u:385_15: atha bhagavān teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:385_18: kadācit karhicid āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:385_19: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpadyante;
V03vinv172u:385_20: kadācit karhicit tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya loke dharmadeśanā prajñāyate;
V03vinv172u:385_21: tad idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sudurlabhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ yaduta āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ,
V03vinv172u:385_22: indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:385_23: ahaṃ caitarhi śāstā loka utpannaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:385_24: dharmaś ca deśyate aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī saugatapratisaṃveditaḥ yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati;
V03vinv172u:385_26_0: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā
V03vinv172u:385_26_1: vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyaym upādānaṃ upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ bhavapratyayā jātiḥ jātipratyayāḥ jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ
V03vinv172u:385_27: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:385_30_0: yaduta avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho vijñānanirodhān nāmarūpanirodho nāmarūpanirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ
V03vinv172u:385_30_1: ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ sparśanirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ vedanānirodhāt (SBV II 210) tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodhaḥ
V03vinv172u:385_30_2: upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj jātinirodhaḥ jātinirodhāj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā nirudhyante
V03vinv172u:385_30_3: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati;
V03vinv172u:385_31: tasmāt tarhi [A_501a] bhikṣavaḥ ātmārthaṃ samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:385_32: kaccin naḥ pravrajya amoghā bhaviṣyanti kriyāḥ saphalāḥ sukhodayāḥ sukhavipākāḥ;
V03vinv172u:385_33_0: yeṣāṃ ca paribhokṣyāmahe cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān teṣāṃ te kārāḥ kṛtāḥ atyarthaṃ mahāphalā
V03vinv172u:385_33_1: bhaviṣyanti mahānuśaṃsāḥ mahādyutayaḥ mahāvistārāḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:385_34_0: yadā te bhikṣavo bhagavatā svāgatavādena supravrajitavādena samudācaritāḥ tadā teṣāṃ yat tad abhūn madgutvaṃ kaukṛtyam ālekhaḥ
V03vinv172u:385_34_1: vilekhaḥ vipratisāraḥ tat sarveṇa sarvaṃ prativigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:385_35: tato 'nye bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:385_36: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:385_37: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām
V03vinv172u:387_0: The story of a ṛṣi living in the country
V03vinv172u:387_1: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:388_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite anekapakṣigaṇaniṣevite ṛṣiḥ prativasati paṃcānām ṛṣiśatānāṃ pramukhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:388_1: yāvad anyaḥ ṛṣiḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran tadāśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:388_2: sa tena ṛṣiṇā na samyak pratimānitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:388_4: ayaṃ pāpecchaḥ ṛṣir na kiṃcid api jānīte;
V03vinv172u:388_6: mayā sārdhaṃ gacchata; ahaṃ yuṣmān paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:388_7: tena bhidyamānās te tasya ṛṣer avavādena avatiṣṭhante;
V03vinv172u:388_8: tena ṛṣiṇā saṃlakṣitam: anena pāpakāriṇā mamaite ṛṣayo bhinnāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:388_11: naiṣa ṛṣidharmaḥ iti; tathāpy asau bhinatty eva, nāvatiṣṭhate iti sa ṛṣir durmanāḥ upāyasaṃvidhānena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:388_12: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka (SBV II 211) utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:388_13: atha anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caran tasya ṛṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:388_15: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā abhiprasannaḥ; tena tasmai kārān kṛtvā mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ:
V03vinv172u:388_16: yan mamānena pāparṣiṇā parṣadbhedaḥ kṛtaḥ aham asya sarvajñeyavaśiprāptasyāpi parṣadbhedaṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:388_17: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jānapadaḥ ṛṣiḥ yena tasya ṛṣeḥ parṣad bhinnā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:388_18: yo 'sau naivāsikaḥ ṛṣiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:388_19: yan mayā asya parṣad bhinnā tasya karmaṇo vipākena anena mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā saṃgho mama bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:388_20: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvavad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:388_21: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ [A_501b] sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:388_22: paśya bhadanta devadattena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā iti;
V03vinv172u:388_23: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā;
V03vinv172u:390_0: The story of a jackal, Śatadru by name
V03vinv172u:391_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe sṛgālaḥ prāṇī prativasati;
V03vinv172u:391_3: nīlakuṇḍe patitaḥ; tena ghṛṇā gṛhītā; tasya nātidūre ūṣasya puñjas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:391_4: sa tasmin patitaḥ pārśvena pārśvaṃ luṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:391_5: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā śarīraṃ jugupsamānaḥ pānīye patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:391_7: yāvat sṛgālair dṛṣṭaḥ; te samantād vidrutāḥ; dūre sthitvā kathayanti: kas tvaṃ? kuto vā abhyāgataḥ? iti;
V03vinv172u:391_8: sa kathayati: (SBV II 212) ahaṃ śatadrunāmā śakreṇa devendreṇa catuṣpadānāṃ rājye abhiṣiktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:391_9: sṛgālāḥ saṃlakṣayanti: apūrvarūpo 'yaṃ; nūnam evaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; sṛgālaiḥ sarvacatuṣpadānāṃ niveditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:391_10: siṃhāḥ saṃlakṣayanti: ko 'sāv asmat prativiśiṣṭo yaś catuṣpadānāṃ rājā bhaviṣyati? gacchāmas tāvat;
V03vinv172u:391_13: sa kesarī paṭṭadhārī; tais tasya niveditaṃ; tenānyacatuṣpadasya ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:391_14: gaccha catuṣpadādhipatiṃ nirīkṣasva kim asau kenacic catuṣpadena dṛṣṭo na vā iti;
V03vinv172u:391_18: sa śrutvā siṃhayūthaparivṛtaḥ tasya sakāśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:391_21: tato vyāghrāḥ; tato 'nye catuṣpadāḥ; teṣāṃ bahir dūreṇa sṛgālāḥ; tasya mātā anyasmin parvatakuñje prativasati;
V03vinv172u:391_24: sā kathayati: kīdṛśaḥ tasya parivāraḥ? iti;
V03vinv172u:391_25: sa kathayati: siṃhavyāghrā hastinaś ca abhyantaraparivāraḥ;
V03vinv172u:391_30: sa gataḥ; tena teṣāṃ sṛgālānāṃ niveditaṃ:
V03vinv172u:391_32: dṛṣṭāsya mayā mātā, yā amuṣmin parvatanikuñe prativasati iti;
V03vinv172u:391_33: te kathayanti: yady evaṃ vayam enaṃ jñāsyāmaḥ sṛgālo vā na vā iti;
V03vinv172u:391_34: dharmatā hy eṣā sṛgālānāṃ yaḥ sṛgālaśabdaṃ śrutvā na vāśate,
V03vinv172u:391_35: tasya romāṇi patiṣyanti; sṛgālā vāśitum ārabdhāḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati: yady ahaṃ na raumi, niyataṃ mama romāṇi patiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:391_37: mām ete praghātayiṣyanti; atraiva viraumi iti; sa hastiskandha eva vāśitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:391_42: sa evaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti hastinā kroṣṭuko yathā // iti
V03vinv172u:391_43: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sṛgālaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:391_44: tadāpy eṣa abhyantarān bāhyīkṛtya bāhyāṃś ca abhyantarīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:391_45: etarhy apy anena abhyantarān bāhyīkṛtya bāhyāṃś ca abhyantarīkṛtya pariṣad hāritā
V03vinv172u:393_0: devadatta gets angry with Kokālika and Khaṇḍadravya
V03vinv172u:394_0: yadā āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ devattasya parṣad apahṛtā tadā devadattaḥ kokālikaṃ khaṇḍadravyaṃ ca tāḍayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:394_2: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:394_3: paśya bhadanta anyair devadattasya parṣad apahṛtā;
V03vinv172u:394_5: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany anyenaivāsya bhāryā apahṛtā;
V03vinv172u:397_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe hastiyūthapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:397_3: tayāsau kalabha ucyate; niṣpalāyāmahe iti; sa kathayati: ko 'sāv upāyo yena niṣpalāyyāmahe iti;
V03vinv172u:397_4: sā kathayati: aham upāyaṃ jāne; tayor gajo 'bhihitaḥ; snāyāmo hradam avatarāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:397_5: so 'vatīrṇaḥ; sā kathayati: paśyāmaḥ kaḥ āvayoś cirataraṃ nimagnas tiṣṭhati iti;
V03vinv172u:397_6: sa mohapuñjas tayā sārdham udake nimagnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:397_8: sa hastī ciraṃ sthitvā utthito na paśyati;
V03vinv172u:397_9: sa saṃlakṣayati: bhūyo nimajjāmi mā me syāt parājayaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:397_10: bhūyo nimagnaḥ dantau nikhātyāvasthitaḥ sucirād gatapratyudgataprāṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:397_12: sa taṃ hradam itaś cāmutaś ca kṣobhayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:397_13: tena tatra bahavo matsyakacchapamaṇḍūkādayaḥ prāṇino 'nayena vyasanam āpaditāḥ;
V03vinv172u:397_15: vṛndī batāyaṃ sumahān prajñāpy asya na vidyate /
V03vinv172u:397_16: anyenāsya hṛtā bhāryā anye duḥkhasya bhāginaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:397_17: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau hastināgaḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:398_2: kuṇḍī trayaṃ tathā kṣīraṃ gopikā ca kṣamāpaṇā /
V03vinv172u:398_3: asthīni cetikaś caiva pakṣiṇā caramaṃ padaṃ //
V03vinv172u:398_4: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:398_5: paśya bhadanta āyuṣmadbhyāṃ [A_502b] śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ devadattasya vīcim āgamayamānābhyāṃ vīcir labdhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:398_6: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvani śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ devadattasya vīcim āgamayamānābhyāṃ vīcir labdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:400_0: The story of a leader of the thieves
V03vinv172u:400_1: (concerning a previous life of Devadatta, etc)
V03vinv172u:401_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake iṣvastrācāryaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:401_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:401_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:401_4: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:401_5: dārikā jātā; tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ (SBV II 215) nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:401_7: iṣvastrācāryaḥ saṃlakṣayati: iyaṃ dārikā na mayā kasyacid rūpeṇa dātavyā na śīlena nāpi dhanena;
V03vinv172u:401_8: api tu yo matsakāśāt paṃcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī bhavati,
V03vinv172u:401_9: tasyaiṣā mayā deyā iti; tasya ca sakāśād dvau māṇavau iṣvastraṃ śikṣitau;
V03vinv172u:401_12: tasmai tena sā dārikā dattā; so 'nyaḥ saṃjātāmarṣaḥ corāṇāṃ madhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:401_14: sa ekasmin pradeśe mārgaṃ badhvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_15: prathamas tāṃ patnīṃ pariṇīya ratha āropya svagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_16: yāvac corabhayāt sārthaḥ agrato gacchan sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_17_0: sa kathayati: bhavanto gacchata; kiṃ tiṣṭhatha? iti; te kathayanti: corair mārgo baddhaḥ iti; sa kathayati: āryā gacchata;
V03vinv172u:401_17_1: kiṃ kariṣyanti iti; sa saṃprasthitaḥ; sārthikāḥ kathayanti: bhavanto gacchatv eṣaḥ; tiṣṭhāmas tāvat; sthānam etad vidyate
V03vinv172u:401_18: patnīṃ ca hārayiṣyati iti; corā vṛkṣam adhiruhya digavalokanaṃ kurvanto 'vasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_20: kathayanti: bhavantaḥ puruṣo rathābhirūḍhaḥ āgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:401_22: nivartaya ratham iti; sa kathayati: bhavantaḥ śūrasya śūraparihāraṃ prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:401_23: te kathayanti: vayam api śūrāḥ iti; senāpatinā paṃca corāḥ preṣitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_24: tena te praghātitāḥ; evaṃ viṃśatir āgatāḥ, te 'pi praghātitāḥ; yāvat sarve praghātitāḥ; senāpatir eko 'vaśiṣṭaḥ; sa khaḍgam ādāya agrataḥ sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_25: sa śarān kṣeptum ārabdhaḥ; sa khadgena chinatti; yāvat tena paṃcaśatikas tūṇīraḥ kṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:401_26_0: tena sarve khaḍgena chinnāḥ; ekaḥ śaro 'vasthitaḥ; sa taṃ na muñcati; sā dārikā kathayati: muñca śaraṃ; kimarthaṃ tiṣṭhati?
V03vinv172u:401_26_1: iti; sa kathayati: eṣa eva eko 'vaśiṣṭaḥ, eṣa cen muktaḥ, ahaṃ praghātitaḥ; tvaṃ cāpahṛtā iti; tataḥ sā dārikā vijṛmbhamāṇā
V03vinv172u:401_30: nāhaṃ rathikena hato hato 'smi lolena pāpacittena /
V03vinv172u:401_32: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rathikaḥ śāriputraḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:401_33: yāsau dārikā maudgalyāyanaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:401_34: yo 'sau corasenāpatir devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:401_35: tadā ābhyām asya vīciṃ paryeṣamāṇābhyāṃ vīcir labdhā;
V03vinv172u:401_36: etarhy api ābhyām asya vīciṃ paryeṣamāṇābhyāṃ vīcir labdhā
V03vinv172u:403_0: The fruit of monachal life in the visible world Ajātaśatru visits the Buddha
V03vinv172u:404_0: 1. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagato jīvakasya kumārabhṛtasya āmravaṇe;
V03vinv172u:404_1_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ tadaiva jyotsnāyāṃ rātryām āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyām abhijñātāyām abhilakṣitāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:404_2: hambho grāmaṇyaḥ evaṃrūpāyāṃ jyotsnāyāṃ rātryām āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyām abhijñātāyām abhilakṣitāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ kim asmābhiḥ karaṇīyaṃ syāt?
V03vinv172u:404_3: 2. athānyatamā avaruddhikā strī rājānam ajātaśatruṃ vaidehīputram idam avocat:

V03vinv172u:457_0: Devadatta is thrown into a pond
V03vinv172u:458_0: yāvad bhagavān janapadacārikāṃ caran śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ;

V03vinv172u:458_2: na ca śaktaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ praghātayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:458_4: sa kapilavastuṃ gataḥ; tena tatra gatvā yaśodharāyāḥ saṃdiṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:458_6: ahaṃ tvadartham āgataḥ; sā tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ paricārayeti;
V03vinv172u:458_8: sā kathayati: tvam evaṃ saṃdiśa: bodhisatvo 'smākaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ sahate;
V03vinv172u:458_13: sā mahānagnabalā; tayā vāmena (MSV IV 234) pāṇinā tasyāṅgulyo nipīḍitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:458_14: śoṇitam āgataṃ; tatas tayā bodhisatvasya krīḍāpuṣkariṇyāṃ [A_518a] kṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:458_15: tena patalā nādo muktaḥ; śrutvā śākyāḥ pradhāvitāḥ: devadatto bodhisatvasyāntaḥ puraṃ praviśya dārāpamardaṃ karotīti;
V03vinv172u:458_18: praghātayāma etam iti; bhūyaḥ kathayanti: asya hatasya hanyate; vyākṛta evāyaṃ bhagavatā ity api devadatta āpāyiko nairayikaḥ kalpastho 'cikitsyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:458_19: taiḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ; trasacchidreṇa niṣpalāyitaḥ; tasya vastraṃ pāṭitaṃ dvikhaṇḍaṃ jātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:458_20: sa saṃlakṣayati: śobhanam; anena kalpena me śrāvakair nivasanaṃ nivāsayitavyam iti
V03vinv172u:460_0: Devadatta fails in his attempts to become King of the Śākyas,
V03vinv172u:460_1: fills underneath his nails with a deadly poison,
V03vinv172u:460_2: intending to scratch the Buddha's feet,
V03vinv172u:461_1: māṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayateti; te kathayanti: bodhisatvasyātrāntaḥpuram avatiṣṭate;
V03vinv172u:461_2: tvaṃ tāvat svīkuru; tataḥ paścād rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv172u:461_3: evam ukto devadattaḥ śākyebhyo vigataśaṃko harmyatalam avarūḍhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:461_5: niyojye 'haṃ tava; prasādaṃ kuru mamāgramahiṣī; kapilavastuni rājyaṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv172u:461_6: yaśodharā praskandibalini; tadā śrīparyaṅkād utthāyobhayor hastayor gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ pātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:461_10: yas tvaṃ mama hastagrahaṇam api na śaktaḥ soḍhuṃ sa māṃ prārthayase;
V03vinv172u:461_11: cakravartī (MSV IV 235) vāsmākaṃ bhartā syād bodhisatvo veti;
V03vinv172u:461_14: yadi te bhagavān kṣamati paścād rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv172u:461_15: sa vatsanābhasya paramatīkṣṇasya viṣasya nakhān pūrayitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:461_16: yadi me śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ kṣamiṣyatīti evaṃ kuśalaṃ;
V03vinv172u:461_17: nocet kṣamiṣyati tatraivāsya pādayor nipatito nakhaviṣapūrṇau pādau kariṣyāmīti viditvā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:461_18: kṣamasva bhagavann iti; bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: kīdṛśena cittenāyaṃ mām upasaṃkrānta iti;
V03vinv172u:461_19: paśyati vadhacittena; tato bhagavān pādatalād yāvaj jānumaṇḍalam upādāya sphaṭikamayau pādau nirmāya tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:461_20: sa bhagavataḥ pādau nakhair veddhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:461_21: tasya nakhā bhagnāḥ; sa prativibhinnaḥ kathayati: tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi; yasmād uktaṃ tvayā: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchanti na te gacchanti durgatim iti;
V03vinv172u:461_22: yadi durgatiṃ gamiṣyāmi idaṃ te mṛṣā iti;
V03vinv172u:461_23: abhydīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi śarīrasya patanaṃ nāpekṣante;
V03vinv172u:461_24: sa jīvann evāvīcikābhir jvālābhir āliṅgito vikroṣṭum ārabdho dahye ānanda dahye ānandeti;
V03vinv172u:461_26: sa kathayati: ehi devadatta tathāgatam arhantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheti;
V03vinv172u:461_27: tena duḥkhavedanābhibhūtena (MSV IV 236) pratyakṣakarmaphaladarśinā āśayataḥ cittaḥ utpāditaṃ;

V03vinv172u:463_0: The Buddha foretells that, on the expiration of a kalpa,
V03vinv172u:464_2: kalpam avīcau mahānarake sthitvā pratyekaṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:464_4: so 'bhisaṃbuddhamātraḥ piṇḍapātam ekānte sthāpayitvā hastau nirmardayan samanvāhariṣyati:
V03vinv172u:464_5: kimartham ahaṃ dīrghakālaṃ saṃsāre saṃsṛtaḥ? iti;
V03vinv172u:464_6: smanvāharan jñāsyati: janmani janmani mayā bhagavataḥ parākrāntaṃ bodhisatvabhūtasyāpi sarvajñeyavaśitāprāptasyāpi,

V03vinv172u:466_0: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana descend to hell to visit and comfort Devadatta
V03vinv172u:467_0: ācaritaṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanoḥ kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ caritum;
V03vinv172u:467_1: athāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocad:
V03vinv172u:467_2: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavatā devadattaḥ pratyekabodhau vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_3: ehy āvām avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gatvā devadattam āśvāsayāva iti;
V03vinv172u:467_4: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau (MSV IV 237) avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gatau;
V03vinv172u:467_6: samanvāhara āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana nārakān satvān iti;
V03vinv172u:467_7: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte musalamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_8: tad udakam avīcikābhir jvālābhir antarāt paryādīyate;
V03vinv172u:467_9: evam īṣāmātrābhir akṣamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_11: tata āyuṣmān śāriputra (SBV II 263) ādhimokṣikaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_17: yo bhagavato bhrātā devadattaḥ sa āgacchatv iti;
V03vinv172u:467_20: tābhyām uktaḥ: asti te kaccit kāraṇānāṃ viśeṣa? iti;
V03vinv172u:467_21: sa kathayati: yā tāvad āvīcikaiḥ satvaiḥ sādhāraṇatā sthitā sā evāstu mama;
V03vinv172u:467_25: te māṃ tilavat peṣayanti; ubhayato dantakaiḥ krakacair aṅgapratyaṅgāni pāṭyante;
V03vinv172u:467_26: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:467_31: ayasmayāḥ parvatā āgacchanti ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitā ekajvalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_32: te māṃ tilavat peṣayantīti; tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatāc chilā kṣiptā tasyaitat karmaṇaḥ phalam
V03vinv172u:467_33: yat kathayasi: ubhayatodantakaiḥ krakacair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair aṅgapratyaṅgāni pāṭyante iti;
V03vinv172u:467_34: tathā hi tvayā bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_35: yat kathayasi: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:467_36: tathā hi tvayā utpalavarṇā bhikṣuṇī arhantī khaṭaprahāreṇa praghātitā;
V03vinv172u:467_39: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya dhanapālako hastināga utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:467_41: kim iti bhadanta śāriputra? pratisaṃhṛtāni bhikṣavo devadattena kuśalamūlāni;
V03vinv172u:467_42: kalpam avīcau (MSV IV 239) mahānarake sthitvāsthimān pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv172u:467_43: sa kathayati (SBV II 264) bhadanta śāriputra yady evam utsahe aham ekapārśvenāvīcau mahānarake sthātum iti
V03vinv172u:469_0: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit in hell followers of Devadatta,
V03vinv172u:470_1: yāvat kokālikasya hi jihvā halaśatena dhāryate;
V03vinv172u:470_3: kokālikābhiprasādya śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittaṃ peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāribhir vatsalayor iti;
V03vinv172u:470_4: evam ukto kokālika āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:470_6: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva kokālikasya halasahareṇa jihvā pāṭayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:470_7: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanāv akaraṇīyā hy ete iti viditvā prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:470_9: atha pūraṇaḥ kāśyapa āyuṣmantoḥ śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanayoḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:470_10: ārya śāriputra mayā mithyādharmadeśanayā mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:470_11: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena jihvāyāṃ paṃca halaśatāni vahanti;
V03vinv172u:470_12: yathā yathā ca śrāvakā stūpakārān kurvanti tathā tathā tīvrataravedanāṃ vedayāmi;
V03vinv172u:470_13: tad arhasi madīyām avasthāṃ teṣāṃ nivedya nivārayituṃ:
V03vinv172u:470_15: tatheti pratijñāya āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau narakacārikāṃ (MSV IV 240) caritvā ṛddhyā jambūdvīpam anuprāptā;
V03vinv172u:470_16: tābhyāṃ bhagavato bhikṣūṇāṃ janakāsya devadattakokālikapūraṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ narakopapannānām avasthā vistareṇa samākhyātā
V03vinv172u:470_17: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:470_18: paśya bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam avacanīkṛtyāvīcau mahānarake [A_519b] patita iti;
V03vinv172u:470_19: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:472_0: The story of the bull and the ass
V03vinv172u:472_1: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:473_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'niyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo goṣūpapanno vṛṣo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:473_1: sa rātrau nagarān nirgamya rājakīye māṣakṣetre carati;
V03vinv172u:473_2: divā nagare tiṣṭhati; yāvat tasya sakāśaṃ gardabhaḥ upasamkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:473_4: na cāhaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi kadācic carantam iti;
V03vinv172u:473_5: sa kathayati: bhagineyāhaṃ rātrau rājakīye māṣakṣetre carāmīti;
V03vinv172u:473_6: sa kathayati: aham api mātula tvayā sārdhaṃ carāmīti;
V03vinv172u:473_7: sa kathayati: bhāgineya tvaṃ vācāṭo manarthaṃ kariṣyasīti;
V03vinv172u:473_8: sa kathayati: mātula gachāmi na kariṣyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:473_9: tau vāṭaṃ bhaṅktvā rājakīye māṣakṣetre nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:473_10: gardabhas tāvat tūṣṇīm avasthito yāvad āśito jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:473_11: tataḥ kathayati: mātula gāyāmi tāvad; vṛṣaḥ kathayati: tiṣṭha tāvan uhūrtaṃ yāvad ahaṃ nirgacchāmīti;
V03vinv172u:473_12: paścād yatheṣṭaṃ kariṣyasi; ity uktvā niṣpalāyitaḥ; gardabho vāśitum ārabdhaḥ; rājapuruṣaiḥ (MSV IV 241) śrutvā gṛhītaḥ:
V03vinv172u:473_13: bhavantaḥ anena gardabhena sarvam idaṃ rājakīyaṃ māṣakṣetraṃ bhakṣitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:473_14: nigraham asya kurma iti; taiḥ karṇau cchitvā ulūkhalaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā muktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:473_15: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman vṛṣeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:473_17: sādhu gītaṃ suṣṭhu gītaṃ prāptaṃ gītasya tat phalam /
V03vinv172u:473_19: evaṃ hi tasya bhavati yo vācaṃ ca na rakṣati /
V03vinv172u:473_22: tūṣṇīṃ bhava khaṇḍadanta tūṣṇīṃ bhava jaradgava /
V03vinv172u:473_23: tvām apy atra gaveṣanto daṇḍahastās trayo janāḥ // iti /
V03vinv172u:473_24: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau vṛṣaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:473_25: yo 'sau gardabha eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:473_26: tadāpy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānayena (SBV II 266) vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:473_27: punar api yathaiva mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānena vyasanam āpannas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:475_0: The story of the bull and the jackal
V03vinv172u:475_1: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:476_2: tenāsau śramaṇabrāhmaṇān svajanān anāthakṛpaṇavanīpakān bhojayitvā yatheṣṭapracārī utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:476_3: so 'pareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman kaluṣe magno 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:476_6: sa saṃlakṣayati: na śaknomi aham adhunā samuddhartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:476_8: vṛṣaḥ kathayati: mama purastāt pāśaṃ sthāpayitvā gaccha;
V03vinv172u:476_9: yadi śṛgāla āgamiṣyati tasyāhaṃ śṛṅge pāśaṃ kṣepsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:476_10: sa tasya [A_520a] purastāt pāśaṃ kṣiptvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:476_11: yāvad rātrau śṛgāla āgataḥ; sa kathayati: ko 'yaṃ bisāny utkhanati puṇḍarīkāni ceti;
V03vinv172u:476_12: vṛṣaḥ kathayati: ahaṃ nimagnas tiṣṭhāmīti; śṛgālaḥ saṃlakṣayati: bhakṣyo me pratyupasthita iti;
V03vinv172u:476_14: vṛṣaḥ kathayati: gaccha tvam asmāt pradeśān mā anayena vyasanam āpatsyasa iti;
